36 #include "tr_local.h"
37 #include "../renderercommon/tr_public.h"

39 backEndData_t *backEndData;
40 backEndState_t backEnd;
41 
42 #define DRAWSCREENQUAD() Tess_InstantQuad(RB_GetScreenQuad())
43 #define DRAWVIEWQUAD() Tess_InstantQuad(backEnd.viewParms.viewportVerts)
44 
48 static void RB_Hyperspace(void)
49 {
50  float c;
51 
52  if (!backEnd.isHyperspace)
53  {
54  // do initialization shit
55  }
56 
57  c = (backEnd.refdef.time & 255) / 255.0f;
58  GL_ClearColor(c, c, c, 1);
59  GL_Clear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT);
60 
61  backEnd.isHyperspace = qtrue;
62 }
63 
67 static void SetViewportAndScissor(void)
68 {
69  GL_LoadProjectionMatrix(backEnd.viewParms.projectionMatrix);
70 
71  // set the window clipping
72  GL_Viewport(backEnd.viewParms.viewportX, backEnd.viewParms.viewportY,
73  backEnd.viewParms.viewportWidth, backEnd.viewParms.viewportHeight);
74 
75  GL_Scissor(backEnd.viewParms.viewportX, backEnd.viewParms.viewportY,
76  backEnd.viewParms.viewportWidth, backEnd.viewParms.viewportHeight);
77 }
78 
82 static void RB_SafeState(void)
83 {
84  // HACK: bring OpenGL into a safe state or strange FBO update problems will occur
85  GLSL_BindProgram(NULL);
86  GL_State(GLS_DEFAULT);
87  //GL_VertexAttribsState(ATTR_POSITION);
88 
89  GL_SelectTexture(0);
90  GL_Bind(tr.whiteImage);
91 }
92 
96 static void RB_SetGL2D(void)
97 {
98  mat4_t proj;
99 
100  Ren_LogComment("--- RB_SetGL2D ---\n");
101 
102  // disable offscreen rendering
103  R_BindNullFBO();
104 
105  backEnd.projection2D = qtrue;
106 
107  // set 2D virtual screen size
108  GL_Viewport(0, 0, glConfig.vidWidth, glConfig.vidHeight);
109  GL_Scissor(0, 0, glConfig.vidWidth, glConfig.vidHeight);
110 
111  MatrixOrthogonalProjection(proj, 0, glConfig.vidWidth, glConfig.vidHeight, 0, 0, 1);
112  GL_LoadProjectionMatrix(proj);
113  GL_LoadModelViewMatrix(matrixIdentity);
114 
115  GL_State(GLS_DEPTHTEST_DISABLE | GLS_SRCBLEND_SRC_ALPHA | GLS_DSTBLEND_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA);
116 
117  GL_Cull(CT_TWO_SIDED);
118 
119  // set time for 2D shaders
120  backEnd.refdef.time = ri.Milliseconds();
121  backEnd.refdef.floatTime = backEnd.refdef.time * 0.001;
122 }
123 
128 static vec4_t *RB_GetScreenQuad(void)
129 {
130  static vec4_t quad[4];
131 
132  Vector4Set(quad[0], 0, 0, 0, 1);
133  Vector4Set(quad[1], glConfig.vidWidth, 0, 0, 1);
134  Vector4Set(quad[2], glConfig.vidWidth, glConfig.vidHeight, 0, 1);
135  Vector4Set(quad[3], 0, glConfig.vidHeight, 0, 1);
136 
137  return quad;
138 }
139 
143 void RB_SetViewMVPM(void)
144 {
145  mat4_t ortho;
146 
147  MatrixOrthogonalProjection(ortho,
148  backEnd.viewParms.viewportX, backEnd.viewParms.viewportX + backEnd.viewParms.viewportWidth,
149  backEnd.viewParms.viewportY, backEnd.viewParms.viewportY + backEnd.viewParms.viewportHeight,
150  -99999, 99999);
151  GL_LoadProjectionMatrix(ortho);
152  GL_LoadModelViewMatrix(matrixIdentity);
153 }
154 
155 enum renderDrawSurfaces_e
156 {
157  DRAWSURFACES_WORLD_ONLY,
158  DRAWSURFACES_ENTITIES_ONLY,
159  DRAWSURFACES_ALL
160 };
161 
167 static void RB_RenderDrawSurfaces(qboolean opaque, int drawSurfFilter)
168 {
169  trRefEntity_t *entity, *oldEntity = NULL;
170  shader_t *shader, *oldShader = NULL;
171  int lightmapNum, oldLightmapNum = LIGHTMAP_NONE;
172  int fogNum, oldFogNum = -1;
173  qboolean depthRange = qfalse, oldDepthRange = qfalse;
174  int i;
175  drawSurf_t *drawSurf;
176  double originalTime = backEnd.refdef.floatTime; // save original time for entity shader offsets
177 
178  Ren_LogComment("--- RB_RenderDrawSurfaces ---\n");
179 
180  // draw everything
181 
182  backEnd.currentLight = NULL;
183 
184  for (i = 0, drawSurf = backEnd.viewParms.drawSurfs; i < backEnd.viewParms.numDrawSurfs; i++, drawSurf++)
185  {
186  // update locals
187  entity = drawSurf->entity;
188  shader = drawSurf->shader;
189  lightmapNum = drawSurf->lightmapNum;
190  fogNum = drawSurf->fogNum;
191 
192  switch (drawSurfFilter)
193  {
194  case DRAWSURFACES_WORLD_ONLY:
195  if (entity != &tr.worldEntity)
196  {
197  continue;
198  }
199  break;
200  case DRAWSURFACES_ENTITIES_ONLY:
201  if (entity == &tr.worldEntity)
202  {
203  continue;
204  }
205  break;
206  case DRAWSURFACES_ALL:
207  default: // unknown filter
208  break;
209  }
210 
211  if (glConfig2.occlusionQueryBits && r_dynamicEntityOcclusionCulling->integer && !entity->occlusionQuerySamples)
212  {
213  continue;
214  }
215 
216  if (opaque)
217  {
218  // skip all translucent surfaces that don't matter for this pass
219  if (shader->sort > SS_OPAQUE)
220  {
221  break;
222  }
223  }
224  else
225  {
226  // skip all opaque surfaces that don't matter for this pass
227  if (shader->sort <= SS_OPAQUE)
228  {
229  continue;
230  }
231  }
232 
233  if (entity == oldEntity && shader == oldShader && lightmapNum == oldLightmapNum && fogNum == oldFogNum)
234  {
235  // fast path, same as previous sort
236  rb_surfaceTable[*drawSurf->surface] (drawSurf->surface);
237  continue;
238  }
239 
240  // change the tess parameters if needed
241  // a "entityMergable" shader is a shader that can have surfaces from seperate
242  // entities merged into a single batch, like smoke and blood puff sprites
243  if (shader != oldShader || lightmapNum != oldLightmapNum || fogNum != oldFogNum || (entity != oldEntity && !shader->entityMergable))
244  {
245  if (oldShader != NULL)
246  {
247  Tess_End();
248  }
249 
250  Tess_Begin(Tess_StageIteratorGeneric, NULL, shader, NULL, qfalse, qfalse, lightmapNum, fogNum);
251 
252  oldShader = shader;
253  oldLightmapNum = lightmapNum;
254  oldFogNum = fogNum;
255  }
256 
257  // change the modelview matrix if needed
258  if (entity != oldEntity)
259  {
260  depthRange = qfalse;
261 
262  if (entity != &tr.worldEntity)
263  {
264  backEnd.currentEntity = entity;
265  backEnd.refdef.floatTime = originalTime - backEnd.currentEntity->e.shaderTime;
266  // we have to reset the shaderTime as well otherwise image animations start
267  // from the wrong frame
268  tess.shaderTime = backEnd.refdef.floatTime - tess.surfaceShader->timeOffset;
269 
270  // set up the transformation matrix
271  R_RotateEntityForViewParms(backEnd.currentEntity, &backEnd.viewParms, &backEnd.orientation);
272 
273  if (backEnd.currentEntity->e.renderfx & RF_DEPTHHACK)
274  {
275  // hack the depth range to prevent view model from poking into walls
276  depthRange = qtrue;
277  }
278  }
279  else
280  {
281  backEnd.currentEntity = &tr.worldEntity;
282  backEnd.refdef.floatTime = originalTime;
283  backEnd.orientation = backEnd.viewParms.world;
284  // we have to reset the shaderTime as well otherwise image animations on
285  // the world (like water) continue with the wrong frame
286  tess.shaderTime = backEnd.refdef.floatTime - tess.surfaceShader->timeOffset;
287  }
288 
289  GL_LoadModelViewMatrix(backEnd.orientation.modelViewMatrix);
290 
291  // change depthrange if needed
292  if (oldDepthRange != depthRange)
293  {
294  if (depthRange)
295  {
296  glDepthRange(0, 0.3);
297  }
298  else
299  {
300  glDepthRange(0, 1);
301  }
302  oldDepthRange = depthRange;
303  }
304 
305  oldEntity = entity;
306  }
307 
308  // add the triangles for this surface
309  rb_surfaceTable[*drawSurf->surface] (drawSurf->surface);
310  }
311 
312  // draw the contents of the last shader batch
313  if (oldShader != NULL)
314  {
315  Tess_End();
316  }
317 
318  // go back to the world modelview matrix
319  GL_LoadModelViewMatrix(backEnd.viewParms.world.modelViewMatrix);
320 
321  backEnd.refdef.floatTime = originalTime;
322 
323  if (depthRange)
324  {
325  glDepthRange(0, 1);
326  }
327 
328  GL_CheckErrors();
329 }
330 
331 /*
332  * @brief RB_RenderOpaqueSurfacesIntoDepth
333  * @note Unused
334 static void RB_RenderOpaqueSurfacesIntoDepth(qboolean onlyWorld)
335 {
336  trRefEntity_t *entity, *oldEntity;
337  shader_t *shader, *oldShader;
338  qboolean depthRange, oldDepthRange;
339  qboolean alphaTest, oldAlphaTest;
340  deformType_t deformType, oldDeformType;
341  int i;
342  drawSurf_t *drawSurf;
343 
344  Ren_LogComment("--- RB_RenderOpaqueSurfacesIntoDepth ---\n");
345 
346  // draw everything
347  oldEntity = NULL;
348  oldShader = NULL;
349  oldDepthRange = depthRange = qfalse;
350  oldAlphaTest = alphaTest = qfalse;
351  oldDeformType = deformType = DEFORM_TYPE_NONE;
352  backEnd.currentLight = NULL;
353 
354  for (i = 0, drawSurf = backEnd.viewParms.drawSurfs; i < backEnd.viewParms.numDrawSurfs; i++, drawSurf++)
355  {
356  // update locals
357  entity = drawSurf->entity;
358  shader = drawSurf->shader;
359  alphaTest = shader->alphaTest;
360 
361 //#if 0
362 // if (onlyWorld && (entity != &tr.worldEntity))
363 // {
364 // continue;
365 // }
366 //#endif
367 
368  // skip all translucent surfaces that don't matter for this pass
369  if (shader->sort > SS_OPAQUE)
370  {
371  break;
372  }
373 
374  if (shader->numDeforms)
375  {
376  deformType = ShaderRequiresCPUDeforms(shader) ? DEFORM_TYPE_CPU : DEFORM_TYPE_GPU;
377  }
378  else
379  {
380  deformType = DEFORM_TYPE_NONE;
381  }
382 
383  // change the tess parameters if needed
384  // a "entityMergable" shader is a shader that can have surfaces from seperate
385  // entities merged into a single batch, like smoke and blood puff sprites
386  //if(shader != oldShader || lightmapNum != oldLightmapNum || (entity != oldEntity && !shader->entityMergable))
387 
388  if (entity == oldEntity && (alphaTest ? shader == oldShader : alphaTest == oldAlphaTest) && deformType == oldDeformType)
389  {
390  // fast path, same as previous sort
391  rb_surfaceTable[*drawSurf->surface] (drawSurf->surface);
392  continue;
393  }
394  else
395  {
396  if (oldShader != NULL)
397  {
398  Tess_End();
399  }
400 
401  Tess_Begin(Tess_StageIteratorDepthFill, NULL, shader, NULL, qtrue, qfalse, -1, 0);
402 
403  oldShader = shader;
404  oldAlphaTest = alphaTest;
405  oldDeformType = deformType;
406  }
407 
408  // change the modelview matrix if needed
409  if (entity != oldEntity)
410  {
411  depthRange = qfalse;
412 
413  if (entity != &tr.worldEntity)
414  {
415  backEnd.currentEntity = entity;
416 
417  // set up the transformation matrix
418  R_RotateEntityForViewParms(backEnd.currentEntity, &backEnd.viewParms, &backEnd.orientation);
419 
420  if (backEnd.currentEntity->e.renderfx & RF_DEPTHHACK)
421  {
422  // hack the depth range to prevent view model from poking into walls
423  depthRange = qtrue;
424  }
425  }
426  else
427  {
428  backEnd.currentEntity = &tr.worldEntity;
429  backEnd.orientation = backEnd.viewParms.world;
430  }
431 
432  GL_LoadModelViewMatrix(backEnd.orientation.modelViewMatrix);
433 
434  // change depthrange if needed
435  if (oldDepthRange != depthRange)
436  {
437  if (depthRange)
438  {
439  glDepthRange(0, 0.3);
440  }
441  else
442  {
443  glDepthRange(0, 1);
444  }
445  oldDepthRange = depthRange;
446  }
447 
448  oldEntity = entity;
449  }
450 
451  // add the triangles for this surface
452  rb_surfaceTable[*drawSurf->surface] (drawSurf->surface);
453  }
454 
455  // draw the contents of the last shader batch
456  if (oldShader != NULL)
457  {
458  Tess_End();
459  }
460 
461  // go back to the world modelview matrix
462  GL_LoadModelViewMatrix(backEnd.viewParms.world.modelViewMatrix);
463  if (depthRange)
464  {
465  glDepthRange(0, 1);
466  }
467 
468  GL_CheckErrors();
469 }
470 */
471 
472 // *INDENT-OFF*
477 static void Render_lightVolume(interaction_t *ia)
478 {
479  int j;
480  trRefLight_t *light = ia->light;
481  shader_t *lightShader;
482  shaderStage_t *attenuationXYStage;
483  shaderStage_t *attenuationZStage;
484  vec4_t quadVerts[4];
485 
486  // set the window clipping
487  GL_Viewport(backEnd.viewParms.viewportX, backEnd.viewParms.viewportY,
488  backEnd.viewParms.viewportWidth, backEnd.viewParms.viewportHeight);
489 
490  // set light scissor to reduce fillrate
491  GL_Scissor(ia->scissorX, ia->scissorY, ia->scissorWidth, ia->scissorHeight);
492 
493  // set 2D virtual screen size
494  GL_PushMatrix();
495  RB_SetViewMVPM();
496 
497  switch (light->l.rlType)
498  {
499  case RL_PROJ:
500  {
501  mat4_reset_translate(light->attenuationMatrix, 0.5, 0.5, 0.0); // bias
502  MatrixMultiplyScale(light->attenuationMatrix, 0.5, 0.5, 1.0f / Q_min(light->falloffLength, 1.0f)); // scale
503  break;
504  }
505  case RL_OMNI:
506  default:
507  {
508  mat4_reset_translate(light->attenuationMatrix, 0.5, 0.5, 0.5); // bias
509  MatrixMultiplyScale(light->attenuationMatrix, 0.5, 0.5, 0.5); // scale
510  break;
511  }
512  }
513  mat4_mult_self(light->attenuationMatrix, light->projectionMatrix); // light projection (frustum)
514  mat4_mult_self(light->attenuationMatrix, light->viewMatrix);
515 
516  lightShader = light->shader;
517  attenuationZStage = lightShader->stages[0];
518 
519  for (j = 1; j < MAX_SHADER_STAGES; j++)
520  {
521  attenuationXYStage = lightShader->stages[j];
522 
523  if (!attenuationXYStage)
524  {
525  break;
526  }
527 
528  if (attenuationXYStage->type != ST_ATTENUATIONMAP_XY)
529  {
530  continue;
531  }
532 
533  if (!RB_EvalExpression(&attenuationXYStage->ifExp, 1.0f))
534  {
535  continue;
536  }
537 
538  Tess_ComputeColor(attenuationXYStage);
539  R_ComputeFinalAttenuation(attenuationXYStage, light);
540 
541  if (light->l.rlType == RL_OMNI)
542  {
543  qboolean shadowCompare;
544 
545  Ren_LogComment("--- Render_lightVolume_omni ---\n");
546 
547  SetMacrosAndSelectProgram(trProg.gl_volumetricLightingShader);
548  GL_Cull(CT_TWO_SIDED);
549  GL_State(GLS_DEPTHTEST_DISABLE | GLS_SRCBLEND_ONE | GLS_DSTBLEND_ONE);
550 
551  shadowCompare = (r_shadows->integer >= SHADOWING_ESM16 && !light->l.noShadows && light->shadowLOD >= 0);
552 
553  SetUniformVec3(UNIFORM_VIEWORIGIN, backEnd.viewParms.orientation.origin); // in world space
554  SetUniformVec3(UNIFORM_LIGHTORIGIN, light->origin);
555  SetUniformVec3(UNIFORM_LIGHTCOLOR, tess.svars.color);
556  SetUniformFloat(UNIFORM_LIGHTRADIUS, light->sphereRadius);
557  SetUniformFloat(UNIFORM_LIGHTSCALE, light->l.scale);
558  SetUniformMatrix16(UNIFORM_LIGHTATTENUATIONMATRIX, light->attenuationMatrix2);
559 
560  // FIXME gl_volumetricLightingShader->SetUniform_ShadowMatrix(light->attenuationMatrix);
561 
562  SetUniformFloat(UNIFORM_SHADOWCOMPARE, shadowCompare);
563  SetUniformMatrix16(UNIFORM_MODELVIEWPROJECTIONMATRIX, GLSTACK_MVPM);
564  SetUniformMatrix16(UNIFORM_UNPROJECTMATRIX, backEnd.viewParms.unprojectionMatrix);
565 
566  // bind u_DepthMap
567  SelectTexture(TEX_DEPTH);
568  if (r_hdrRendering->integer && glConfig2.framebufferObjectAvailable && glConfig2.textureFloatAvailable)
569  {
570  GL_Bind(tr.depthRenderImage);
571  }
572  else
573  {
574  // depth texture is not bound to a FBO
575  ImageCopyBackBuffer(tr.depthRenderImage);
576  }
577 
578  // bind u_AttenuationMapXY
579  SelectTexture(TEX_ATTEXY);
580  BindAnimatedImage(&attenuationXYStage->bundle[TB_COLORMAP]);
581 
582  // bind u_AttenuationMapZ
583  SelectTexture(TEX_ATTEZ);
584  BindAnimatedImage(&attenuationZStage->bundle[TB_COLORMAP]);
585 
586  // bind u_ShadowMap
587  if (shadowCompare)
588  {
589  SelectTexture(TEX_SHADOWMAP);
590  GL_Bind(tr.shadowCubeFBOImage[light->shadowLOD]);
591  }
592 
593  // draw light scissor rectangle
594  Vector4Set(quadVerts[0], ia->scissorX, ia->scissorY, 0, 1);
595  Vector4Set(quadVerts[1], ia->scissorX + ia->scissorWidth - 1, ia->scissorY, 0, 1);
596  Vector4Set(quadVerts[2], ia->scissorX + ia->scissorWidth - 1, ia->scissorY + ia->scissorHeight - 1, 0,
597  1);
598  Vector4Set(quadVerts[3], ia->scissorX, ia->scissorY + ia->scissorHeight - 1, 0, 1);
599  Tess_InstantQuad(quadVerts);
600 
601  GL_CheckErrors();
602  }
603  }
604 
605  GL_PopMatrix();
606 }
607 // *INDENT-ON*
608 
618 static int MergeInteractionBounds(const mat4_t lightViewProjectionMatrix, interaction_t *ia, int iaCount, vec3_t bounds[2], qboolean shadowCasters)
619 {
620  int i;
621  int j;
622  surfaceType_t *surface;
623  vec4_t point;
624  vec4_t transf;
625  vec3_t worldBounds[2];
626  //vec3_t viewBounds[2];
627  //vec3_t center;
628  //float radius;
629  int numCasters = 0;
630  frustum_t frustum;
631  cplane_t *clipPlane;
632  int r;
633 
634  ClearBounds(bounds[0], bounds[1]);
635 
636  // calculate frustum planes using the modelview projection matrix
637  R_SetupFrustum2(frustum, lightViewProjectionMatrix);
638 
639  while (iaCount < backEnd.viewParms.numInteractions)
640  {
641  surface = ia->surface;
642 
643  if (shadowCasters)
644  {
645  if (ia->type == IA_LIGHTONLY)
646  {
647  goto skipInteraction;
648  }
649  }
650  else
651  {
652  // we only merge shadow receivers
653  if (ia->type == IA_SHADOWONLY)
654  {
655  goto skipInteraction;
656  }
657  }
658 
659  if (*surface == SF_FACE || *surface == SF_GRID || *surface == SF_TRIANGLES)
660  {
661  srfGeneric_t *gen = (srfGeneric_t *) surface;
662 
663  VectorCopy(gen->bounds[0], worldBounds[0]);
664  VectorCopy(gen->bounds[1], worldBounds[1]);
665  }
666  else if (*surface == SF_VBO_MESH)
667  {
668  srfVBOMesh_t *srf = (srfVBOMesh_t *) surface;
669 
670  //Ren_Print("merging vbo mesh bounds\n");
671 
672  VectorCopy(srf->bounds[0], worldBounds[0]);
673  VectorCopy(srf->bounds[1], worldBounds[1]);
674  }
675  else // if (*surface == SF_MDV) & others
676  {
677  //Tess_AddCube(vec3_origin, entity->localBounds[0], entity->localBounds[1], lightColor);
678  goto skipInteraction;
679  }
680 
681 #if 1
682  // use the frustum planes to cut off shadow casters beyond the split frustum
683  for (i = 0; i < 6; i++)
684  {
685  clipPlane = &frustum[i];
686 
687  r = BoxOnPlaneSide(worldBounds[0], worldBounds[1], clipPlane);
688  if (r == 2)
689  {
690  goto skipInteraction;
691  }
692  }
693 #endif
694 
695  if (shadowCasters && ia->type != IA_LIGHTONLY)
696  {
697  numCasters++;
698  }
699 
700 #if 1
701  for (j = 0; j < 8; j++)
702  {
703  point[0] = worldBounds[j & 1][0];
704  point[1] = worldBounds[(j >> 1) & 1][1];
705  point[2] = worldBounds[(j >> 2) & 1][2];
706  point[3] = 1;
707 
708  mat4_transform_vec4(lightViewProjectionMatrix, point, transf);
709  transf[0] /= transf[3];
710  transf[1] /= transf[3];
711  transf[2] /= transf[3];
712 
713  AddPointToBounds(transf, bounds[0], bounds[1]);
714  }
715 #elif 0
716  ClearBounds(viewBounds[0], viewBounds[1]);
717  for (j = 0; j < 8; j++)
718  {
719  point[0] = worldBounds[j & 1][0];
720  point[1] = worldBounds[(j >> 1) & 1][1];
721  point[2] = worldBounds[(j >> 2) & 1][2];
722  point[3] = 1;
723 
724  mat4_transform_vec4(lightViewProjectionMatrix, point, transf);
725  transf[0] /= transf[3];
726  transf[1] /= transf[3];
727  transf[2] /= transf[3];
728 
729  AddPointToBounds(transf, viewBounds[0], viewBounds[1]);
730  }
731 
732  // get sphere of AABB
733  VectorAdd(viewBounds[0], viewBounds[1], center);
734  VectorScale(center, 0.5, center);
735 
736  radius = RadiusFromBounds(viewBounds[0], viewBounds[1]);
737 
738  for (j = 0; j < 3; j++)
739  {
740  if ((transf[j] - radius) < bounds[0][j])
741  {
742  bounds[0][j] = transf[i] - radius;
743  }
744 
745  if ((transf[j] + radius) > bounds[1][j])
746  {
747  bounds[1][j] = transf[i] + radius;
748  }
749  }
750 #else
751 
752  ClearBounds(viewBounds[0], viewBounds[1]);
753  for (j = 0; j < 8; j++)
754  {
755  point[0] = worldBounds[j & 1][0];
756  point[1] = worldBounds[(j >> 1) & 1][1];
757  point[2] = worldBounds[(j >> 2) & 1][2];
758  point[3] = 1;
759 
760  mat4_transform_vec4(lightViewProjectionMatrix, point, transf);
761  //transf[0] /= transf[3];
762  //transf[1] /= transf[3];
763  //transf[2] /= transf[3];
764 
765  AddPointToBounds(transf, viewBounds[0], viewBounds[1]);
766  }
767 
768  // get sphere of AABB
769  VectorAdd(viewBounds[0], viewBounds[1], center);
770  VectorScale(center, 0.5, center);
771 
772  //MatrixTransform4(lightViewProjectionMatrix, center, transf);
773  //transf[0] /= transf[3];
774  //transf[1] /= transf[3];
775  //transf[2] /= transf[3];
776 
777  radius = RadiusFromBounds(viewBounds[0], viewBounds[1]);
778 
779  if ((transf[2] + radius) > bounds[1][2])
780  {
781  bounds[1][2] = transf[2] + radius;
782  }
783 #endif
784 
785 skipInteraction:
786  if (!ia->next)
787  {
788  // this is the last interaction of the current light
789  break;
790  }
791  else
792  {
793  // just continue
794  ia = ia->next;
795  iaCount++;
796  }
797  }
798 
799  return numCasters;
800 }
801 
805 static void RB_RenderInteractions()
806 {
807  shader_t *shader, *oldShader;
808  trRefEntity_t *entity, *oldEntity;
809  trRefLight_t *light, *oldLight;
810  interaction_t *ia;
811  qboolean depthRange, oldDepthRange;
812  int iaCount;
813  surfaceType_t *surface;
814  vec3_t tmp;
815  mat4_t modelToLight;
816  int startTime = 0;
817 
818  Ren_LogComment("--- RB_RenderInteractions ---\n");
819 
820  R2_TIMING(RSPEEDS_SHADING_TIMES)
821  {
822  startTime = ri.Milliseconds();
823  }
824 
825  // draw everything
826  oldLight = NULL;
827  oldEntity = NULL;
828  oldShader = NULL;
829  oldDepthRange = qfalse;
830  depthRange = qfalse;
831 
832  // render interactions
833  for (iaCount = 0, ia = &backEnd.viewParms.interactions[0]; iaCount < backEnd.viewParms.numInteractions; )
834  {
835  backEnd.currentLight = light = ia->light;
836  backEnd.currentEntity = entity = ia->entity;
837  surface = ia->surface;
838  shader = ia->surfaceShader;
839 
840  if (glConfig2.occlusionQueryBits)
841  {
842  // skip all interactions of this light because it failed the occlusion query
843  if (r_dynamicLightOcclusionCulling->integer && !ia->occlusionQuerySamples)
844  {
845  goto skipInteraction;
846  }
847 
848  if (r_dynamicEntityOcclusionCulling->integer && !entity->occlusionQuerySamples)
849  {
850  goto skipInteraction;
851  }
852  }
853 
854  if (!shader || !shader->interactLight)
855  {
856  // skip this interaction because the surface shader has no ability to interact with light
857  // this will save texcoords and matrix calculations
858  goto skipInteraction;
859  }
860 
861  if (ia->type == IA_SHADOWONLY)
862  {
863  // skip this interaction because the interaction is meant for shadowing only
864  goto skipInteraction;
865  }
866 
867  if (light != oldLight)
868  {
869  Ren_LogComment("----- Rendering new light -----\n");
870 
871  // set light scissor to reduce fillrate
872  GL_Scissor(ia->scissorX, ia->scissorY, ia->scissorWidth, ia->scissorHeight);
873  }
874 
875  // this should never happen in the first iteration
876  if (light == oldLight && entity == oldEntity && shader == oldShader)
877  {
878  // fast path, same as previous
879  rb_surfaceTable[*surface] (surface);
880  goto nextInteraction;
881  }
882 
883  // draw the contents of the last shader batch
884  Tess_End();
885 
886  // begin a new batch
887  Tess_Begin(Tess_StageIteratorLighting, NULL, shader, light->shader, qfalse, qfalse, -1, 0);
888 
889  // change the modelview matrix if needed
890  if (entity != oldEntity)
891  {
892  depthRange = qfalse;
893 
894  if (entity != &tr.worldEntity)
895  {
896  // set up the transformation matrix
897  R_RotateEntityForViewParms(backEnd.currentEntity, &backEnd.viewParms, &backEnd.orientation);
898 
899  if (backEnd.currentEntity->e.renderfx & RF_DEPTHHACK)
900  {
901  // hack the depth range to prevent view model from poking into walls
902  depthRange = qtrue;
903  }
904  }
905  else
906  {
907  backEnd.orientation = backEnd.viewParms.world;
908  }
909 
910  GL_LoadModelViewMatrix(backEnd.orientation.modelViewMatrix);
911 
912  // change depthrange if needed
913  if (oldDepthRange != depthRange)
914  {
915  if (depthRange)
916  {
917  glDepthRange(0, 0.3);
918  }
919  else
920  {
921  glDepthRange(0, 1);
922  }
923  oldDepthRange = depthRange;
924  }
925  }
926 
927  // change the attenuation matrix if needed
928  if (light != oldLight || entity != oldEntity)
929  {
930  // transform light origin into model space for u_LightOrigin parameter
931  if (entity != &tr.worldEntity)
932  {
933  VectorSubtract(light->origin, backEnd.orientation.origin, tmp);
934  light->transformed[0] = DotProduct(tmp, backEnd.orientation.axis[0]);
935  light->transformed[1] = DotProduct(tmp, backEnd.orientation.axis[1]);
936  light->transformed[2] = DotProduct(tmp, backEnd.orientation.axis[2]);
937  }
938  else
939  {
940  VectorCopy(light->origin, light->transformed);
941  }
942 
943  // build the attenuation matrix using the entity transform
944  mat4_mult(light->viewMatrix, backEnd.orientation.transformMatrix, modelToLight);
945 
946  switch (light->l.rlType)
947  {
948  case RL_PROJ:
949  {
950  mat4_reset_translate(light->attenuationMatrix, 0.5, 0.5, 0.0); // bias
951  MatrixMultiplyScale(light->attenuationMatrix, 0.5, 0.5, 1.0f / Q_min(light->falloffLength, 1.0f)); // scale
952  break;
953  }
954  case RL_OMNI:
955  default:
956  {
957  mat4_reset_translate(light->attenuationMatrix, 0.5, 0.5, 0.5); // bias
958  MatrixMultiplyScale(light->attenuationMatrix, 0.5, 0.5, 0.5); // scale
959  break;
960  }
961  }
962  mat4_mult_self(light->attenuationMatrix, light->projectionMatrix); // light projection (frustum)
963  mat4_mult_self(light->attenuationMatrix, modelToLight);
964  }
965 
966  // add the triangles for this surface
967  rb_surfaceTable[*surface] (surface);
968 
969 nextInteraction:
970 
971  // remember values
972  oldLight = light;
973  oldEntity = entity;
974  oldShader = shader;
975 
976 skipInteraction:
977  if (!ia->next)
978  {
979  // draw the contents of the last shader batch
980  Tess_End();
981 
982  // draw the light volume if needed
983  if (light->shader->volumetricLight)
984  {
985  Render_lightVolume(ia);
986  }
987 
988  if (iaCount < (backEnd.viewParms.numInteractions - 1))
989  {
990  // jump to next interaction and continue
991  ia++;
992  iaCount++;
993  }
994  else
995  {
996  // increase last time to leave for loop
997  iaCount++;
998  }
999 
1000  // force updates
1001  oldLight = NULL;
1002  oldEntity = NULL;
1003  oldShader = NULL;
1004  }
1005  else
1006  {
1007  // just continue
1008  ia = ia->next;
1009  iaCount++;
1010  }
1011  }
1012 
1013  // go back to the world modelview matrix
1014  GL_LoadModelViewMatrix(backEnd.viewParms.world.modelViewMatrix);
1015  if (depthRange)
1016  {
1017  glDepthRange(0, 1);
1018  }
1019 
1020  // reset scissor
1021  GL_Scissor(backEnd.viewParms.viewportX, backEnd.viewParms.viewportY,
1022  backEnd.viewParms.viewportWidth, backEnd.viewParms.viewportHeight);
1023 
1024  GL_CheckErrors();
1025 
1026  R2_TIMING(RSPEEDS_SHADING_TIMES)
1027  {
1028  backEnd.pc.c_forwardLightingTime = ri.Milliseconds() - startTime;
1029  }
1030 }
1031 
1035 static void RB_RenderInteractionsShadowMapped()
1036 {
1037  shader_t *shader, *oldShader;
1038  trRefEntity_t *entity, *oldEntity;
1039  trRefLight_t *light, *oldLight;
1040  interaction_t *ia;
1041  int iaCount;
1042  int iaFirst;
1043  surfaceType_t *surface;
1044  qboolean depthRange, oldDepthRange;
1045  qboolean alphaTest, oldAlphaTest;
1046  deformType_t deformType, oldDeformType;
1047  vec3_t tmp;
1048  mat4_t modelToLight;
1049  qboolean drawShadows;
1050  int cubeSide;
1051  int splitFrustumIndex;
1052  int startTime = 0;
1053  const mat4_t bias = { 0.5, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0,
1054  0.0, 0.5, 0.0, 0.0,
1055  0.0, 0.0, 0.5, 0.0,
1056  0.5, 0.5, 0.5, 1.0 };
1057 
1058  if (!glConfig2.framebufferObjectAvailable || !glConfig2.textureFloatAvailable)
1059  {
1060  RB_RenderInteractions();
1061  return;
1062  }
1063 
1064  Ren_LogComment("--- RB_RenderInteractionsShadowMapped ---\n");
1065 
1066  R2_TIMING(RSPEEDS_SHADING_TIMES)
1067  {
1068  startTime = ri.Milliseconds();
1069  }
1070 
1071  // draw everything
1072  oldLight = NULL;
1073  oldEntity = NULL;
1074  oldShader = NULL;
1075  oldDepthRange = depthRange = qfalse;
1076  oldAlphaTest = alphaTest = qfalse;
1077  oldDeformType = deformType = DEFORM_TYPE_NONE;
1078  drawShadows = qtrue;
1079  cubeSide = 0;
1080  splitFrustumIndex = 0;
1081 
1082  // if we need to clear the FBO color buffers then it should be white
1083  GL_ClearColor(GLCOLOR_WHITE);
1084 
1085  // render interactions
1086  for (iaCount = 0, iaFirst = 0, ia = &backEnd.viewParms.interactions[0]; iaCount < backEnd.viewParms.numInteractions; )
1087  {
1088  backEnd.currentLight = light = ia->light;
1089  backEnd.currentEntity = entity = ia->entity;
1090  surface = ia->surface;
1091  shader = ia->surfaceShader;
1092  alphaTest = shader->alphaTest;
1093 
1094  if (shader->numDeforms)
1095  {
1096  deformType = ShaderRequiresCPUDeforms(shader) ? DEFORM_TYPE_CPU : DEFORM_TYPE_GPU;
1097  }
1098  else
1099  {
1100  deformType = DEFORM_TYPE_NONE;
1101  }
1102 
1103  if (glConfig2.occlusionQueryBits && r_dynamicLightOcclusionCulling->integer && !ia->occlusionQuerySamples)
1104  {
1105  // skip all interactions of this light because it failed the occlusion query
1106  goto skipInteraction;
1107  }
1108 
1109  if (light->l.inverseShadows)
1110  {
1111  // handle those lights in RB_RenderInteractionsDeferredInverseShadows
1112  goto skipInteraction;
1113  }
1114 
1115  // only iaCount == iaFirst if first iteration or counters were reset
1116  if (iaCount == iaFirst)
1117  {
1118  if (drawShadows)
1119  {
1120  RB_SafeState();
1121 
1122  if (light->l.noShadows || light->shadowLOD < 0)
1123  {
1124  Ren_LogComment("----- Skipping shadowCube side: %i -----\n", cubeSide);
1125 
1126  goto skipInteraction;
1127  }
1128  else
1129  {
1130  switch (light->l.rlType)
1131  {
1132  case RL_OMNI:
1133  {
1134  //float xMin, xMax, yMin, yMax;
1135  //float width, height, depth;
1136  float zNear, zFar;
1137  float fovX, fovY;
1138  qboolean flipX, flipY;
1139  //float *proj;
1140  vec3_t angles;
1141  mat4_t rotationMatrix, transformMatrix, viewMatrix;
1142 
1143  Ren_LogComment("----- Rendering shadowCube side: %i -----\n", cubeSide);
1144 
1145  R_BindFBO(tr.shadowMapFBO[light->shadowLOD]);
1146  R_AttachFBOTexture2D(GL_TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP_POSITIVE_X + cubeSide,
1147  tr.shadowCubeFBOImage[light->shadowLOD]->texnum, 0);
1148  if (!r_ignoreGLErrors->integer)
1149  {
1150  R_CheckFBO(tr.shadowMapFBO[light->shadowLOD]);
1151  }
1152 
1153  // set the window clipping
1154  GL_Viewport(0, 0, shadowMapResolutions[light->shadowLOD], shadowMapResolutions[light->shadowLOD]);
1155  GL_Scissor(0, 0, shadowMapResolutions[light->shadowLOD], shadowMapResolutions[light->shadowLOD]);
1156 
1157  GL_Clear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT | GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT);
1158 
1159  switch (cubeSide)
1160  {
1161  case 0:
1162  {
1163  // view parameters
1164  VectorSet(angles, 0, 0, 90);
1165 
1166  // projection parameters
1167  flipX = qfalse;
1168  flipY = qfalse;
1169  break;
1170  }
1171  case 1:
1172  {
1173  VectorSet(angles, 0, 180, 90);
1174  flipX = qtrue;
1175  flipY = qtrue;
1176  break;
1177  }
1178  case 2:
1179  {
1180  VectorSet(angles, 0, 90, 0);
1181  flipX = qfalse;
1182  flipY = qfalse;
1183  break;
1184  }
1185  case 3:
1186  {
1187  VectorSet(angles, 0, -90, 0);
1188  flipX = qtrue;
1189  flipY = qtrue;
1190  break;
1191  }
1192  case 4:
1193  {
1194  VectorSet(angles, -90, 90, 0);
1195  flipX = qfalse;
1196  flipY = qfalse;
1197  break;
1198  }
1199  case 5:
1200  {
1201  VectorSet(angles, 90, 90, 0);
1202  flipX = qtrue;
1203  flipY = qtrue;
1204  break;
1205  }
1206  default:
1207  {
1208  // shut up compiler
1209  VectorSet(angles, 0, 0, 0);
1210  flipX = qfalse;
1211  flipY = qfalse;
1212  break;
1213  }
1214  }
1215 
1216  // Quake -> OpenGL view matrix from light perspective
1217  mat4_from_angles(rotationMatrix, angles[PITCH], angles[YAW], angles[ROLL]);
1218  MatrixSetupTransformFromRotation(transformMatrix, rotationMatrix, light->origin);
1219  MatrixAffineInverse(transformMatrix, viewMatrix);
1220 
1221  // convert from our coordinate system (looking down X)
1222  // to OpenGL's coordinate system (looking down -Z)
1223  mat4_mult(quakeToOpenGLMatrix, viewMatrix, light->viewMatrix);
1224 
1225  // OpenGL projection matrix
1226  fovX = 90;
1227  fovY = 90;
1228 
1229  zNear = 1.0;
1230  zFar = light->sphereRadius;
1231 
1232  if (flipX)
1233  {
1234  fovX = -fovX;
1235  }
1236 
1237  if (flipY)
1238  {
1239  fovY = -fovY;
1240  }
1241 
1242  MatrixPerspectiveProjectionFovXYRH(light->projectionMatrix, fovX, fovY, zNear, zFar);
1243 
1244  GL_LoadProjectionMatrix(light->projectionMatrix);
1245  break;
1246  }
1247  case RL_PROJ:
1248  {
1249  Ren_LogComment("--- Rendering projective shadowMap ---\n");
1250 
1251  R_BindFBO(tr.shadowMapFBO[light->shadowLOD]);
1252  R_AttachFBOTexture2D(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tr.shadowMapFBOImage[light->shadowLOD]->texnum, 0);
1253  if (!r_ignoreGLErrors->integer)
1254  {
1255  R_CheckFBO(tr.shadowMapFBO[light->shadowLOD]);
1256  }
1257 
1258  // set the window clipping
1259  GL_Viewport(0, 0, shadowMapResolutions[light->shadowLOD], shadowMapResolutions[light->shadowLOD]);
1260  GL_Scissor(0, 0, shadowMapResolutions[light->shadowLOD], shadowMapResolutions[light->shadowLOD]);
1261 
1262  GL_Clear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT | GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT);
1263 
1264  GL_LoadProjectionMatrix(light->projectionMatrix);
1265  break;
1266  }
1267  case RL_DIRECTIONAL:
1268  {
1269  int j;
1270  vec3_t angles;
1271  vec4_t forward, side, up;
1272  vec3_t lightDirection;
1273  vec3_t viewOrigin, viewDirection;
1274  mat4_t rotationMatrix, transformMatrix, viewMatrix, projectionMatrix, viewProjectionMatrix;
1275  mat4_t cropMatrix;
1276  vec4_t splitFrustum[6];
1277  vec3_t splitFrustumCorners[8];
1278  vec3_t splitFrustumBounds[2];
1279  //vec3_t splitFrustumViewBounds[2];
1280  vec3_t splitFrustumClipBounds[2];
1281  //float splitFrustumRadius;
1282  vec3_t casterBounds[2];
1283  vec3_t receiverBounds[2];
1284  vec3_t cropBounds[2];
1285  vec4_t point;
1286  vec4_t transf;
1287 
1288  Ren_LogComment("--- Rendering directional shadowMap ---\n");
1289 
1290  R_BindFBO(tr.sunShadowMapFBO[splitFrustumIndex]);
1291  if (!r_evsmPostProcess->integer)
1292  {
1293  R_AttachFBOTexture2D(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tr.sunShadowMapFBOImage[splitFrustumIndex]->texnum, 0);
1294  }
1295  else
1296  {
1297  R_AttachFBOTextureDepth(tr.sunShadowMapFBOImage[splitFrustumIndex]->texnum);
1298  }
1299  if (!r_ignoreGLErrors->integer)
1300  {
1301  R_CheckFBO(tr.sunShadowMapFBO[splitFrustumIndex]);
1302  }
1303 
1304  // set the window clipping
1305  GL_Viewport(0, 0, sunShadowMapResolutions[splitFrustumIndex], sunShadowMapResolutions[splitFrustumIndex]);
1306  GL_Scissor(0, 0, sunShadowMapResolutions[splitFrustumIndex], sunShadowMapResolutions[splitFrustumIndex]);
1307 
1308  GL_Clear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT | GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT);
1309 
1310  #if 1
1311  VectorCopy(tr.sunDirection, lightDirection);
1312  #else
1313  VectorCopy(light->direction, lightDirection);
1314  #endif
1315 
1316  if (r_parallelShadowSplits->integer)
1317  {
1318  int numCasters;
1319 
1320  // original light direction is from surface to light
1321  VectorInverse(lightDirection);
1322  VectorNormalize(lightDirection);
1323 
1324  VectorCopy(backEnd.viewParms.orientation.origin, viewOrigin);
1325  VectorCopy(backEnd.viewParms.orientation.axis[0], viewDirection);
1326  VectorNormalize(viewDirection);
1327 
1328 #if 1
1329  // calculate new up dir
1330  CrossProduct(lightDirection, viewDirection, side);
1331  VectorNormalize(side);
1332 
1333  CrossProduct(side, lightDirection, up);
1334  VectorNormalize(up);
1335 
1336  VectorToAngles(lightDirection, angles);
1337  mat4_from_angles(rotationMatrix, angles[PITCH], angles[YAW], angles[ROLL]);
1338  AngleVectors(angles, forward, side, up);
1339 
1340  MatrixLookAtRH(light->viewMatrix, viewOrigin, lightDirection, up);
1341 #else
1342  MatrixLookAtRH(light->viewMatrix, viewOrigin, lightDirection, viewDirection);
1343 #endif
1344 
1345  for (j = 0; j < 6; j++)
1346  {
1347  VectorCopy(backEnd.viewParms.frustums[1 + splitFrustumIndex][j].normal, splitFrustum[j]);
1348  splitFrustum[j][3] = backEnd.viewParms.frustums[1 + splitFrustumIndex][j].dist;
1349  }
1350 
1351  // calculate split frustum corner points
1352  PlanesGetIntersectionPoint(splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_LEFT], splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_TOP], splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_NEAR], splitFrustumCorners[0]);
1353  PlanesGetIntersectionPoint(splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_RIGHT], splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_TOP], splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_NEAR], splitFrustumCorners[1]);
1354  PlanesGetIntersectionPoint(splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_RIGHT], splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_BOTTOM], splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_NEAR], splitFrustumCorners[2]);
1355  PlanesGetIntersectionPoint(splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_LEFT], splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_BOTTOM], splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_NEAR], splitFrustumCorners[3]);
1356 
1357  PlanesGetIntersectionPoint(splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_LEFT], splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_TOP], splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_FAR], splitFrustumCorners[4]);
1358  PlanesGetIntersectionPoint(splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_RIGHT], splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_TOP], splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_FAR], splitFrustumCorners[5]);
1359  PlanesGetIntersectionPoint(splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_RIGHT], splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_BOTTOM], splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_FAR], splitFrustumCorners[6]);
1360  PlanesGetIntersectionPoint(splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_LEFT], splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_BOTTOM], splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_FAR], splitFrustumCorners[7]);
1361 
1362  if (RENLOG)
1363  {
1364  vec3_t rayIntersectionNear, rayIntersectionFar;
1365  float zNear, zFar;
1366 
1367  Ren_LogComment("----- Skipping shadowCube side: %i -----\n", cubeSide);
1368 
1369  PlaneIntersectRay(viewOrigin, viewDirection, splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_FAR], rayIntersectionFar);
1370  zFar = Distance(viewOrigin, rayIntersectionFar);
1371 
1372  VectorInverse(viewDirection);
1373 
1374  PlaneIntersectRay(rayIntersectionFar, viewDirection, splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_NEAR], rayIntersectionNear);
1375  zNear = Distance(viewOrigin, rayIntersectionNear);
1376 
1377  VectorInverse(viewDirection);
1378 
1379  Ren_LogComment("split frustum %i: near = %5.3f, far = %5.3f\n", splitFrustumIndex, zNear, zFar);
1380  Ren_LogComment("pyramid nearCorners\n");
1381  for (j = 0; j < 4; j++)
1382  {
1383  Ren_LogComment("(%5.3f, %5.3f, %5.3f)\n", splitFrustumCorners[j][0], splitFrustumCorners[j][1], splitFrustumCorners[j][2]);
1384  }
1385 
1386  Ren_LogComment("pyramid farCorners\n");
1387  for (j = 4; j < 8; j++)
1388  {
1389  Ren_LogComment("(%5.3f, %5.3f, %5.3f)\n", splitFrustumCorners[j][0], splitFrustumCorners[j][1], splitFrustumCorners[j][2]);
1390  }
1391  }
1392 
1393  ClearBounds(splitFrustumBounds[0], splitFrustumBounds[1]);
1394  for (j = 0; j < 8; j++)
1395  {
1396  AddPointToBounds(splitFrustumCorners[j], splitFrustumBounds[0], splitFrustumBounds[1]);
1397  }
1398 
1399 #if 0
1400  // Scene-Independent Projection
1401 
1402  // find the bounding box of the current split in the light's view space
1403  ClearBounds(splitFrustumViewBounds[0], splitFrustumViewBounds[1]);
1404  //numCasters = MergeInteractionBounds(light->viewMatrix, ia, iaCount, splitFrustumViewBounds, qtrue);
1405  for (j = 0; j < 8; j++)
1406  {
1407  VectorCopy(splitFrustumCorners[j], point);
1408  point[3] = 1;
1409 
1410  MatrixTransform4(light->viewMatrix, point, transf);
1411  transf[0] /= transf[3];
1412  transf[1] /= transf[3];
1413  transf[2] /= transf[3];
1414 
1415  AddPointToBounds(transf, splitFrustumViewBounds[0], splitFrustumViewBounds[1]);
1416  }
1417 
1418  //MatrixScaleTranslateToUnitCube(projectionMatrix, splitFrustumViewBounds[0], splitFrustumViewBounds[1]);
1419  //MatrixOrthogonalProjectionRH(projectionMatrix, -1, 1, -1, 1, -splitFrustumViewBounds[1][2], -splitFrustumViewBounds[0][2]);
1420  #if 1
1421  MatrixOrthogonalProjectionRH(projectionMatrix, splitFrustumViewBounds[0][0],
1422  splitFrustumViewBounds[1][0],
1423  splitFrustumViewBounds[0][1],
1424  splitFrustumViewBounds[1][1],
1425  -splitFrustumViewBounds[1][2],
1426  -splitFrustumViewBounds[0][2]);
1427  #endif
1428  mat4_mult(projectionMatrix, light->viewMatrix, viewProjectionMatrix);
1429 
1430  // find the bounding box of the current split in the light's clip space
1431  ClearBounds(splitFrustumClipBounds[0], splitFrustumClipBounds[1]);
1432  for (j = 0; j < 8; j++)
1433  {
1434  VectorCopy(splitFrustumCorners[j], point);
1435  point[3] = 1;
1436 
1437  mat4_transform_vec4(viewProjectionMatrix, point, transf);
1438  transf[0] /= transf[3];
1439  transf[1] /= transf[3];
1440  transf[2] /= transf[3];
1441 
1442  AddPointToBounds(transf, splitFrustumClipBounds[0], splitFrustumClipBounds[1]);
1443  }
1444  splitFrustumClipBounds[0][2] = 0;
1445  splitFrustumClipBounds[1][2] = 1;
1446 
1447  MatrixCrop(cropMatrix, splitFrustumClipBounds[0], splitFrustumClipBounds[1]);
1448  //MatrixIdentity(cropMatrix);
1449 
1450  Ren_LogComment("split frustum light view space bounds (%5.3f, %5.3f, %5.3f) (%5.3f, %5.3f, %5.3f)\n",
1451  splitFrustumViewBounds[0][0], splitFrustumViewBounds[0][1], splitFrustumViewBounds[0][2],
1452  splitFrustumViewBounds[1][0], splitFrustumViewBounds[1][1], splitFrustumViewBounds[1][2]);
1453 
1454  Ren_LogComment("split frustum light clip space bounds (%5.3f, %5.3f, %5.3f) (%5.3f, %5.3f, %5.3f)\n",
1455  splitFrustumClipBounds[0][0], splitFrustumClipBounds[0][1], splitFrustumClipBounds[0][2],
1456  splitFrustumClipBounds[1][0], splitFrustumClipBounds[1][1], splitFrustumClipBounds[1][2]);
1457 
1458 #else
1459  // Scene-Dependent Projection
1460 
1461  // find the bounding box of the current split in the light's view space
1462  ClearBounds(cropBounds[0], cropBounds[1]);
1463  for (j = 0; j < 8; j++)
1464  {
1465  VectorCopy(splitFrustumCorners[j], point);
1466  point[3] = 1;
1467 #if 1
1468  mat4_transform_vec4(light->viewMatrix, point, transf);
1469  transf[0] /= transf[3];
1470  transf[1] /= transf[3];
1471  transf[2] /= transf[3];
1472 #else
1473  mat4_transform_vec3(light->viewMatrix, point, transf);
1474 #endif
1475 
1476  AddPointToBounds(transf, cropBounds[0], cropBounds[1]);
1477  }
1478 
1479  MatrixOrthogonalProjectionRH(projectionMatrix, cropBounds[0][0], cropBounds[1][0], cropBounds[0][1], cropBounds[1][1], -cropBounds[1][2], -cropBounds[0][2]);
1480 
1481  mat4_mult(projectionMatrix, light->viewMatrix, viewProjectionMatrix);
1482 
1483  numCasters = MergeInteractionBounds(viewProjectionMatrix, ia, iaCount, casterBounds, qtrue);
1484  MergeInteractionBounds(viewProjectionMatrix, ia, iaCount, receiverBounds, qfalse);
1485 
1486  // find the bounding box of the current split in the light's clip space
1487  ClearBounds(splitFrustumClipBounds[0], splitFrustumClipBounds[1]);
1488  for (j = 0; j < 8; j++)
1489  {
1490  VectorCopy(splitFrustumCorners[j], point);
1491  point[3] = 1;
1492 
1493  mat4_transform_vec4(viewProjectionMatrix, point, transf);
1494  transf[0] /= transf[3];
1495  transf[1] /= transf[3];
1496  transf[2] /= transf[3];
1497 
1498  AddPointToBounds(transf, splitFrustumClipBounds[0], splitFrustumClipBounds[1]);
1499  }
1500 
1501  Ren_LogComment("shadow casters = %i\n", numCasters);
1502  Ren_LogComment("split frustum light space clip bounds (%5.3f, %5.3f, %5.3f) (%5.3f, %5.3f, %5.3f)\n",
1503  splitFrustumClipBounds[0][0], splitFrustumClipBounds[0][1], splitFrustumClipBounds[0][2],
1504  splitFrustumClipBounds[1][0], splitFrustumClipBounds[1][1], splitFrustumClipBounds[1][2]);
1505  Ren_LogComment("shadow caster light space clip bounds (%5.3f, %5.3f, %5.3f) (%5.3f, %5.3f, %5.3f)\n",
1506  casterBounds[0][0], casterBounds[0][1], casterBounds[0][2],
1507  casterBounds[1][0], casterBounds[1][1], casterBounds[1][2]);
1508  Ren_LogComment("light receiver light space clip bounds (%5.3f, %5.3f, %5.3f) (%5.3f, %5.3f, %5.3f)\n",
1509  receiverBounds[0][0], receiverBounds[0][1], receiverBounds[0][2],
1510  receiverBounds[1][0], receiverBounds[1][1], receiverBounds[1][2]);
1511 
1512  // scene-dependent bounding volume
1513  cropBounds[0][0] = Q_max(Q_max(casterBounds[0][0], receiverBounds[0][0]), splitFrustumClipBounds[0][0]);
1514  cropBounds[0][1] = Q_max(Q_max(casterBounds[0][1], receiverBounds[0][1]), splitFrustumClipBounds[0][1]);
1515 
1516  cropBounds[1][0] = Q_min(Q_min(casterBounds[1][0], receiverBounds[1][0]), splitFrustumClipBounds[1][0]);
1517  cropBounds[1][1] = Q_min(Q_min(casterBounds[1][1], receiverBounds[1][1]), splitFrustumClipBounds[1][1]);
1518 
1519  cropBounds[0][2] = Q_min(casterBounds[0][2], splitFrustumClipBounds[0][2]);
1520  //cropBounds[0][2] = casterBounds[0][2];
1521  //cropBounds[0][2] = splitFrustumClipBounds[0][2];
1522  cropBounds[1][2] = Q_min(receiverBounds[1][2], splitFrustumClipBounds[1][2]);
1523  //cropBounds[1][2] = splitFrustumClipBounds[1][2];
1524 
1525  if (numCasters == 0)
1526  {
1527  VectorCopy(splitFrustumClipBounds[0], cropBounds[0]);
1528  VectorCopy(splitFrustumClipBounds[1], cropBounds[1]);
1529  }
1530 
1531  MatrixCrop(cropMatrix, cropBounds[0], cropBounds[1]);
1532 #endif
1533 
1534  mat4_mult(cropMatrix, projectionMatrix, light->projectionMatrix);
1535 
1536  GL_LoadProjectionMatrix(light->projectionMatrix);
1537  }
1538  else
1539  {
1540  // original light direction is from surface to light
1541  VectorInverse(lightDirection);
1542 
1543  // Quake -> OpenGL view matrix from light perspective
1544 #if 1
1545  VectorToAngles(lightDirection, angles);
1546  mat4_from_angles(rotationMatrix, angles[PITCH], angles[YAW], angles[ROLL]);
1547  MatrixSetupTransformFromRotation(transformMatrix, rotationMatrix, backEnd.viewParms.orientation.origin);
1548  MatrixAffineInverse(transformMatrix, viewMatrix);
1549  mat4_mult(quakeToOpenGLMatrix, viewMatrix, light->viewMatrix);
1550 #else
1551  MatrixLookAtRH(light->viewMatrix, backEnd.viewParms.orientation.origin, lightDirection, backEnd.viewParms.orientation.axis[0]);
1552 #endif
1553 
1554  ClearBounds(splitFrustumBounds[0], splitFrustumBounds[1]);
1555  //BoundsAdd(splitFrustumBounds[0], splitFrustumBounds[1], backEnd.viewParms.visBounds[0], backEnd.viewParms.visBounds[1]);
1556  BoundsAdd(splitFrustumBounds[0], splitFrustumBounds[1], light->worldBounds[0], light->worldBounds[1]);
1557 
1558  ClearBounds(cropBounds[0], cropBounds[1]);
1559  for (j = 0; j < 8; j++)
1560  {
1561  point[0] = splitFrustumBounds[j & 1][0];
1562  point[1] = splitFrustumBounds[(j >> 1) & 1][1];
1563  point[2] = splitFrustumBounds[(j >> 2) & 1][2];
1564  point[3] = 1;
1565 
1566  mat4_transform_vec4(light->viewMatrix, point, transf);
1567  transf[0] /= transf[3];
1568  transf[1] /= transf[3];
1569  transf[2] /= transf[3];
1570 
1571  AddPointToBounds(transf, cropBounds[0], cropBounds[1]);
1572  }
1573 
1574  // transform from OpenGL's right handed into D3D's left handed coordinate system
1575 #if 0
1576  MatrixScaleTranslateToUnitCube(projectionMatrix, cropBounds[0], cropBounds[1]);
1577  MatrixMultiplyMOD(flipZMatrix, projectionMatrix, light->projectionMatrix);
1578 #else
1579  MatrixOrthogonalProjectionRH(light->projectionMatrix, cropBounds[0][0], cropBounds[1][0], cropBounds[0][1], cropBounds[1][1], -cropBounds[1][2], -cropBounds[0][2]);
1580 #endif
1581  GL_LoadProjectionMatrix(light->projectionMatrix);
1582  }
1583  break;
1584  }
1585 
1586  default:
1587  break;
1588  }
1589  }
1590 
1591  Ren_LogComment("----- First Shadow Interaction: %i -----\n", iaCount);
1592  }
1593  else
1594  {
1595  Ren_LogComment("--- Rendering lighting ---\n");
1596  Ren_LogComment("----- First Light Interaction: %i -----\n", iaCount);
1597 
1598  if (r_hdrRendering->integer)
1599  {
1600  R_BindFBO(tr.deferredRenderFBO);
1601  }
1602  else
1603  {
1604  R_BindNullFBO();
1605  }
1606 
1607  // set the window clipping
1608  GL_Viewport(backEnd.viewParms.viewportX, backEnd.viewParms.viewportY,
1609  backEnd.viewParms.viewportWidth, backEnd.viewParms.viewportHeight);
1610 
1611  GL_Scissor(backEnd.viewParms.viewportX, backEnd.viewParms.viewportY,
1612  backEnd.viewParms.viewportWidth, backEnd.viewParms.viewportHeight);
1613 
1614  // restore camera matrices
1615  GL_LoadProjectionMatrix(backEnd.viewParms.projectionMatrix);
1616  GL_LoadModelViewMatrix(backEnd.orientation.modelViewMatrix);
1617 
1618  // reset light view and projection matrices
1619  switch (light->l.rlType)
1620  {
1621  case RL_OMNI:
1622  {
1623  MatrixAffineInverse(light->transformMatrix, light->viewMatrix);
1624  mat4_reset_scale(light->projectionMatrix, 1.0f / light->l.radius[0], 1.0f / light->l.radius[1],
1625  1.0f / light->l.radius[2]);
1626  break;
1627  }
1628  case RL_DIRECTIONAL:
1629  {
1630  // draw split frustum shadow maps
1631  if (r_showShadowMaps->integer)
1632  {
1633  int frustumIndex;
1634  float x, y, w, h;
1635  vec4_t quadVerts[4];
1636 
1637  // set 2D virtual screen size
1638  GL_PushMatrix();
1639  RB_SetViewMVPM();
1640 
1641  for (frustumIndex = 0; frustumIndex <= r_parallelShadowSplits->integer; frustumIndex++)
1642  {
1643  GL_Cull(CT_TWO_SIDED);
1644  GL_State(GLS_DEPTHTEST_DISABLE);
1645 
1646  SetMacrosAndSelectProgram(trProg.gl_debugShadowMapShader);
1647  SetUniformMatrix16(UNIFORM_MODELVIEWPROJECTIONMATRIX, GLSTACK_MVPM);
1648 
1649  SelectTexture(TEX_CURRENT);
1650  GL_Bind(tr.sunShadowMapFBOImage[frustumIndex]);
1651 
1652  w = 200;
1653  h = 200;
1654 
1655  x = 205 * frustumIndex;
1656  y = 70;
1657 
1658  Vector4Set(quadVerts[0], x, y, 0, 1);
1659  Vector4Set(quadVerts[1], x + w, y, 0, 1);
1660  Vector4Set(quadVerts[2], x + w, y + h, 0, 1);
1661  Vector4Set(quadVerts[3], x, y + h, 0, 1);
1662 
1663  Tess_InstantQuad(quadVerts);
1664 
1665  {
1666  int j;
1667  vec4_t splitFrustum[6];
1668  vec3_t farCorners[4];
1669  vec3_t nearCorners[4];
1670 
1671  GL_Viewport(x, y, w, h);
1672  GL_Scissor(x, y, w, h);
1673 
1674  GL_PushMatrix();
1675 
1676  SetMacrosAndSelectProgram(trProg.gl_genericShader);
1677 
1678  GLSL_SetUniform_ColorModulate(trProg.gl_genericShader, CGEN_VERTEX, AGEN_VERTEX);
1679  SetUniformVec4(UNIFORM_COLOR, colorBlack);
1680 
1681  GL_State(GLS_POLYMODE_LINE | GLS_DEPTHTEST_DISABLE);
1682  GL_Cull(CT_TWO_SIDED);
1683 
1684  // bind u_ColorMap
1685  SelectTexture(TEX_COLOR);
1686  GL_Bind(tr.whiteImage);
1687 
1688  SetUniformMatrix16(UNIFORM_COLORTEXTUREMATRIX, matrixIdentity);
1689  SetUniformMatrix16(UNIFORM_MODELVIEWPROJECTIONMATRIX, light->shadowMatrices[frustumIndex]);
1690 
1691  tess.multiDrawPrimitives = 0;
1692  tess.numIndexes = 0;
1693  tess.numVertexes = 0;
1694 
1695  for (j = 0; j < 6; j++)
1696  {
1697  VectorCopy(backEnd.viewParms.frustums[1 + frustumIndex][j].normal, splitFrustum[j]);
1698  splitFrustum[j][3] = backEnd.viewParms.frustums[1 + frustumIndex][j].dist;
1699  }
1700 
1701  // calculate split frustum corner points
1702  PlanesGetIntersectionPoint(splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_LEFT], splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_TOP], splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_NEAR], nearCorners[0]);
1703  PlanesGetIntersectionPoint(splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_RIGHT], splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_TOP], splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_NEAR], nearCorners[1]);
1704  PlanesGetIntersectionPoint(splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_RIGHT], splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_BOTTOM], splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_NEAR], nearCorners[2]);
1705  PlanesGetIntersectionPoint(splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_LEFT], splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_BOTTOM], splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_NEAR], nearCorners[3]);
1706 
1707  PlanesGetIntersectionPoint(splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_LEFT], splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_TOP], splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_FAR], farCorners[0]);
1708  PlanesGetIntersectionPoint(splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_RIGHT], splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_TOP], splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_FAR], farCorners[1]);
1709  PlanesGetIntersectionPoint(splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_RIGHT], splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_BOTTOM], splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_FAR], farCorners[2]);
1710  PlanesGetIntersectionPoint(splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_LEFT], splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_BOTTOM], splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_FAR], farCorners[3]);
1711 
1712  // draw outer surfaces
1713  for (j = 0; j < 4; j++)
1714  {
1715  Vector4Set(quadVerts[0], nearCorners[j][0], nearCorners[j][1], nearCorners[j][2], 1);
1716  Vector4Set(quadVerts[1], farCorners[j][0], farCorners[j][1], farCorners[j][2], 1);
1717  Vector4Set(quadVerts[2], farCorners[(j + 1) % 4][0], farCorners[(j + 1) % 4][1], farCorners[(j + 1) % 4][2], 1);
1718  Vector4Set(quadVerts[3], nearCorners[(j + 1) % 4][0], nearCorners[(j + 1) % 4][1], nearCorners[(j + 1) % 4][2], 1);
1719  Tess_AddQuadStamp2(quadVerts, colorCyan);
1720  }
1721 
1722  // draw far cap
1723  Vector4Set(quadVerts[0], farCorners[3][0], farCorners[3][1], farCorners[3][2], 1);
1724  Vector4Set(quadVerts[1], farCorners[2][0], farCorners[2][1], farCorners[2][2], 1);
1725  Vector4Set(quadVerts[2], farCorners[1][0], farCorners[1][1], farCorners[1][2], 1);
1726  Vector4Set(quadVerts[3], farCorners[0][0], farCorners[0][1], farCorners[0][2], 1);
1727  Tess_AddQuadStamp2(quadVerts, colorBlue);
1728 
1729  // draw near cap
1730  Vector4Set(quadVerts[0], nearCorners[0][0], nearCorners[0][1], nearCorners[0][2], 1);
1731  Vector4Set(quadVerts[1], nearCorners[1][0], nearCorners[1][1], nearCorners[1][2], 1);
1732  Vector4Set(quadVerts[2], nearCorners[2][0], nearCorners[2][1], nearCorners[2][2], 1);
1733  Vector4Set(quadVerts[3], nearCorners[3][0], nearCorners[3][1], nearCorners[3][2], 1);
1734  Tess_AddQuadStamp2(quadVerts, colorGreen);
1735 
1736  Tess_UpdateVBOs(tess.attribsSet); // set by Tess_AddQuadStamp2
1737  Tess_DrawElements();
1738 
1739  // draw light volume
1740  if (light->isStatic && light->frustumVBO && light->frustumIBO)
1741  {
1742  GLSL_SetUniform_ColorModulate(trProg.gl_genericShader, CGEN_CUSTOM_RGB, AGEN_CUSTOM);
1743  SetUniformVec4(UNIFORM_COLOR, colorYellow);
1744 
1745  R_BindVBO(light->frustumVBO);
1746  R_BindIBO(light->frustumIBO);
1747 
1748  GLSL_VertexAttribsState(ATTR_POSITION);
1749 
1750  tess.numVertexes = light->frustumVerts;
1751  tess.numIndexes = light->frustumIndexes;
1752 
1753  Tess_DrawElements();
1754  }
1755 
1756  tess.multiDrawPrimitives = 0;
1757  tess.numIndexes = 0;
1758  tess.numVertexes = 0;
1759 
1760  GL_PopMatrix();
1761 
1762  GL_Viewport(backEnd.viewParms.viewportX, backEnd.viewParms.viewportY,
1763  backEnd.viewParms.viewportWidth, backEnd.viewParms.viewportHeight);
1764 
1765  GL_Scissor(backEnd.viewParms.viewportX, backEnd.viewParms.viewportY,
1766  backEnd.viewParms.viewportWidth, backEnd.viewParms.viewportHeight);
1767  }
1768  }
1769 
1770  GL_PopMatrix();
1771  }
1772  }
1773  break;
1774  default:
1775  break;
1776  }
1777  }
1778  } // end if(iaCount == iaFirst)
1779 
1780  if (drawShadows)
1781  {
1782  if (entity->e.renderfx & (RF_NOSHADOW | RF_DEPTHHACK))
1783  {
1784  goto skipInteraction;
1785  }
1786 
1787  if (shader->isSky)
1788  {
1789  goto skipInteraction;
1790  }
1791 
1792  if (shader->sort > SS_OPAQUE)
1793  {
1794  goto skipInteraction;
1795  }
1796 
1797  if (shader->noShadows || light->l.noShadows || light->shadowLOD < 0)
1798  {
1799  goto skipInteraction;
1800  }
1801 
1802  /*
1803  if(light->l.inverseShadows && (entity == &tr.worldEntity))
1804  {
1805  // this light only casts shadows by its player and their items
1806  goto skipInteraction;
1807  }
1808  */
1809 
1810  if (ia->type == IA_LIGHTONLY)
1811  {
1812  goto skipInteraction;
1813  }
1814 
1815  if (light->l.rlType == RL_OMNI && !(ia->cubeSideBits & (1 << cubeSide)))
1816  {
1817  goto skipInteraction;
1818  }
1819 
1820  switch (light->l.rlType)
1821  {
1822  case RL_OMNI:
1823  case RL_PROJ:
1824  case RL_DIRECTIONAL:
1825  {
1826  if (light == oldLight && entity == oldEntity && (alphaTest ? shader == oldShader : alphaTest == oldAlphaTest) && deformType == oldDeformType)
1827  {
1828  Ren_LogComment("----- Batching Shadow Interaction: %i -----\n", iaCount);
1829 
1830  // fast path, same as previous
1831  rb_surfaceTable[*surface] (surface);
1832  goto nextInteraction;
1833  }
1834  else
1835  {
1836  if (oldLight)
1837  {
1838  // draw the contents of the last shader batch
1839  Tess_End();
1840  }
1841 
1842  Ren_LogComment("----- Beginning Shadow Interaction: %i -----\n", iaCount);
1843 
1844  // we don't need tangent space calculations here
1845  Tess_Begin(Tess_StageIteratorShadowFill, NULL, shader, light->shader, qtrue, qfalse, -1, 0);
1846  }
1847  break;
1848  }
1849  default:
1850  break;
1851  }
1852  }
1853  else
1854  {
1855  if (!shader->interactLight)
1856  {
1857  goto skipInteraction;
1858  }
1859 
1860  if (ia->type == IA_SHADOWONLY)
1861  {
1862  goto skipInteraction;
1863  }
1864 
1865  if (glConfig2.occlusionQueryBits && r_dynamicEntityOcclusionCulling->integer && !entity->occlusionQuerySamples)
1866  {
1867  goto skipInteraction;
1868  }
1869 
1870  if (light == oldLight && entity == oldEntity && shader == oldShader)
1871  {
1872  Ren_LogComment("----- Batching Light Interaction: %i -----\n", iaCount);
1873 
1874  // fast path, same as previous
1875  rb_surfaceTable[*surface] (surface);
1876  goto nextInteraction;
1877  }
1878  else
1879  {
1880  if (oldLight)
1881  {
1882  // draw the contents of the last shader batch
1883  Tess_End();
1884  }
1885 
1886  Ren_LogComment("----- Beginning Light Interaction: %i -----\n", iaCount);
1887 
1888  // begin a new batch
1889  Tess_Begin(Tess_StageIteratorLighting, NULL, shader, light->shader, light->l.inverseShadows, qfalse, -1, 0);
1890  }
1891  }
1892 
1893  // change the modelview matrix if needed
1894  if (entity != oldEntity)
1895  {
1896  depthRange = qfalse;
1897 
1898  if (entity != &tr.worldEntity)
1899  {
1900  // set up the transformation matrix
1901  if (drawShadows)
1902  {
1903  R_RotateEntityForLight(entity, light, &backEnd.orientation);
1904  }
1905  else
1906  {
1907  R_RotateEntityForViewParms(entity, &backEnd.viewParms, &backEnd.orientation);
1908  }
1909 
1910  if (entity->e.renderfx & RF_DEPTHHACK)
1911  {
1912  // hack the depth range to prevent view model from poking into walls
1913  depthRange = qtrue;
1914  }
1915  }
1916  else
1917  {
1918  // set up the transformation matrix
1919  if (drawShadows)
1920  {
1921  Com_Memset(&backEnd.orientation, 0, sizeof(backEnd.orientation));
1922 
1923  backEnd.orientation.axis[0][0] = 1;
1924  backEnd.orientation.axis[1][1] = 1;
1925  backEnd.orientation.axis[2][2] = 1;
1926  VectorCopy(light->l.origin, backEnd.orientation.viewOrigin);
1927 
1928  mat4_ident(backEnd.orientation.transformMatrix);
1929  //MatrixAffineInverse(backEnd.orientation.transformMatrix, backEnd.orientation.viewMatrix);
1930  mat4_mult(light->viewMatrix, backEnd.orientation.transformMatrix, backEnd.orientation.viewMatrix);
1931  mat4_copy(backEnd.orientation.viewMatrix, backEnd.orientation.modelViewMatrix);
1932  }
1933  else
1934  {
1935  // transform by the camera placement
1936  backEnd.orientation = backEnd.viewParms.world;
1937  }
1938  }
1939 
1940  GL_LoadModelViewMatrix(backEnd.orientation.modelViewMatrix);
1941 
1942  // change depthrange if needed
1943  if (oldDepthRange != depthRange)
1944  {
1945  if (depthRange)
1946  {
1947  glDepthRange(0, 0.3);
1948  }
1949  else
1950  {
1951  glDepthRange(0, 1);
1952  }
1953  oldDepthRange = depthRange;
1954  }
1955  }
1956 
1957  // change the attenuation matrix if needed
1958  if (light != oldLight || entity != oldEntity)
1959  {
1960  // transform light origin into model space for u_LightOrigin parameter
1961  if (entity != &tr.worldEntity)
1962  {
1963  VectorSubtract(light->origin, backEnd.orientation.origin, tmp);
1964  light->transformed[0] = DotProduct(tmp, backEnd.orientation.axis[0]);
1965  light->transformed[1] = DotProduct(tmp, backEnd.orientation.axis[1]);
1966  light->transformed[2] = DotProduct(tmp, backEnd.orientation.axis[2]);
1967  }
1968  else
1969  {
1970  VectorCopy(light->origin, light->transformed);
1971  }
1972 
1973  mat4_mult(light->viewMatrix, backEnd.orientation.transformMatrix, modelToLight);
1974 
1975  // build the attenuation matrix using the entity transform
1976  switch (light->l.rlType)
1977  {
1978  case RL_OMNI:
1979  {
1980  mat4_reset_translate(light->attenuationMatrix, 0.5, 0.5, 0.5); // bias
1981  MatrixMultiplyScale(light->attenuationMatrix, 0.5, 0.5, 0.5); // scale
1982  mat4_mult_self(light->attenuationMatrix, light->projectionMatrix);
1983  mat4_mult_self(light->attenuationMatrix, modelToLight);
1984 
1985  mat4_copy(light->attenuationMatrix, light->shadowMatrices[0]);
1986  break;
1987  }
1988  case RL_PROJ:
1989  {
1990  mat4_reset_translate(light->attenuationMatrix, 0.5, 0.5, 0.0); // bias
1991  MatrixMultiplyScale(light->attenuationMatrix, 0.5, 0.5, 1.0 / Q_min(light->falloffLength, 1.0)); // scale
1992  mat4_mult_self(light->attenuationMatrix, light->projectionMatrix);
1993  mat4_mult_self(light->attenuationMatrix, modelToLight);
1994 
1995  mat4_copy(light->attenuationMatrix, light->shadowMatrices[0]);
1996  break;
1997  }
1998  case RL_DIRECTIONAL:
1999  {
2000  mat4_reset_translate(light->attenuationMatrix, 0.5, 0.5, 0.5); // bias
2001  MatrixMultiplyScale(light->attenuationMatrix, 0.5, 0.5, 0.5); // scale
2002  mat4_mult_self(light->attenuationMatrix, light->projectionMatrix);
2003  mat4_mult_self(light->attenuationMatrix, modelToLight);
2004  break;
2005  }
2006  default:
2007  break;
2008  }
2009  }
2010 
2011  if (drawShadows)
2012  {
2013  switch (light->l.rlType)
2014  {
2015  case RL_OMNI:
2016  case RL_PROJ:
2017  case RL_DIRECTIONAL:
2018  {
2019  // add the triangles for this surface
2020  rb_surfaceTable[*surface] (surface);
2021  break;
2022  }
2023  default:
2024  break;
2025  }
2026  }
2027  else
2028  {
2029  // add the triangles for this surface
2030  rb_surfaceTable[*surface] (surface);
2031  }
2032 
2033 nextInteraction:
2034 
2035  // remember values
2036  oldLight = light;
2037  oldEntity = entity;
2038  oldShader = shader;
2039  oldAlphaTest = alphaTest;
2040  oldDeformType = deformType;
2041 
2042 skipInteraction:
2043  if (!ia->next)
2044  {
2045  // if ia->next does not point to any other interaction then
2046  // this is the last interaction of the current light
2047 
2048  Ren_LogComment("----- Last Interaction: %i -----\n", iaCount);
2049 
2050  // draw the contents of the last shader batch
2051  Tess_End();
2052 
2053  if (drawShadows)
2054  {
2055  switch (light->l.rlType)
2056  {
2057  case RL_OMNI:
2058  {
2059  if (cubeSide == 5)
2060  {
2061  cubeSide = 0;
2062  drawShadows = qfalse;
2063  }
2064  else
2065  {
2066  cubeSide++;
2067  }
2068 
2069  // jump back to first interaction of this light
2070  ia = &backEnd.viewParms.interactions[iaFirst];
2071  iaCount = iaFirst;
2072  break;
2073  }
2074  case RL_PROJ:
2075  {
2076  // jump back to first interaction of this light and start lighting
2077  ia = &backEnd.viewParms.interactions[iaFirst];
2078  iaCount = iaFirst;
2079  drawShadows = qfalse;
2080  break;
2081  }
2082  case RL_DIRECTIONAL:
2083  {
2084  // set shadow matrix including scale + offset
2085  mat4_copy(bias, light->shadowMatricesBiased[splitFrustumIndex]);
2086  mat4_mult_self(light->shadowMatricesBiased[splitFrustumIndex], light->projectionMatrix);
2087  mat4_mult_self(light->shadowMatricesBiased[splitFrustumIndex], light->viewMatrix);
2088 
2089  mat4_mult(light->projectionMatrix, light->viewMatrix, light->shadowMatrices[splitFrustumIndex]);
2090 
2091  if (r_parallelShadowSplits->integer)
2092  {
2093  if (splitFrustumIndex == r_parallelShadowSplits->integer)
2094  {
2095  splitFrustumIndex = 0;
2096  drawShadows = qfalse;
2097  }
2098  else
2099  {
2100  splitFrustumIndex++;
2101  }
2102 
2103  // jump back to first interaction of this light
2104  ia = &backEnd.viewParms.interactions[iaFirst];
2105  iaCount = iaFirst;
2106  }
2107  else
2108  {
2109  // jump back to first interaction of this light and start lighting
2110  ia = &backEnd.viewParms.interactions[iaFirst];
2111  iaCount = iaFirst;
2112  drawShadows = qfalse;
2113  }
2114  break;
2115  }
2116  default:
2117  break;
2118  }
2119  }
2120  else
2121  {
2122  // draw the light volume if needed
2123  if (light->shader->volumetricLight)
2124  {
2125  Render_lightVolume(ia);
2126  }
2127 
2128  if (iaCount < (backEnd.viewParms.numInteractions - 1))
2129  {
2130  // jump to next interaction and start shadowing
2131  ia++;
2132  iaCount++;
2133  iaFirst = iaCount;
2134  drawShadows = qtrue;
2135  }
2136  else
2137  {
2138  // increase last time to leave for loop
2139  iaCount++;
2140  }
2141  }
2142 
2143  // force updates
2144  oldLight = NULL;
2145  oldEntity = NULL;
2146  oldShader = NULL;
2147  }
2148  else
2149  {
2150  // just continue
2151  ia = ia->next;
2152  iaCount++;
2153  }
2154  }
2155 
2156  // go back to the world modelview matrix
2157  GL_LoadModelViewMatrix(backEnd.viewParms.world.modelViewMatrix);
2158  if (depthRange)
2159  {
2160  glDepthRange(0, 1);
2161  }
2162 
2163  // reset scissor clamping
2164  GL_Scissor(backEnd.viewParms.viewportX, backEnd.viewParms.viewportY,
2165  backEnd.viewParms.viewportWidth, backEnd.viewParms.viewportHeight);
2166 
2167  // reset clear color
2168  GL_ClearColor(GLCOLOR_BLACK);
2169 
2170  GL_CheckErrors();
2171 
2172  R2_TIMING(RSPEEDS_SHADING_TIMES)
2173  {
2174  backEnd.pc.c_forwardLightingTime = ri.Milliseconds() - startTime;
2175  }
2176 }
2177 
2181 void RB_RenderScreenSpaceAmbientOcclusion()
2182 {
2183  Ren_LogComment("--- RB_RenderScreenSpaceAmbientOcclusion ---\n");
2184 
2185  if (!r_screenSpaceAmbientOcclusion->integer)
2186  {
2187  return;
2188  }
2189 
2190  if (backEnd.refdef.rdflags & RDF_NOWORLDMODEL)
2191  {
2192  return;
2193  }
2194 
2195  // enable shader, set arrays
2196  SetMacrosAndSelectProgram(trProg.gl_ssao);
2197 
2198  GL_State(GLS_DEPTHTEST_DISABLE); // | GLS_DEPTHMASK_TRUE);
2199  GL_Cull(CT_TWO_SIDED);
2200 
2201  glVertexAttrib4fv(ATTR_INDEX_COLOR, colorWhite);
2202 
2203  // capture current color buffer for u_CurrentMap
2204  SelectTexture(TEX_CURRENT);
2205  ImageCopyBackBuffer(tr.currentRenderImage);
2206 
2207  // bind u_DepthMap
2208  SelectTexture(TEX_DEPTH);
2209  ImageCopyBackBuffer(tr.depthRenderImage);
2210 
2211  // set 2D virtual screen size
2212  GL_PushMatrix();
2213  RB_SetViewMVPM();
2214 
2215  SetUniformMatrix16(UNIFORM_MODELVIEWPROJECTIONMATRIX, GLSTACK_MVPM);
2216 
2217  // draw viewport
2218  DRAWVIEWQUAD();
2219 
2220  // go back to 3D
2221  GL_PopMatrix();
2222 
2223  GL_CheckErrors();
2224 }
2225 
2229 void RB_RenderDepthOfField()
2230 {
2231  Ren_LogComment("--- RB_RenderDepthOfField ---\n");
2232 
2233  if (!r_depthOfField->integer)
2234  {
2235  return;
2236  }
2237 
2238  if (backEnd.refdef.rdflags & RDF_NOWORLDMODEL)
2239  {
2240  return;
2241  }
2242 
2243  // enable shader, set arrays
2244  SetMacrosAndSelectProgram(trProg.gl_depthOfField);
2245 
2246  GL_State(GLS_DEPTHTEST_DISABLE); // | GLS_DEPTHMASK_TRUE);
2247  GL_Cull(CT_TWO_SIDED);
2248 
2249  glVertexAttrib4fv(ATTR_INDEX_COLOR, colorWhite);
2250 
2251  // capture current color buffer for u_CurrentMap
2252  SelectTexture(TEX_CURRENT);
2253  if (r_hdrRendering->integer && glConfig2.framebufferObjectAvailable && glConfig2.textureFloatAvailable)
2254  {
2255  GL_Bind(tr.deferredRenderFBOImage);
2256  }
2257  else
2258  {
2259  ImageCopyBackBuffer(tr.currentRenderImage);
2260  }
2261 
2262  // bind u_DepthMap
2263  SelectTexture(TEX_DEPTH);
2264  if (r_hdrRendering->integer && glConfig2.framebufferObjectAvailable && glConfig2.textureFloatAvailable)
2265  {
2266  GL_Bind(tr.depthRenderImage);
2267  }
2268  else
2269  {
2270  // depth texture is not bound to a FBO
2271  ImageCopyBackBuffer(tr.depthRenderImage);
2272  }
2273 
2274  // set 2D virtual screen size
2275  GL_PushMatrix();
2276  RB_SetViewMVPM();
2277 
2278  SetUniformMatrix16(UNIFORM_MODELVIEWPROJECTIONMATRIX, GLSTACK_MVPM);
2279 
2280  // draw viewport
2281  DRAWVIEWQUAD();
2282 
2283  // go back to 3D
2284  GL_PopMatrix();
2285 
2286  GL_CheckErrors();
2287 }
2288 
2292 void RB_RenderGlobalFog()
2293 {
2294  vec3_t local;
2295  vec4_t fogDistanceVector;
2296 
2297  Ren_LogComment("--- RB_RenderGlobalFog ---\n");
2298 
2299  if (r_noFog->integer)
2300  {
2301  return;
2302  }
2303 
2304  // no fog pass in snooper
2305  if ((tr.refdef.rdflags & RDF_SNOOPERVIEW) || tess.surfaceShader->noFog)
2306  {
2307  return;
2308  }
2309 
2310  if (backEnd.refdef.rdflags & RDF_NOWORLDMODEL)
2311  {
2312  return;
2313  }
2314 
2315  if (!tr.world || tr.world->globalFog < 0)
2316  {
2317  return;
2318  }
2319 
2320  GL_Cull(CT_TWO_SIDED);
2321 
2322  // go back to the world modelview matrix
2323  backEnd.orientation = backEnd.viewParms.world;
2324 
2325  SetMacrosAndSelectProgram(trProg.gl_fogGlobalShader);
2326  SetUniformVec3(UNIFORM_VIEWORIGIN, backEnd.viewParms.orientation.origin); // world space
2327 
2328  {
2329  fog_t *fog = &tr.world->fogs[tr.world->globalFog];
2330 
2331  Ren_LogComment("--- RB_RenderGlobalFog( fogNum = %i, originalBrushNumber = %i ) ---\n", tr.world->globalFog, fog->originalBrushNumber);
2332 
2333  GL_State(GLS_DEPTHTEST_DISABLE | GLS_SRCBLEND_SRC_ALPHA | GLS_DSTBLEND_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA);
2334 
2335  // all fogging distance is based on world Z units
2336  VectorSubtract(backEnd.orientation.origin, backEnd.viewParms.orientation.origin, local);
2337  fogDistanceVector[0] = -backEnd.orientation.modelViewMatrix[2];
2338  fogDistanceVector[1] = -backEnd.orientation.modelViewMatrix[6];
2339  fogDistanceVector[2] = -backEnd.orientation.modelViewMatrix[10];
2340  fogDistanceVector[3] = DotProduct(local, backEnd.viewParms.orientation.axis[0]);
2341 
2342  // scale the fog vectors based on the fog's thickness
2343  fogDistanceVector[0] *= fog->tcScale;
2344  fogDistanceVector[1] *= fog->tcScale;
2345  fogDistanceVector[2] *= fog->tcScale;
2346  fogDistanceVector[3] *= fog->tcScale;
2347 
2348  SetUniformVec4(UNIFORM_FOGDISTANCEVECTOR, fogDistanceVector);
2349  SetUniformVec4(UNIFORM_COLOR, fog->color);
2350 
2351  //if there is a density set
2352  if (fog->fogParms.density > 0)
2353  {
2354  SetUniformFloat(UNIFORM_FOGDENSITY, fog->fogParms.density);
2355  }
2356  else// use the depthforOpaque wich is set in shader fogparms for end of fog aka where fog is 1.0
2357  {
2358  SetUniformFloat(UNIFORM_FOGDENSITY, fog->fogParms.depthForOpaque);
2359  }
2360  // FIXME: fog->fogParms.density?!.. density dont seem to get any value?!
2361  }
2362 
2363  SetUniformMatrix16(UNIFORM_VIEWMATRIX, backEnd.viewParms.world.viewMatrix);
2364  SetUniformMatrix16(UNIFORM_UNPROJECTMATRIX, backEnd.viewParms.unprojectionMatrix);
2365 
2366  // bind u_ColorMap
2367  SelectTexture(TEX_COLOR);
2368  GL_Bind(tr.fogImage);
2369 
2370  // bind u_DepthMap
2371  SelectTexture(TEX_DEPTH);
2372  if (HDR_ENABLED())
2373  {
2374  GL_Bind(tr.depthRenderImage);
2375  }
2376  else
2377  {
2378  // depth texture is not bound to a FBO
2379  ImageCopyBackBuffer(tr.depthRenderImage);
2380  }
2381 
2382  // set 2D virtual screen size
2383  GL_PushMatrix();
2384  RB_SetViewMVPM();
2385 
2386  SetUniformMatrix16(UNIFORM_MODELVIEWPROJECTIONMATRIX, GLSTACK_MVPM);
2387 
2388  // draw viewport
2389  DRAWVIEWQUAD();
2390 
2391  // go back to 3D
2392  GL_PopMatrix();
2393 
2394  GL_CheckErrors();
2395 }
2396 
2400 void RB_RenderBloom()
2401 {
2402  int i, j;
2403  mat4_t ortho;
2404 
2405  Ren_LogComment("--- RB_RenderBloom ---\n");
2406 
2407  // hdr requires bloom renderer
2408  if (!r_bloom->integer && !HDR_ENABLED())
2409  {
2410  return;
2411  }
2412 
2413  if ((backEnd.refdef.rdflags & (RDF_NOWORLDMODEL | RDF_NOBLOOM)) || backEnd.viewParms.isPortal || !glConfig2.framebufferObjectAvailable)
2414  {
2415  return;
2416  }
2417 
2418  // set 2D virtual screen size
2419  GL_PushMatrix();
2420  RB_SetViewMVPM();
2421 
2422  // FIXME
2423  //if(glConfig.hardwareType != GLHW_ATI && glConfig.hardwareType != GLHW_ATI_DX10)
2424  {
2425  GL_State(GLS_DEPTHTEST_DISABLE);
2426  GL_Cull(CT_TWO_SIDED);
2427 
2428  GL_PushMatrix();
2429  GL_LoadModelViewMatrix(matrixIdentity);
2430 
2431 #if 1
2432  MatrixOrthogonalProjection(ortho, 0, tr.contrastRenderFBO->width, 0, tr.contrastRenderFBO->height, -99999, 99999);
2433  GL_LoadProjectionMatrix(ortho);
2434 #endif
2435 
2436  if (HDR_ENABLED())
2437  {
2438  SetMacrosAndSelectProgram(trProg.gl_toneMappingShader, BRIGHTPASS_FILTER, qtrue);
2439 
2440  SetUniformFloat(UNIFORM_HDRKEY, backEnd.hdrKey);
2441  SetUniformFloat(UNIFORM_HDRAVERAGELUMINANCE, backEnd.hdrAverageLuminance);
2442  SetUniformFloat(UNIFORM_HDRMAXLUMINANCE, backEnd.hdrMaxLuminance);
2443  SetUniformMatrix16(UNIFORM_MODELVIEWPROJECTIONMATRIX, GLSTACK_MVPM);
2444 
2445  SelectTexture(TEX_CURRENT);
2446  GL_Bind(tr.downScaleFBOImage_quarter);
2447  }
2448  else
2449  {
2450  // render contrast downscaled to 1/4th of the screen
2451  SetMacrosAndSelectProgram(trProg.gl_contrastShader);
2452  SetUniformMatrix16(UNIFORM_MODELVIEWPROJECTIONMATRIX, GLSTACK_MVPM);
2453 
2454  SelectTexture(TEX_COLOR);
2455  //GL_Bind(tr.downScaleFBOImage_quarter);
2456  ImageCopyBackBuffer(tr.currentRenderImage);
2457  }
2458 
2459  GL_PopMatrix(); // special 1/4th of the screen contrastRenderFBO ortho
2460 
2461  R_BindFBO(tr.contrastRenderFBO);
2462  GL_ClearColor(GLCOLOR_BLACK);
2463  GL_Clear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT);
2464 
2465  // draw viewport
2466  DRAWVIEWQUAD();
2467 
2468  // render bloom in multiple passes
2469  SetMacrosAndSelectProgram(trProg.gl_bloomShader);
2470  SetUniformMatrix16(UNIFORM_MODELVIEWPROJECTIONMATRIX, GLSTACK_MVPM);
2471  SetUniformFloat(UNIFORM_BLURMAGNITUDE, r_bloomBlur->value);
2472 
2473  for (i = 0; i < 2; i++)
2474  {
2475  for (j = 0; j < r_bloomPasses->integer; j++)
2476  {
2477  R_BindFBO(tr.bloomRenderFBO[(j + 1) % 2]);
2478 
2479  GL_ClearColor(GLCOLOR_BLACK);
2480  GL_Clear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT);
2481 
2482  GL_State(GLS_DEPTHTEST_DISABLE);
2483 
2484  GL_PushMatrix();
2485  GL_LoadModelViewMatrix(matrixIdentity);
2486 
2487  MatrixOrthogonalProjection(ortho, 0, tr.bloomRenderFBO[0]->width, 0, tr.bloomRenderFBO[0]->height, -99999, 99999);
2488  GL_LoadProjectionMatrix(ortho);
2489 
2490  if (i == 0)
2491  {
2492  SetMacrosAndSelectProgram(trProg.gl_blurXShader);
2493 
2494  }
2495  else
2496  {
2497  SetMacrosAndSelectProgram(trProg.gl_blurYShader);
2498  }
2499 
2500  SelectTexture(TEX_COLOR);
2501  if (j == 0)
2502  {
2503  GL_Bind(tr.contrastRenderFBOImage);
2504  }
2505  else
2506  {
2507  GL_Bind(tr.bloomRenderFBOImage[j % 2]);
2508  }
2509 
2510  SetUniformFloat(UNIFORM_DEFORMMAGNITUDE, r_bloomBlur->value);
2511  SetUniformMatrix16(UNIFORM_MODELVIEWPROJECTIONMATRIX, GLSTACK_MVPM);
2512 
2513  GL_PopMatrix();
2514 
2515  DRAWVIEWQUAD();
2516  }
2517 
2518  // add offscreen processed bloom to screen
2519  if (HDR_ENABLED())
2520  {
2521  R_BindFBO(tr.deferredRenderFBO);
2522 
2523  SetMacrosAndSelectProgram(trProg.gl_screenShader);
2524  GL_State(GLS_DEPTHTEST_DISABLE | GLS_SRCBLEND_ONE | GLS_DSTBLEND_ONE);
2525  glVertexAttrib4fv(ATTR_INDEX_COLOR, colorWhite);
2526 
2527  SetUniformMatrix16(UNIFORM_MODELVIEWPROJECTIONMATRIX, GLSTACK_MVPM);
2528 
2529  SelectTexture(TEX_CURRENT);
2530  GL_Bind(tr.bloomRenderFBOImage[j % 2]);
2531  //GL_Bind(tr.contrastRenderFBOImage);
2532  }
2533  else
2534  {
2535  R_BindNullFBO();
2536 
2537  SetMacrosAndSelectProgram(trProg.gl_screenShader);
2538  GL_State(GLS_DEPTHTEST_DISABLE | GLS_SRCBLEND_ONE | GLS_DSTBLEND_ONE);
2539  glVertexAttrib4fv(ATTR_INDEX_COLOR, colorWhite);
2540 
2541  SetUniformMatrix16(UNIFORM_MODELVIEWPROJECTIONMATRIX, GLSTACK_MVPM);
2542 
2543  SelectTexture(TEX_CURRENT);
2544  GL_Bind(tr.bloomRenderFBOImage[j % 2]);
2545  //GL_Bind(tr.contrastRenderFBOImage);
2546  }
2547 
2548  DRAWVIEWQUAD();
2549  }
2550  }
2551 
2552  // go back to 3D
2553  GL_PopMatrix();
2554 
2555  GL_CheckErrors();
2556 }
2557 
2561 void RB_RenderRotoscope(void)
2562 {
2563  Ren_LogComment("--- RB_RenderRotoscope ---\n");
2564 
2565  if (!r_rotoscope->integer)
2566  {
2567  return;
2568  }
2569 
2570  if ((backEnd.refdef.rdflags & RDF_NOWORLDMODEL) || backEnd.viewParms.isPortal)
2571  {
2572  return;
2573  }
2574 
2575  // set 2D virtual screen size
2576  GL_PushMatrix();
2577  RB_SetViewMVPM();
2578 
2579  GL_State(GLS_DEPTHTEST_DISABLE);
2580  GL_Cull(CT_TWO_SIDED);
2581 
2582  // enable shader, set arrays
2583  SetMacrosAndSelectProgram(trProg.gl_rotoscopeShader);
2584  SetUniformMatrix16(UNIFORM_MODELVIEWPROJECTIONMATRIX, GLSTACK_MVPM);
2585  SetUniformFloat(UNIFORM_BLURMAGNITUDE, r_rotoscopeBlur->value);
2586 
2587  SelectTexture(TEX_COLOR);
2588  ImageCopyBackBuffer(tr.currentRenderImage);
2589 
2590  // draw viewport
2591  DRAWVIEWQUAD();
2592 
2593  // go back to 3D
2594  GL_PopMatrix();
2595 
2596  GL_CheckErrors();
2597 }
2598 
2602 void RB_CameraPostFX(void)
2603 {
2604  mat4_t grain;
2605 
2606  Ren_LogComment("--- RB_CameraPostFX ---\n");
2607 
2608  if (!r_cameraPostFX->integer)
2609  {
2610  return;
2611  }
2612 
2613  if ((backEnd.refdef.rdflags & RDF_NOWORLDMODEL) || backEnd.viewParms.isPortal)
2614  {
2615  return;
2616  }
2617 
2618  // set 2D virtual screen size
2619  GL_PushMatrix();
2620  RB_SetViewMVPM();
2621 
2622  GL_State(GLS_DEPTHTEST_DISABLE);
2623  GL_Cull(CT_TWO_SIDED);
2624 
2625  // enable shader, set arrays
2626  SetMacrosAndSelectProgram(trProg.gl_cameraEffectsShader);
2627  SetUniformMatrix16(UNIFORM_MODELVIEWPROJECTIONMATRIX, GLSTACK_MVPM);
2628  //glUniform1f(tr.cameraEffectsShader.u_BlurMagnitude, r_bloomBlur->value);
2629 
2630  mat4_ident(grain);
2631 
2632  MatrixMultiplyScale(grain, r_cameraFilmGrainScale->value, r_cameraFilmGrainScale->value, 0);
2633  MatrixMultiplyTranslation(grain, tess.shaderTime * 10, backEnd.refdef.floatTime * 10, 0);
2634 
2635  MatrixMultiplyTranslation(grain, 0.5, 0.5, 0.0);
2636  MatrixMultiplyZRotation(grain, tess.shaderTime * (random() * 7));
2637  MatrixMultiplyTranslation(grain, -0.5, -0.5, 0.0);
2638 
2639  SetUniformMatrix16(UNIFORM_COLORTEXTUREMATRIX, grain);
2640 
2641  // bind u_CurrentMap
2642  SelectTexture(TEX_CURRENT);
2643  ImageCopyBackBuffer(tr.occlusionRenderFBOImage);
2644 
2645  // bind u_GrainMap
2646  SelectTexture(TEX_GRAIN);
2647  if (tr.grainImage)
2648  {
2649  GL_Bind(tr.grainImage);
2650  }
2651  else
2652  {
2653  GL_Bind(tr.defaultImage);
2654  }
2655 
2656  // bind u_VignetteMap
2657  SelectTexture(TEX_VIGNETTE);
2658  if (r_cameraVignette->integer)
2659  {
2660  GL_Bind(tr.vignetteImage);
2661  }
2662  else
2663  {
2664  GL_Bind(tr.whiteImage);
2665  }
2666 
2667  // draw viewport
2668  DRAWVIEWQUAD();
2669 
2670  // go back to 3D
2671  GL_PopMatrix();
2672 
2673  GL_CheckErrors();
2674 }
2675 
2679 static void RB_CalculateAdaptation()
2680 {
2681  int i;
2682  static float image[64 * 64 * 4];
2683  float curTime = ri.Milliseconds() / 1000.0f;
2684  float deltaTime;
2685  float luminance;
2686  float avgLuminance;
2687  float maxLuminance = 0.0f;
2688  double sum = 0.0;
2689  const vec3_t LUMINANCE_VECTOR = { 0.2125f, 0.7154f, 0.0721f };
2690  vec4_t color;
2691  float newAdaptation;
2692  float newMaximum;
2693 
2694  // calculate the average scene luminance
2695  R_BindFBO(tr.downScaleFBO_64x64);
2696 
2697  // read back the contents
2698  //glFinish();
2699  glReadPixels(0, 0, 64, 64, GL_RGBA, GL_FLOAT, image);
2700 
2701  for (i = 0; i < (64 * 64 * 4); i += 4)
2702  {
2703  color[0] = image[i + 0];
2704  color[1] = image[i + 1];
2705  color[2] = image[i + 2];
2706  color[3] = image[i + 3];
2707 
2708  luminance = DotProduct(color, LUMINANCE_VECTOR) + 0.0001f;
2709  if (luminance > maxLuminance)
2710  {
2711  maxLuminance = luminance;
2712  }
2713 
2714  sum += log(luminance);
2715  }
2716  sum /= (64.0 * 64.0);
2717  avgLuminance = exp(sum);
2718 
2719  // the user's adapted luminance level is simulated by closing the gap between
2720  // adapted luminance and current luminance by 2% every frame, based on a
2721  // 30 fps rate. This is not an accurate model of human adaptation, which can
2722  // take longer than half an hour.
2723  if (backEnd.hdrTime > curTime)
2724  {
2725  backEnd.hdrTime = curTime;
2726  }
2727 
2728  deltaTime = curTime - backEnd.hdrTime;
2729 
2730  //if(r_hdrMaxLuminance->value)
2731  {
2732  Q_clamp(backEnd.hdrAverageLuminance, r_hdrMinLuminance->value, r_hdrMaxLuminance->value);
2733  Q_clamp(avgLuminance, r_hdrMinLuminance->value, r_hdrMaxLuminance->value);
2734 
2735  Q_clamp(backEnd.hdrMaxLuminance, r_hdrMinLuminance->value, r_hdrMaxLuminance->value);
2736  Q_clamp(maxLuminance, r_hdrMinLuminance->value, r_hdrMaxLuminance->value);
2737  }
2738 
2739  newAdaptation = backEnd.hdrAverageLuminance + (avgLuminance - backEnd.hdrAverageLuminance) * (1.0f - powf(0.98f, 30.0f * deltaTime));
