2740  newMaximum = backEnd.hdrMaxLuminance + (maxLuminance - backEnd.hdrMaxLuminance) * (1.0f - powf(0.98f, 30.0f * deltaTime));
2741 
2742  if (!Q_isnan(newAdaptation) && !Q_isnan(newMaximum))
2743  {
2744 #if 1
2745  backEnd.hdrAverageLuminance = newAdaptation;
2746  backEnd.hdrMaxLuminance = newMaximum;
2747 #else
2748  backEnd.hdrAverageLuminance = avgLuminance;
2749  backEnd.hdrMaxLuminance = maxLuminance;
2750 #endif
2751  }
2752 
2753  backEnd.hdrTime = curTime;
2754 
2755  // calculate HDR image key
2756  if (r_hdrKey->value <= 0)
2757  {
2758  // calculation from: Perceptual Effects in Real-time Tone Mapping - Krawczyk et al.
2759  backEnd.hdrKey = 1.03f - 2.0f / (2.0f + log10f(backEnd.hdrAverageLuminance + 1.0f));
2760  }
2761  else
2762  {
2763  backEnd.hdrKey = r_hdrKey->value;
2764  }
2765 
2766  if (r_hdrDebug->integer)
2767  {
2768  Ren_Print("HDR luminance avg = %f, max = %f, key = %f\n", backEnd.hdrAverageLuminance, backEnd.hdrMaxLuminance, backEnd.hdrKey);
2769  }
2770 
2771  GL_CheckErrors();
2772 }
2773 
2774 // ================================================================================================
2775 // LIGHTS OCCLUSION CULLING
2776 // ================================================================================================
2777 
2782 static void RenderLightOcclusionVolume(trRefLight_t *light)
2783 {
2784  int j;
2785  vec4_t quadVerts[4];
2786 
2787  GL_CheckErrors();
2788 
2789 #if 1
2790  if (light->isStatic && light->frustumVBO && light->frustumIBO)
2791  {
2792  // render in world space
2793  backEnd.orientation = backEnd.viewParms.world;
2794  GL_LoadModelViewMatrix(backEnd.viewParms.world.modelViewMatrix);
2795  SetUniformMatrix16(UNIFORM_MODELVIEWPROJECTIONMATRIX, GLSTACK_MVPM);
2796 
2797  R_BindVBO(light->frustumVBO);
2798  R_BindIBO(light->frustumIBO);
2799 
2800  GLSL_VertexAttribsState(ATTR_POSITION);
2801 
2802  tess.numVertexes = light->frustumVerts;
2803  tess.numIndexes = light->frustumIndexes;
2804 
2805  Tess_DrawElements();
2806  }
2807  else
2808 #endif
2809  {
2810  // render in light space
2811  R_RotateLightForViewParms(light, &backEnd.viewParms, &backEnd.orientation);
2812  GL_LoadModelViewMatrix(backEnd.orientation.modelViewMatrix);
2813  SetUniformMatrix16(UNIFORM_MODELVIEWPROJECTIONMATRIX, GLSTACK_MVPM);
2814 
2815  tess.multiDrawPrimitives = 0;
2816  tess.numIndexes = 0;
2817  tess.numVertexes = 0;
2818 
2819  switch (light->l.rlType)
2820  {
2821  case RL_OMNI:
2822  {
2823  Tess_AddCube(vec3_origin, light->localBounds[0], light->localBounds[1], colorWhite);
2824 
2825  Tess_UpdateVBOs(tess.attribsSet); // set by Tess_AddCube
2826  Tess_DrawElements();
2827  break;
2828  }
2829  case RL_PROJ:
2830  {
2831  vec3_t farCorners[4];
2832  vec4_t *frustum = light->localFrustum;
2833 
2834  PlanesGetIntersectionPoint(frustum[FRUSTUM_LEFT], frustum[FRUSTUM_TOP], frustum[FRUSTUM_FAR], farCorners[0]);
2835  PlanesGetIntersectionPoint(frustum[FRUSTUM_RIGHT], frustum[FRUSTUM_TOP], frustum[FRUSTUM_FAR], farCorners[1]);
2836  PlanesGetIntersectionPoint(frustum[FRUSTUM_RIGHT], frustum[FRUSTUM_BOTTOM], frustum[FRUSTUM_FAR], farCorners[2]);
2837  PlanesGetIntersectionPoint(frustum[FRUSTUM_LEFT], frustum[FRUSTUM_BOTTOM], frustum[FRUSTUM_FAR], farCorners[3]);
2838 
2839  tess.multiDrawPrimitives = 0;
2840  tess.numVertexes = 0;
2841  tess.numIndexes = 0;
2842 
2843  if (!VectorCompare(light->l.projStart, vec3_origin))
2844  {
2845  vec3_t nearCorners[4];
2846 
2847  // calculate the vertices defining the top area
2848  PlanesGetIntersectionPoint(frustum[FRUSTUM_LEFT], frustum[FRUSTUM_TOP], frustum[FRUSTUM_NEAR], nearCorners[0]);
2849  PlanesGetIntersectionPoint(frustum[FRUSTUM_RIGHT], frustum[FRUSTUM_TOP], frustum[FRUSTUM_NEAR], nearCorners[1]);
2850  PlanesGetIntersectionPoint(frustum[FRUSTUM_RIGHT], frustum[FRUSTUM_BOTTOM], frustum[FRUSTUM_NEAR], nearCorners[2]);
2851  PlanesGetIntersectionPoint(frustum[FRUSTUM_LEFT], frustum[FRUSTUM_BOTTOM], frustum[FRUSTUM_NEAR], nearCorners[3]);
2852 
2853  // draw outer surfaces
2854  for (j = 0; j < 4; j++)
2855  {
2856  Vector4Set(quadVerts[0], nearCorners[j][0], nearCorners[j][1], nearCorners[j][2], 1);
2857  Vector4Set(quadVerts[1], farCorners[j][0], farCorners[j][1], farCorners[j][2], 1);
2858  Vector4Set(quadVerts[2], farCorners[(j + 1) % 4][0], farCorners[(j + 1) % 4][1], farCorners[(j + 1) % 4][2], 1);
2859  Vector4Set(quadVerts[3], nearCorners[(j + 1) % 4][0], nearCorners[(j + 1) % 4][1], nearCorners[(j + 1) % 4][2], 1);
2860  Tess_AddQuadStamp2(quadVerts, colorCyan);
2861  }
2862 
2863  // draw far cap
2864  Vector4Set(quadVerts[0], farCorners[3][0], farCorners[3][1], farCorners[3][2], 1);
2865  Vector4Set(quadVerts[1], farCorners[2][0], farCorners[2][1], farCorners[2][2], 1);
2866  Vector4Set(quadVerts[2], farCorners[1][0], farCorners[1][1], farCorners[1][2], 1);
2867  Vector4Set(quadVerts[3], farCorners[0][0], farCorners[0][1], farCorners[0][2], 1);
2868  Tess_AddQuadStamp2(quadVerts, colorRed);
2869 
2870  // draw near cap
2871  Vector4Set(quadVerts[0], nearCorners[0][0], nearCorners[0][1], nearCorners[0][2], 1);
2872  Vector4Set(quadVerts[1], nearCorners[1][0], nearCorners[1][1], nearCorners[1][2], 1);
2873  Vector4Set(quadVerts[2], nearCorners[2][0], nearCorners[2][1], nearCorners[2][2], 1);
2874  Vector4Set(quadVerts[3], nearCorners[3][0], nearCorners[3][1], nearCorners[3][2], 1);
2875  Tess_AddQuadStamp2(quadVerts, colorGreen);
2876  }
2877  else
2878  {
2879  vec3_t top;
2880 
2881  // no light_start, just use the top vertex (doesn't need to be mirrored)
2882  PlanesGetIntersectionPoint(frustum[FRUSTUM_LEFT], frustum[FRUSTUM_RIGHT], frustum[FRUSTUM_TOP], top);
2883 
2884  // draw pyramid
2885  for (j = 0; j < 4; j++)
2886  {
2887  VectorCopy(farCorners[j], tess.xyz[tess.numVertexes]);
2888  Vector4Copy(colorCyan, tess.colors[tess.numVertexes]);
2889  tess.indexes[tess.numIndexes++] = tess.numVertexes;
2890  tess.numVertexes++;
2891 
2892  VectorCopy(farCorners[(j + 1) % 4], tess.xyz[tess.numVertexes]);
2893  Vector4Copy(colorCyan, tess.colors[tess.numVertexes]);
2894  tess.indexes[tess.numIndexes++] = tess.numVertexes;
2895  tess.numVertexes++;
2896 
2897  VectorCopy(top, tess.xyz[tess.numVertexes]);
2898  Vector4Copy(colorCyan, tess.colors[tess.numVertexes]);
2899  tess.indexes[tess.numIndexes++] = tess.numVertexes;
2900  tess.numVertexes++;
2901  }
2902 
2903  Vector4Set(quadVerts[0], farCorners[3][0], farCorners[3][1], farCorners[3][2], 1);
2904  Vector4Set(quadVerts[1], farCorners[2][0], farCorners[2][1], farCorners[2][2], 1);
2905  Vector4Set(quadVerts[2], farCorners[1][0], farCorners[1][1], farCorners[1][2], 1);
2906  Vector4Set(quadVerts[3], farCorners[0][0], farCorners[0][1], farCorners[0][2], 1);
2907  Tess_AddQuadStamp2(quadVerts, colorRed);
2908  }
2909 
2910  Tess_UpdateVBOs(tess.attribsSet); // set by Tess_AddQuadStamp2
2911  Tess_DrawElements();
2912  break;
2913  }
2914  default:
2915  break;
2916  }
2917  }
2918 
2919  tess.multiDrawPrimitives = 0;
2920  tess.numIndexes = 0;
2921  tess.numVertexes = 0;
2922 
2923  GL_CheckErrors();
2924 }
2925 
2932 static void IssueLightOcclusionQuery(link_t *queue, trRefLight_t *light, qboolean resetMultiQueryLink)
2933 {
2934  Ren_LogComment("--- IssueLightOcclusionQuery ---\n");
2935 
2936  //Ren_Print("--- IssueOcclusionQuery(%i) ---\n", node - tr.world->nodes);
2937 
2938  if (tr.numUsedOcclusionQueryObjects < (MAX_OCCLUSION_QUERIES - 1))
2939  {
2940  light->occlusionQueryObject = tr.occlusionQueryObjects[tr.numUsedOcclusionQueryObjects++];
2941  }
2942  else
2943  {
2944  light->occlusionQueryObject = 0;
2945  }
2946 
2947  EnQueue(queue, light);
2948 
2949  // tell GetOcclusionQueryResult that this is not a multi query
2950  if (resetMultiQueryLink)
2951  {
2952  QueueInit(&light->multiQuery);
2953  }
2954 
2955  if (light->occlusionQueryObject > 0)
2956  {
2957  GL_CheckErrors();
2958 
2959  // begin the occlusion query
2960  glBeginQuery(GL_SAMPLES_PASSED, light->occlusionQueryObject);
2961 
2962  GL_CheckErrors();
2963 
2964  RenderLightOcclusionVolume(light);
2965 
2966  // end the query
2967  glEndQuery(GL_SAMPLES_PASSED);
2968 
2969  if (!glIsQuery(light->occlusionQueryObject))
2970  {
2971  Ren_Fatal("IssueLightOcclusionQuery: light %li has no occlusion query object in slot %i: %lu", (long)(light - tr.world->lights), backEnd.viewParms.viewCount, (unsigned long)light->occlusionQueryObject);
2972  }
2973 
2974  //light->occlusionQueryNumbers[backEnd.viewParms.viewCount] = backEnd.pc.c_occlusionQueries;
2975  backEnd.pc.c_occlusionQueries++;
2976  }
2977 
2978  GL_CheckErrors();
2979 }
2980 
2986 static void IssueLightMultiOcclusionQueries(link_t *multiQueue, link_t *individualQueue)
2987 {
2988  trRefLight_t *light;
2989  trRefLight_t *multiQueryLight;
2990  link_t *l;
2991 
2992  Ren_LogComment("--- IssueLightMultiOcclusionQueries ---\n");
2993 
2994 #if 0
2995  Ren_Print("IssueLightMultiOcclusionQueries(");
2996  for (l = multiQueue->prev; l != multiQueue; l = l->prev)
2997  {
2998  light = (trRefLight_t *) l->data;
2999 
3000  Ren_Print("%i, ", light - backEnd.refdef.lights);
3001  }
3002  Ren_Print(")\n");
3003 #endif
3004 
3005  if (QueueEmpty(multiQueue))
3006  {
3007  return;
3008  }
3009 
3010  multiQueryLight = (trRefLight_t *) QueueFront(multiQueue)->data;
3011 
3012  if (tr.numUsedOcclusionQueryObjects < (MAX_OCCLUSION_QUERIES - 1))
3013  {
3014  multiQueryLight->occlusionQueryObject = tr.occlusionQueryObjects[tr.numUsedOcclusionQueryObjects++];
3015  }
3016  else
3017  {
3018  multiQueryLight->occlusionQueryObject = 0;
3019  }
3020 
3021  if (multiQueryLight->occlusionQueryObject > 0)
3022  {
3023  // begin the occlusion query
3024  GL_CheckErrors();
3025 
3026  glBeginQuery(GL_SAMPLES_PASSED, multiQueryLight->occlusionQueryObject);
3027 
3028  GL_CheckErrors();
3029 
3030  //Ren_Print("rendering nodes:[");
3031  for (l = multiQueue->prev; l != multiQueue; l = l->prev)
3032  {
3033  light = (trRefLight_t *) l->data;
3034 
3035  //Ren_Print("%i, ", light - backEnd.refdef.lights);
3036 
3037  RenderLightOcclusionVolume(light);
3038  }
3039  //Ren_Print("]\n");
3040 
3041  backEnd.pc.c_occlusionQueries++;
3042  backEnd.pc.c_occlusionQueriesMulti++;
3043 
3044  // end the query
3045  glEndQuery(GL_SAMPLES_PASSED);
3046 
3047  GL_CheckErrors();
3048 
3049 #if 0
3050  if (!glIsQuery(multiQueryNode->occlusionQueryObjects[backEnd.viewParms.viewCount]))
3051  {
3052  Ren_Fatal("IssueMultiOcclusionQueries: node %i has no occlusion query object in slot %i: %i", multiQueryNode - tr.world->nodes, backEnd.viewParms.viewCount, multiQueryNode->occlusionQueryObjects[backEnd.viewParms.viewCount]);
3053  }
3054 #endif
3055  }
3056 
3057  // move queue to node->multiQuery queue
3058  QueueInit(&multiQueryLight->multiQuery);
3059  DeQueue(multiQueue);
3060  while (!QueueEmpty(multiQueue))
3061  {
3062  light = (trRefLight_t *) DeQueue(multiQueue);
3063  EnQueue(&multiQueryLight->multiQuery, light);
3064  }
3065 
3066  EnQueue(individualQueue, multiQueryLight);
3067 
3068  //Ren_Print("--- IssueMultiOcclusionQueries end ---\n");
3069 }
3070 
3076 static int LightOcclusionResultAvailable(trRefLight_t *light)
3077 {
3078  GLint available;
3079 
3080  if (light->occlusionQueryObject > 0)
3081  {
3082  GL_JOIN();
3083 
3084  available = 0;
3085  //if(glIsQuery(light->occlusionQueryObjects[backEnd.viewParms.viewCount]))
3086  {
3087  glGetQueryObjectiv(light->occlusionQueryObject, GL_QUERY_RESULT_AVAILABLE, &available);
3088  GL_CheckErrors();
3089  }
3090 
3091  return available;
3092  }
3093 
3094  return qtrue;
3095 }
3096 
3101 static void GetLightOcclusionQueryResult(trRefLight_t *light)
3102 {
3103  link_t *l, *sentinel;
3104  int ocSamples;
3105  GLint available;
3106 
3107  Ren_LogComment("--- GetLightOcclusionQueryResult ---\n");
3108 
3109  if (light->occlusionQueryObject > 0)
3110  {
3111  GL_JOIN();
3112 
3113 #if 0
3114  if (!glIsQuery(node->occlusionQueryObjects[backEnd.viewParms.viewCount]))
3115  {
3116  Ren_Fatal("GetOcclusionQueryResult: node %i has no occlusion query object in slot %i: %i", node - tr.world->nodes, backEnd.viewParms.viewCount, node->occlusionQueryObjects[backEnd.viewParms.viewCount]);
3117  }
3118 #endif
3119 
3120  available = 0;
3121  while (!available)
3122  {
3123  //if(glIsQuery(node->occlusionQueryObjects[backEnd.viewParms.viewCount]))
3124  {
3125  glGetQueryObjectiv(light->occlusionQueryObject, GL_QUERY_RESULT_AVAILABLE, &available);
3126  //GL_CheckErrors();
3127  }
3128  }
3129 
3130  backEnd.pc.c_occlusionQueriesAvailable++;
3131 
3132  glGetQueryObjectiv(light->occlusionQueryObject, GL_QUERY_RESULT, &ocSamples);
3133 
3134  //Ren_Print("GetOcclusionQueryResult(%i): available = %i, samples = %i\n", node - tr.world->nodes, available, ocSamples);
3135 
3136  GL_CheckErrors();
3137  }
3138  else
3139  {
3140  ocSamples = 1;
3141  }
3142 
3143  light->occlusionQuerySamples = ocSamples;
3144 
3145  // copy result to all nodes that were linked to this multi query node
3146  sentinel = &light->multiQuery;
3147  for (l = sentinel->prev; l != sentinel; l = l->prev)
3148  {
3149  light = (trRefLight_t *) l->data;
3150 
3151  light->occlusionQuerySamples = ocSamples;
3152  }
3153 }
3154 
3161 static int LightCompare(const void *a, const void *b)
3162 {
3163  float d1, d2;
3164  trRefLight_t *l1 = (trRefLight_t *) *(void **)a;
3165  trRefLight_t *l2 = (trRefLight_t *) *(void **)b;
3166 
3167  d1 = DistanceSquared(backEnd.viewParms.orientation.origin, l1->l.origin);
3168  d2 = DistanceSquared(backEnd.viewParms.orientation.origin, l2->l.origin);
3169 
3170  if (d1 < d2)
3171  {
3172  return -1;
3173  }
3174  if (d1 > d2)
3175  {
3176  return 1;
3177  }
3178 
3179  return 0;
3180 }
3181 
3185 void RB_RenderLightOcclusionQueries()
3186 {
3187  Ren_LogComment("--- RB_RenderLightOcclusionQueries ---\n");
3188 
3189  if (glConfig2.occlusionQueryBits && r_dynamicLightOcclusionCulling->integer && !(backEnd.refdef.rdflags & RDF_NOWORLDMODEL))
3190  {
3191  int i;
3192  interaction_t *ia;
3193  int iaCount;
3194  int iaFirst;
3195  trRefLight_t *light, *oldLight, *multiQueryLight;
3196  GLint ocSamples = 0;
3197  qboolean queryObjects;
3198  link_t occlusionQueryQueue;
3199  link_t invisibleQueue;
3200  growList_t invisibleList;
3201  int startTime = 0;
3202 
3203  glVertexAttrib4f(ATTR_INDEX_COLOR, 1.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f, 0.05f);
3204 
3205  R2_TIMING(RSPEEDS_OCCLUSION_QUERIES)
3206  {
3207  startTime = ri.Milliseconds();
3208  }
3209 
3210  SetMacrosAndSelectProgram(trProg.gl_genericShader);
3211 
3212  GLSL_SetRequiredVertexPointers(trProg.gl_genericShader);
3213 
3214  GL_Cull(CT_TWO_SIDED);
3215 
3216  GL_LoadProjectionMatrix(backEnd.viewParms.projectionMatrix);
3217 
3218  // set uniforms
3219  GLSL_SetUniform_ColorModulate(trProg.gl_genericShader, CGEN_VERTEX, AGEN_VERTEX);
3220  SetUniformVec4(UNIFORM_COLOR, colorBlack);
3221 
3222  // bind u_ColorMap
3223  SelectTexture(TEX_COLOR);
3224  GL_Bind(tr.whiteImage);
3225 
3226  SetUniformMatrix16(UNIFORM_COLORTEXTUREMATRIX, matrixIdentity);
3227 
3228  // don't write to the color buffer or depth buffer
3229  if (r_showOcclusionQueries->integer)
3230  {
3231  GL_State(GLS_SRCBLEND_ONE | GLS_DSTBLEND_ONE);
3232  }
3233  else
3234  {
3235  GL_State(GLS_COLORMASK_BITS);
3236  }
3237 
3238  tr.numUsedOcclusionQueryObjects = 0;
3239  QueueInit(&occlusionQueryQueue);
3240  QueueInit(&invisibleQueue);
3241  Com_InitGrowList(&invisibleList, 1000);
3242 
3243  // loop trough all light interactions and render the light OBB for each last interaction
3244  for (iaCount = 0, ia = &backEnd.viewParms.interactions[0]; iaCount < backEnd.viewParms.numInteractions; )
3245  {
3246  backEnd.currentLight = light = ia->light;
3247  ia->occlusionQuerySamples = 1;
3248 
3249  if (!ia->next)
3250  {
3251  // last interaction of current light
3252  if (!ia->noOcclusionQueries)
3253  {
3254  Com_AddToGrowList(&invisibleList, light);
3255  }
3256 
3257  if (iaCount < (backEnd.viewParms.numInteractions - 1))
3258  {
3259  // jump to next interaction and continue
3260  ia++;
3261  iaCount++;
3262  }
3263  else
3264  {
3265  // increase last time to leave for loop
3266  iaCount++;
3267  }
3268  }
3269  else
3270  {
3271  // just continue
3272  ia = ia->next;
3273  iaCount++;
3274  }
3275  }
3276 
3277  // sort lights by distance
3278  qsort(invisibleList.elements, invisibleList.currentElements, sizeof(void *), LightCompare);
3279 
3280  for (i = 0; i < invisibleList.currentElements; i++)
3281  {
3282  light = (trRefLight_t *) Com_GrowListElement(&invisibleList, i);
3283 
3284  EnQueue(&invisibleQueue, light);
3285 
3286  if ((invisibleList.currentElements - i) <= 100)
3287  {
3288  if (QueueSize(&invisibleQueue) >= 10)
3289  {
3290  IssueLightMultiOcclusionQueries(&invisibleQueue, &occlusionQueryQueue);
3291  }
3292  }
3293  else
3294  {
3295  if (QueueSize(&invisibleQueue) >= 50)
3296  {
3297  IssueLightMultiOcclusionQueries(&invisibleQueue, &occlusionQueryQueue);
3298  }
3299  }
3300  }
3301  Com_DestroyGrowList(&invisibleList);
3302 
3303  if (!QueueEmpty(&invisibleQueue))
3304  {
3305  // remaining previously invisible node queries
3306  IssueLightMultiOcclusionQueries(&invisibleQueue, &occlusionQueryQueue);
3307 
3308  //Ren_Print("occlusionQueryQueue.empty() = %i\n", QueueEmpty(&occlusionQueryQueue));
3309  }
3310 
3311  // go back to the world modelview matrix
3312  backEnd.orientation = backEnd.viewParms.world;
3313  GL_LoadModelViewMatrix(backEnd.viewParms.world.modelViewMatrix);
3314 
3315  while (!QueueEmpty(&occlusionQueryQueue))
3316  {
3317  if (LightOcclusionResultAvailable((trRefLight_t *) QueueFront(&occlusionQueryQueue)->data) > 0)
3318  {
3319  light = (trRefLight_t *) DeQueue(&occlusionQueryQueue);
3320 
3321  // wait if result not available
3322  GetLightOcclusionQueryResult(light);
3323 
3324  if (light->occlusionQuerySamples > r_chcVisibilityThreshold->integer)
3325  {
3326  // if a query of multiple previously invisible objects became visible, we need to
3327  // test all the individual objects ...
3328  if (!QueueEmpty(&light->multiQuery))
3329  {
3330  multiQueryLight = light;
3331 
3332  IssueLightOcclusionQuery(&occlusionQueryQueue, multiQueryLight, qfalse);
3333 
3334  while (!QueueEmpty(&multiQueryLight->multiQuery))
3335  {
3336  light = (trRefLight_t *) DeQueue(&multiQueryLight->multiQuery);
3337 
3338  IssueLightOcclusionQuery(&occlusionQueryQueue, light, qtrue);
3339  }
3340  }
3341  }
3342  else
3343  {
3344  if (!QueueEmpty(&light->multiQuery))
3345  {
3346  backEnd.pc.c_occlusionQueriesLightsCulled++;
3347 
3348  multiQueryLight = light;
3349  while (!QueueEmpty(&multiQueryLight->multiQuery))
3350  {
3351  DeQueue(&multiQueryLight->multiQuery);
3352 
3353  backEnd.pc.c_occlusionQueriesLightsCulled++;
3354  backEnd.pc.c_occlusionQueriesSaved++;
3355  }
3356  }
3357  else
3358  {
3359  backEnd.pc.c_occlusionQueriesLightsCulled++;
3360  }
3361  }
3362  }
3363  }
3364 
3365  R2_TIMING(RSPEEDS_OCCLUSION_QUERIES)
3366  {
3367  backEnd.pc.c_occlusionQueriesResponseTime = ri.Milliseconds() - startTime;
3368  startTime = ri.Milliseconds();
3369  }
3370 
3371  // go back to the world modelview matrix
3372  backEnd.orientation = backEnd.viewParms.world;
3373  GL_LoadModelViewMatrix(backEnd.viewParms.world.modelViewMatrix);
3374 
3375  // reenable writes to depth and color buffers
3376  GL_State(GLS_DEPTHMASK_TRUE);
3377 
3378  // loop trough all light interactions and fetch results for each last interaction
3379  // then copy result to all other interactions that belong to the same light
3380  iaFirst = 0;
3381  queryObjects = qtrue;
3382  oldLight = NULL;
3383  for (iaCount = 0, ia = &backEnd.viewParms.interactions[0]; iaCount < backEnd.viewParms.numInteractions; )
3384  {
3385  backEnd.currentLight = light = ia->light;
3386 
3387  if (light != oldLight)
3388  {
3389  iaFirst = iaCount;
3390  }
3391 
3392  if (!queryObjects)
3393  {
3394  ia->occlusionQuerySamples = ocSamples;
3395 
3396  if (ocSamples <= 0)
3397  {
3398  backEnd.pc.c_occlusionQueriesInteractionsCulled++;
3399  }
3400  }
3401 
3402  if (!ia->next)
3403  {
3404  if (queryObjects)
3405  {
3406  if (!ia->noOcclusionQueries)
3407  {
3408  ocSamples = light->occlusionQuerySamples > r_chcVisibilityThreshold->integer;
3409  }
3410  else
3411  {
3412  ocSamples = 1;
3413  }
3414 
3415  // jump back to first interaction of this light copy query result
3416  ia = &backEnd.viewParms.interactions[iaFirst];
3417  iaCount = iaFirst;
3418  queryObjects = qfalse;
3419  }
3420  else
3421  {
3422  if (iaCount < (backEnd.viewParms.numInteractions - 1))
3423  {
3424  // jump to next interaction and start querying
3425  ia++;
3426  iaCount++;
3427  queryObjects = qtrue;
3428  }
3429  else
3430  {
3431  // increase last time to leave for loop
3432  iaCount++;
3433  }
3434  }
3435  }
3436  else
3437  {
3438  // just continue
3439  ia = ia->next;
3440  iaCount++;
3441  }
3442 
3443  oldLight = light;
3444  }
3445 
3446  R2_TIMING(RSPEEDS_OCCLUSION_QUERIES)
3447  {
3448  backEnd.pc.c_occlusionQueriesFetchTime = ri.Milliseconds() - startTime;
3449  }
3450  }
3451 
3452  GL_CheckErrors();
3453 }
3454 
3455 // ================================================================================================
3456 // ENTITY OCCLUSION CULLING
3457 // ================================================================================================
3458 
3463 static void RenderEntityOcclusionVolume(trRefEntity_t *entity)
3464 {
3465  vec3_t boundsCenter;
3466  vec3_t boundsSize;
3467  mat4_t rot; // transform, scale,
3468  axis_t axis;
3469 
3470  GL_CheckErrors();
3471 
3472 #if 0
3473  // render in entity space
3474  R_RotateEntityForViewParms(entity, &backEnd.viewParms, &backEnd.orientation);
3475  GL_LoadModelViewMatrix(backEnd.orientation.modelViewMatrix);
3476  gl_genericShader->SetUniform_ModelViewProjectionMatrix(GLSTACK_MVPM);
3477 
3478  tess.multiDrawPrimitives = 0;
3479  tess.numIndexes = 0;
3480  tess.numVertexes = 0;
3481 
3482  Tess_AddCube(vec3_origin, entity->localBounds[0], entity->localBounds[1], colorBlue);
3483 
3484  Tess_UpdateVBOs(ATTR_POSITION | ATTR_COLOR);
3485  Tess_DrawElements();
3486 
3487  tess.multiDrawPrimitives = 0;
3488  tess.numIndexes = 0;
3489  tess.numVertexes = 0;
3490 #else
3491 
3492 #if 0
3493  VectorSubtract(entity->localBounds[1], entity->localBounds[0], boundsSize);
3494 #else
3495  boundsSize[0] = Q_fabs(entity->localBounds[0][0]) + Q_fabs(entity->localBounds[1][0]);
3496  boundsSize[1] = Q_fabs(entity->localBounds[0][1]) + Q_fabs(entity->localBounds[1][1]);
3497  boundsSize[2] = Q_fabs(entity->localBounds[0][2]) + Q_fabs(entity->localBounds[1][2]);
3498 #endif
3499 
3500  VectorScale(entity->e.axis[0], boundsSize[0] * 0.5f, axis[0]);
3501  VectorScale(entity->e.axis[1], boundsSize[1] * 0.5f, axis[1]);
3502  VectorScale(entity->e.axis[2], boundsSize[2] * 0.5f, axis[2]);
3503 
3504  VectorAdd(entity->localBounds[0], entity->localBounds[1], boundsCenter);
3505  VectorScale(boundsCenter, 0.5f, boundsCenter);
3506 
3507  MatrixFromVectorsFLU(rot, entity->e.axis[0], entity->e.axis[1], entity->e.axis[2]);
3508  MatrixTransformNormal2(rot, boundsCenter);
3509 
3510  VectorAdd(entity->e.origin, boundsCenter, boundsCenter);
3511 
3512  MatrixSetupTransformFromVectorsFLU(backEnd.orientation.transformMatrix, axis[0], axis[1], axis[2], boundsCenter);
3513 
3514  MatrixAffineInverse(backEnd.orientation.transformMatrix, backEnd.orientation.viewMatrix);
3515  mat4_mult(backEnd.viewParms.world.viewMatrix, backEnd.orientation.transformMatrix, backEnd.orientation.modelViewMatrix);
3516 
3517  GL_LoadModelViewMatrix(backEnd.orientation.modelViewMatrix);
3518 
3519  SetUniformMatrix16(UNIFORM_MODELVIEWPROJECTIONMATRIX, GLSTACK_MVPM);
3520 
3521  R_BindVBO(tr.unitCubeVBO);
3522  R_BindIBO(tr.unitCubeIBO);
3523 
3524  GLSL_VertexAttribsState(ATTR_POSITION);
3525 
3526  tess.multiDrawPrimitives = 0;
3527  tess.numVertexes = tr.unitCubeVBO->vertexesNum;
3528  tess.numIndexes = tr.unitCubeIBO->indexesNum;
3529 
3530  Tess_DrawElements();
3531 
3532  tess.multiDrawPrimitives = 0;
3533  tess.numIndexes = 0;
3534  tess.numVertexes = 0;
3535 
3536 #endif
3537 
3538  GL_CheckErrors();
3539 }
3540 
3547 static void IssueEntityOcclusionQuery(link_t *queue, trRefEntity_t *entity, qboolean resetMultiQueryLink)
3548 {
3549  Ren_LogComment("--- IssueEntityOcclusionQuery ---\n");
3550 
3551  //Ren_Print("--- IssueEntityOcclusionQuery(%i) ---\n", light - backEnd.refdef.lights);
3552 
3553  if (tr.numUsedOcclusionQueryObjects < (MAX_OCCLUSION_QUERIES - 1))
3554  {
3555  entity->occlusionQueryObject = tr.occlusionQueryObjects[tr.numUsedOcclusionQueryObjects++];
3556  }
3557  else
3558  {
3559  entity->occlusionQueryObject = 0;
3560  }
3561 
3562  EnQueue(queue, entity);
3563 
3564  // tell GetOcclusionQueryResult that this is not a multi query
3565  if (resetMultiQueryLink)
3566  {
3567  QueueInit(&entity->multiQuery);
3568  }
3569 
3570  if (entity->occlusionQueryObject > 0)
3571  {
3572  GL_CheckErrors();
3573 
3574  // begin the occlusion query
3575  glBeginQuery(GL_SAMPLES_PASSED, entity->occlusionQueryObject);
3576 
3577  GL_CheckErrors();
3578 
3579  RenderEntityOcclusionVolume(entity);
3580 
3581  // end the query
3582  glEndQuery(GL_SAMPLES_PASSED);
3583 
3584 #if 0
3585  if (!glIsQuery(entity->occlusionQueryObject))
3586  {
3587  Ren_Fatal("IssueOcclusionQuery: entity %i has no occlusion query object in slot %i: %i", light - tr.world->lights, backEnd.viewParms.viewCount, light->occlusionQueryObject);
3588  }
3589 #endif
3590  backEnd.pc.c_occlusionQueries++;
3591  }
3592 
3593  GL_CheckErrors();
3594 }
3595 
3599 static void RB_RenderHDRResultToFrameBuffer()
3600 {
3601  Ren_LogComment("--- RB_RenderHDRResultToFrameBuffer ---\n");
3602  if (!r_hdrRendering->integer || !glConfig2.framebufferObjectAvailable || !glConfig2.textureFloatAvailable)
3603  {
3604  return;
3605  }
3606 
3607  GL_CheckErrors();
3608  R_BindNullFBO();
3609 
3610  // bind u_CurrentMap
3611  SelectTexture(TEX_CURRENT);
3612  GL_Bind(tr.deferredRenderFBOImage);
3613 
3614  GL_State(GLS_DEPTHTEST_DISABLE);
3615  GL_Cull(CT_TWO_SIDED);
3616 
3617  // set uniforms
3618  // set 2D virtual screen size
3619  GL_PushMatrix();
3620  RB_SetViewMVPM();
3621 
3622  if (backEnd.refdef.rdflags & RDF_NOWORLDMODEL)
3623  {
3624  SetMacrosAndSelectProgram(trProg.gl_screenShader);
3625  glVertexAttrib4fv(ATTR_INDEX_COLOR, colorWhite);
3626  SetUniformMatrix16(UNIFORM_MODELVIEWPROJECTIONMATRIX, GLSTACK_MVPM);
3627  }
3628  else
3629  {
3630  SetMacrosAndSelectProgram(trProg.gl_toneMappingShader, BRIGHTPASS_FILTER, qfalse);
3631  SetUniformFloat(UNIFORM_HDRKEY, backEnd.hdrKey);
3632  SetUniformFloat(UNIFORM_HDRAVERAGELUMINANCE, backEnd.hdrAverageLuminance);
3633  SetUniformFloat(UNIFORM_HDRMAXLUMINANCE, backEnd.hdrMaxLuminance);
3634  SetUniformMatrix16(UNIFORM_MODELVIEWPROJECTIONMATRIX, GLSTACK_MVPM);
3635  }
3636 
3637  DRAWVIEWQUAD();
3638  GL_PopMatrix();
3639 }
3640 
3646 static void IssueEntityMultiOcclusionQueries(link_t *multiQueue, link_t *individualQueue)
3647 {
3648  trRefEntity_t *entity;
3649  trRefEntity_t *multiQueryEntity;
3650  link_t *l;
3651 
3652  Ren_LogComment("--- IssueEntityMultiOcclusionQueries ---\n");
3653 
3654 #if 0
3655  Ren_Print("IssueEntityMultiOcclusionQueries(");
3656  for (l = multiQueue->prev; l != multiQueue; l = l->prev)
3657  {
3658  light = (trRefEntity_t *) l->data;
3659 
3660  Ren_Print("%i, ", light - backEnd.refdef.entities);
3661  }
3662  Ren_Print(")\n");
3663 #endif
3664 
3665  if (QueueEmpty(multiQueue))
3666  {
3667  return;
3668  }
3669 
3670  multiQueryEntity = (trRefEntity_t *) QueueFront(multiQueue)->data;
3671 
3672  if (tr.numUsedOcclusionQueryObjects < (MAX_OCCLUSION_QUERIES - 1))
3673  {
3674  multiQueryEntity->occlusionQueryObject = tr.occlusionQueryObjects[tr.numUsedOcclusionQueryObjects++];
3675  }
3676  else
3677  {
3678  multiQueryEntity->occlusionQueryObject = 0;
3679  }
3680 
3681  if (multiQueryEntity->occlusionQueryObject > 0)
3682  {
3683  // begin the occlusion query
3684  GL_CheckErrors();
3685 
3686  glBeginQuery(GL_SAMPLES_PASSED, multiQueryEntity->occlusionQueryObject);
3687 
3688  GL_CheckErrors();
3689 
3690  //Ren_Print("rendering nodes:[");
3691  for (l = multiQueue->prev; l != multiQueue; l = l->prev)
3692  {
3693  entity = (trRefEntity_t *) l->data;
3694 
3695  //Ren_Print("%i, ", light - backEnd.refdef.lights);
3696 
3697  RenderEntityOcclusionVolume(entity);
3698  }
3699  //Ren_Print("]\n");
3700 
3701  backEnd.pc.c_occlusionQueries++;
3702  backEnd.pc.c_occlusionQueriesMulti++;
3703 
3704  // end the query
3705  glEndQuery(GL_SAMPLES_PASSED);
3706 
3707  GL_CheckErrors();
3708 
3709 #if 0
3710  if (!glIsQuery(multiQueryNode->occlusionQueryObjects[backEnd.viewParms.viewCount]))
3711  {
3712  Ren_Fatal("IssueEntityMultiOcclusionQueries: node %i has no occlusion query object in slot %i: %i", multiQueryNode - tr.world->nodes, backEnd.viewParms.viewCount, multiQueryNode->occlusionQueryObjects[backEnd.viewParms.viewCount]);
3713  }
3714 #endif
3715  }
3716 
3717  // move queue to node->multiQuery queue
3718  QueueInit(&multiQueryEntity->multiQuery);
3719  DeQueue(multiQueue);
3720  while (!QueueEmpty(multiQueue))
3721  {
3722  entity = (trRefEntity_t *) DeQueue(multiQueue);
3723  EnQueue(&multiQueryEntity->multiQuery, entity);
3724  }
3725 
3726  EnQueue(individualQueue, multiQueryEntity);
3727 
3728  //Ren_Print("--- IssueMultiOcclusionQueries end ---\n");
3729 }
3730 
3736 static int EntityOcclusionResultAvailable(trRefEntity_t *entity)
3737 {
3738  GLint available;
3739 
3740  if (entity->occlusionQueryObject > 0)
3741  {
3742  GL_JOIN();
3743 
3744  available = 0;
3745  //if(glIsQuery(light->occlusionQueryObjects[backEnd.viewParms.viewCount]))
3746  {
3747  glGetQueryObjectiv(entity->occlusionQueryObject, GL_QUERY_RESULT_AVAILABLE, &available);
3748  GL_CheckErrors();
3749  }
3750 
3751  return available;
3752  }
3753 
3754  return qtrue;
3755 }
3756 
3761 static void GetEntityOcclusionQueryResult(trRefEntity_t *entity)
3762 {
3763  link_t *l, *sentinel;
3764  int ocSamples;
3765  GLint available;
3766 
3767  Ren_LogComment("--- GetEntityOcclusionQueryResult ---\n");
3768 
3769  if (entity->occlusionQueryObject > 0)
3770  {
3771  GL_JOIN();
3772 
3773  available = 0;
3774  while (!available)
3775  {
3776  //if(glIsQuery(node->occlusionQueryObjects[backEnd.viewParms.viewCount]))
3777  {
3778  glGetQueryObjectiv(entity->occlusionQueryObject, GL_QUERY_RESULT_AVAILABLE, &available);
3779  //GL_CheckErrors();
3780  }
3781  }
3782 
3783  backEnd.pc.c_occlusionQueriesAvailable++;
3784 
3785  glGetQueryObjectiv(entity->occlusionQueryObject, GL_QUERY_RESULT, &ocSamples);
3786 
3787  //Ren_Print("GetOcclusionQueryResult(%i): available = %i, samples = %i\n", node - tr.world->nodes, available, ocSamples);
3788 
3789  GL_CheckErrors();
3790  }
3791  else
3792  {
3793  ocSamples = 1;
3794  }
3795 
3796  entity->occlusionQuerySamples = ocSamples;
3797 
3798  // copy result to all nodes that were linked to this multi query node
3799  sentinel = &entity->multiQuery;
3800  for (l = sentinel->prev; l != sentinel; l = l->prev)
3801  {
3802  entity = (trRefEntity_t *) l->data;
3803 
3804  entity->occlusionQuerySamples = ocSamples;
3805  }
3806 }
3807 
3814 static int EntityCompare(const void *a, const void *b)
3815 {
3816  float d1, d2;
3817  trRefEntity_t *e1 = (trRefEntity_t *) *(void **)a;
3818  trRefEntity_t *e2 = (trRefEntity_t *) *(void **)b;
3819 
3820  d1 = DistanceSquared(backEnd.viewParms.orientation.origin, e1->e.origin);
3821  d2 = DistanceSquared(backEnd.viewParms.orientation.origin, e2->e.origin);
3822 
3823  if (d1 < d2)
3824  {
3825  return -1;
3826  }
3827  if (d1 > d2)
3828  {
3829  return 1;
3830  }
3831 
3832  return 0;
3833 }
3834 
3838 void RB_RenderEntityOcclusionQueries()
3839 {
3840  Ren_LogComment("--- RB_RenderEntityOcclusionQueries ---\n");
3841 
3842  if (glConfig2.occlusionQueryBits && !(backEnd.refdef.rdflags & RDF_NOWORLDMODEL))
3843  {
3844  int i;
3845  trRefEntity_t *entity, *multiQueryEntity;
3846  link_t occlusionQueryQueue;
3847  link_t invisibleQueue;
3848  growList_t invisibleList;
3849  int startTime = 0;
3850 
3851  glVertexAttrib4f(ATTR_INDEX_COLOR, 1.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f, 0.05f);
3852 
3853  R2_TIMING(RSPEEDS_OCCLUSION_QUERIES)
3854  {
3855  startTime = ri.Milliseconds();
3856  }
3857 
3858  SetMacrosAndSelectProgram(trProg.gl_genericShader);
3859 
3860  GLSL_SetRequiredVertexPointers(trProg.gl_genericShader);
3861 
3862  GL_Cull(CT_TWO_SIDED);
3863 
3864  GL_LoadProjectionMatrix(backEnd.viewParms.projectionMatrix);
3865 
3866  // set uniforms
3867  GLSL_SetUniform_ColorModulate(trProg.gl_genericShader, CGEN_CONST, AGEN_CONST);
3868  SetUniformVec4(UNIFORM_COLOR, colorBlue);
3869 
3870  // bind u_ColorMap
3871  SelectTexture(TEX_COLOR);
3872  GL_Bind(tr.whiteImage);
3873 
3874  SetUniformMatrix16(UNIFORM_COLORTEXTUREMATRIX, matrixIdentity);
3875 
3876  // don't write to the color buffer or depth buffer
3877  if (r_showOcclusionQueries->integer)
3878  {
3879  GL_State(GLS_SRCBLEND_ONE | GLS_DSTBLEND_ONE);
3880  }
3881  else
3882  {
3883  GL_State(GLS_COLORMASK_BITS);
3884  }
3885 
3886  tr.numUsedOcclusionQueryObjects = 0;
3887  QueueInit(&occlusionQueryQueue);
3888  QueueInit(&invisibleQueue);
3889  Com_InitGrowList(&invisibleList, 1000);
3890 
3891  // loop trough all entities and render the entity OBB
3892  for (i = 0, entity = backEnd.refdef.entities; i < backEnd.refdef.numEntities; i++, entity++)
3893  {
3894  if ((entity->e.renderfx & RF_THIRD_PERSON) && !backEnd.viewParms.isPortal)
3895  {
3896  continue;
3897  }
3898 
3899  if (entity->cull == CULL_OUT)
3900  {
3901  continue;
3902  }
3903 
3904  backEnd.currentEntity = entity;
3905 
3906  entity->occlusionQuerySamples = 1;
3907  entity->noOcclusionQueries = qfalse;
3908 
3909  // check if the entity volume clips against the near plane
3910  if (BoxOnPlaneSide(entity->worldBounds[0], entity->worldBounds[1], &backEnd.viewParms.frustums[0][FRUSTUM_NEAR]) == 3)
3911  {
3912  entity->noOcclusionQueries = qtrue;
3913  }
3914  else
3915  {
3916  Com_AddToGrowList(&invisibleList, entity);
3917  }
3918  }
3919 
3920  // sort entities by distance
3921  qsort(invisibleList.elements, invisibleList.currentElements, sizeof(void *), EntityCompare);
3922 
3923  for (i = 0; i < invisibleList.currentElements; i++)
3924  {
3925  entity = (trRefEntity_t *) Com_GrowListElement(&invisibleList, i);
3926 
3927  EnQueue(&invisibleQueue, entity);
3928 
3929  if ((invisibleList.currentElements - i) <= 100)
3930  {
3931  if (QueueSize(&invisibleQueue) >= 10)
3932  {
3933  IssueEntityMultiOcclusionQueries(&invisibleQueue, &occlusionQueryQueue);
3934  }
3935  }
3936  else
3937  {
3938  if (QueueSize(&invisibleQueue) >= 50)
3939  {
3940  IssueEntityMultiOcclusionQueries(&invisibleQueue, &occlusionQueryQueue);
3941  }
3942  }
3943  }
3944  Com_DestroyGrowList(&invisibleList);
3945 
3946  if (!QueueEmpty(&invisibleQueue))
3947  {
3948  // remaining previously invisible node queries
3949  IssueEntityMultiOcclusionQueries(&invisibleQueue, &occlusionQueryQueue);
3950 
3951  //Ren_Print("occlusionQueryQueue.empty() = %i\n", QueueEmpty(&occlusionQueryQueue));
3952  }
3953 
3954  // go back to the world modelview matrix
3955  backEnd.orientation = backEnd.viewParms.world;
3956  GL_LoadModelViewMatrix(backEnd.viewParms.world.modelViewMatrix);
3957 
3958  while (!QueueEmpty(&occlusionQueryQueue))
3959  {
3960  if (EntityOcclusionResultAvailable((trRefEntity_t *) QueueFront(&occlusionQueryQueue)->data) > 0)
3961  {
3962  entity = (trRefEntity_t *) DeQueue(&occlusionQueryQueue);
3963 
3964  // wait if result not available
3965  GetEntityOcclusionQueryResult(entity);
3966 
3967  if (entity->occlusionQuerySamples > r_chcVisibilityThreshold->integer)
3968  {
3969  // if a query of multiple previously invisible objects became visible, we need to
3970  // test all the individual objects ...
3971  if (!QueueEmpty(&entity->multiQuery))
3972  {
3973  multiQueryEntity = entity;
3974 
3975  IssueEntityOcclusionQuery(&occlusionQueryQueue, multiQueryEntity, qfalse);
3976 
3977  while (!QueueEmpty(&multiQueryEntity->multiQuery))
3978  {
3979  entity = (trRefEntity_t *) DeQueue(&multiQueryEntity->multiQuery);
3980 
3981  IssueEntityOcclusionQuery(&occlusionQueryQueue, entity, qtrue);
3982  }
3983  }
3984  }
3985  else
3986  {
3987  if (!QueueEmpty(&entity->multiQuery))
3988  {
3989  backEnd.pc.c_occlusionQueriesEntitiesCulled++;
3990 
3991  multiQueryEntity = entity;
3992  while (!QueueEmpty(&multiQueryEntity->multiQuery))
3993  {
3994  DeQueue(&multiQueryEntity->multiQuery);
3995 
3996  backEnd.pc.c_occlusionQueriesEntitiesCulled++;
3997  backEnd.pc.c_occlusionQueriesSaved++;
3998  }
3999  }
4000  else
4001  {
4002  backEnd.pc.c_occlusionQueriesEntitiesCulled++;
4003  }
4004  }
4005  }
4006  }
4007 
4008  R2_TIMING(RSPEEDS_OCCLUSION_QUERIES)
4009  {
4010  backEnd.pc.c_occlusionQueriesResponseTime = ri.Milliseconds() - startTime;
4011  startTime = ri.Milliseconds(); // FIXME: never read
4012  }
4013 
4014  // go back to the world modelview matrix
4015  backEnd.orientation = backEnd.viewParms.world;
4016  GL_LoadModelViewMatrix(backEnd.viewParms.world.modelViewMatrix);
4017 
4018  // reenable writes to depth and color buffers
4019  GL_State(GLS_DEPTHMASK_TRUE);
4020  }
4021 
4022  GL_CheckErrors();
4023 }
4024 
4025 // ================================================================================================
4026 // BSP OCCLUSION CULLING
4027 // ================================================================================================
4028 
4032 void RB_RenderBspOcclusionQueries()
4033 {
4034  Ren_LogComment("--- RB_RenderBspOcclusionQueries ---\n");
4035 
4036  if (glConfig2.occlusionQueryBits && r_dynamicBspOcclusionCulling->integer)
4037  {
4038  //int j;
4039  bspNode_t *node;
4040  link_t *l, *next, *sentinel;
4041 
4042  SetMacrosAndSelectProgram(trProg.gl_genericShader);
4043  GL_Cull(CT_TWO_SIDED);
4044 
4045  GL_LoadProjectionMatrix(backEnd.viewParms.projectionMatrix);
4046 
4047  // set uniforms
4048  GLSL_SetUniform_ColorModulate(trProg.gl_genericShader, CGEN_CONST, AGEN_CONST);
4049  SetUniformVec4(UNIFORM_COLOR, colorBlue);
4050  GLSL_SetUniform_DeformParms(tess.surfaceShader->deforms, tess.surfaceShader->numDeforms);
4051  SetUniformInt(UNIFORM_ALPHATEST, 0);
4052 
4053  // set up the transformation matrix
4054  backEnd.orientation = backEnd.viewParms.world;
4055  GL_LoadModelViewMatrix(backEnd.orientation.modelViewMatrix);
4056  SetUniformMatrix16(UNIFORM_MODELVIEWPROJECTIONMATRIX, GLSTACK_MVPM);
4057 
4058  // bind u_ColorMap
4059  SelectTexture(TEX_COLOR);
4060  GL_Bind(tr.whiteImage);
4061  SetUniformMatrix16(UNIFORM_COLORTEXTUREMATRIX, matrixIdentity);
4062 
4063  // don't write to the color buffer or depth buffer
4064  GL_State(GLS_COLORMASK_BITS);
4065 
4066  sentinel = &tr.occlusionQueryList;
4067  for (l = sentinel->next; l != sentinel; l = next)
4068  {
4069  next = l->next;
4070  node = (bspNode_t *) l->data;
4071 
4072  // begin the occlusion query
4073  glBeginQuery(GL_SAMPLES_PASSED, node->occlusionQueryObjects[backEnd.viewParms.viewCount]);
4074 
4075  R_BindVBO(node->volumeVBO);
4076  R_BindIBO(node->volumeIBO);
4077 
4078  GLSL_VertexAttribsState(ATTR_POSITION);
4079 
4080  tess.numVertexes = node->volumeVerts;
4081  tess.numIndexes = node->volumeIndexes;
4082 
4083  Tess_DrawElements();
4084 
4085  // end the query
4086  // don't read back immediately so that we give the query time to be ready
4087  glEndQuery(GL_SAMPLES_PASSED);
4088 
4089 #if 0
4090  if (!glIsQuery(node->occlusionQueryObjects[backEnd.viewParms.viewCount]))
4091  {
4092  Ren_Fatal("node %i has no occlusion query object in slot %i: %i", j, 0, node->occlusionQueryObjects[backEnd.viewParms.viewCount]);
4093  }
4094 #endif
4095 
4096  backEnd.pc.c_occlusionQueries++;
4097 
4098  tess.multiDrawPrimitives = 0;
4099  tess.numIndexes = 0;
4100  tess.numVertexes = 0;
4101  }
4102  }
4103 
4104  GL_CheckErrors();
4105 }
4106 
4110 void RB_CollectBspOcclusionQueries()
4111 {
4112  Ren_LogComment("--- RB_CollectBspOcclusionQueries ---\n");
4113 
4114  if (glConfig2.occlusionQueryBits && r_dynamicBspOcclusionCulling->integer)
4115  {
4116  // int j = 0;
4117  bspNode_t *node;
4118  link_t *l, *sentinel;
4119  int ocCount = 0;
4120  int avCount = 0;
4121  GLint available;
4122 
4123  GL_JOIN();
4124 
4125  sentinel = &tr.occlusionQueryList;
4126  for (l = sentinel->next; l != sentinel; l = l->next)
4127  {
4128  node = (bspNode_t *) l->data;
4129 
4130  if (glIsQuery(node->occlusionQueryObjects[backEnd.viewParms.viewCount]))
4131  {
4132  ocCount++;
4133  }
4134  }
4135 
4136  //Ren_Print("waiting for %i queries...\n", ocCount);
4137 
4138  do
4139  {
4140  for (l = sentinel->next; l != sentinel; l = l->next)
4141  {
4142  node = (bspNode_t *) l->data;
4143 
4144  // FIXME: don't know if it should done like this,
4145  // but this statement was always true.
4146  // if (node->issueOcclusionQuery)
4147  // TODO: issueOcclusionQuery is never used
4148  if (node->issueOcclusionQuery[backEnd.viewParms.viewCount])
4149  {
4150  available = 0;
4151  if (glIsQuery(node->occlusionQueryObjects[backEnd.viewParms.viewCount]))
4152  {
4153  glGetQueryObjectiv(node->occlusionQueryObjects[backEnd.viewParms.viewCount], GL_QUERY_RESULT_AVAILABLE, &available);
4154  GL_CheckErrors();
4155  }
4156 
4157  if (available)
4158  {
4159  // FIXME: j is neither incremented not used,
4160  // node->issueOcclusionQuery[j] = qfalse;
4161  // TODO: issueOcclusionQuery is never used
4162  node->issueOcclusionQuery[backEnd.viewParms.viewCount] = qfalse;
4163  avCount++;
4164 
4165  //if(//avCount % oc)
4166 
4167  //Ren_Print("%i queries...\n", avCount);
4168  }
4169  }
4170  }
4171  }
4172  while (avCount < ocCount);
4173 
4174  for (l = sentinel->next; l != sentinel; l = l->next)
4175  {
4176  node = (bspNode_t *) l->data;
4177 
4178  available = 0;
4179  if (glIsQuery(node->occlusionQueryObjects[backEnd.viewParms.viewCount]))
4180  {
4181  glGetQueryObjectiv(node->occlusionQueryObjects[backEnd.viewParms.viewCount], GL_QUERY_RESULT_AVAILABLE, &available);
4182  GL_CheckErrors();
4183  }
4184 
4185  if (available)
4186  {
4187  backEnd.pc.c_occlusionQueriesAvailable++;
4188 
4189  // get the object and store it in the occlusion bits for the light
4190  glGetQueryObjectiv(node->occlusionQueryObjects[backEnd.viewParms.viewCount], GL_QUERY_RESULT, &node->occlusionQuerySamples[backEnd.viewParms.viewCount]);
4191 
4192  if (node->occlusionQuerySamples[backEnd.viewParms.viewCount] <= 0)
4193  {
4194  backEnd.pc.c_occlusionQueriesLeafsCulled++;
4195  }
4196  }
4197  else
4198  {
4199  node->occlusionQuerySamples[backEnd.viewParms.viewCount] = 1;
4200  }
4201 
4202  GL_CheckErrors();
4203  }
4204 
4205  //Ren_Print("done\n");
4206  }
4207 }
4208 
4212 static void RB_RenderDebugUtils()
4213 {
4214  Ren_LogComment("--- RB_RenderDebugUtils ---\n");
4215 
4216  if (r_showLightTransforms->integer || r_showShadowLod->integer)
4217  {
4218  interaction_t *ia;
4219  int iaCount, j;
4220  trRefLight_t *light;
4221  vec3_t forward, left, up;
4222  vec4_t lightColor;
4223  vec4_t quadVerts[4];
4224  vec3_t minSize = { -2, -2, -2 };
4225  vec3_t maxSize = { 2, 2, 2 };
4226 
4227  SetMacrosAndSelectProgram(trProg.gl_genericShader);
4228 
4229  //GL_State(GLS_SRCBLEND_SRC_ALPHA | GLS_DSTBLEND_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA);
4230  GL_State(GLS_POLYMODE_LINE | GLS_DEPTHTEST_DISABLE);
4231  GL_Cull(CT_TWO_SIDED);
4232 
4233  // set uniforms
4234  GLSL_SetUniform_ColorModulate(trProg.gl_genericShader, CGEN_CUSTOM_RGB, AGEN_CUSTOM);
4235 
4236  // bind u_ColorMap
4237  SelectTexture(TEX_COLOR);
4238  GL_Bind(tr.whiteImage);
4239 
4240  SetUniformMatrix16(UNIFORM_COLORTEXTUREMATRIX, matrixIdentity);
4241 
4242  for (iaCount = 0, ia = &backEnd.viewParms.interactions[0]; iaCount < backEnd.viewParms.numInteractions; )
4243  {
4244  light = ia->light;
4245 
4246  if (!ia->next)
4247  {
4248  if (r_showShadowLod->integer)
4249  {
4250  if (light->shadowLOD == 0)
4251  {
4252  Vector4Copy(colorRed, lightColor);
4253  }
4254  else if (light->shadowLOD == 1)
4255  {
4256  Vector4Copy(colorGreen, lightColor);
4257  }
4258  else if (light->shadowLOD == 2)
4259  {
4260  Vector4Copy(colorBlue, lightColor);
4261  }
4262  else if (light->shadowLOD == 3)
4263  {
4264  Vector4Copy(colorYellow, lightColor);
4265  }
4266  else if (light->shadowLOD == 4)
4267  {
4268  Vector4Copy(colorMagenta, lightColor);
4269  }
4270  else if (light->shadowLOD == 5)
4271  {
4272  Vector4Copy(colorCyan, lightColor);
4273  }
4274  else
4275  {
4276  Vector4Copy(colorMdGrey, lightColor);
4277  }
4278  }
4279  else if (r_dynamicLightOcclusionCulling->integer)
4280  {
4281  if (!ia->occlusionQuerySamples)
4282  {
4283  Vector4Copy(colorRed, lightColor);
4284  }
4285  else
4286  {
4287  Vector4Copy(colorGreen, lightColor);
4288  }
4289  }
4290  else
4291  {
4292  //Vector4Copy(g_color_table[iaCount % 8], lightColor);
4293  Vector4Copy(colorBlue, lightColor);
4294  }
4295 
4296  lightColor[3] = 0.2f;
4297 
4298  SetUniformVec4(UNIFORM_COLOR, lightColor);
4299 
4300  MatrixToVectorsFLU(matrixIdentity, forward, left, up);
4301  VectorMA(vec3_origin, 16, forward, forward);
4302  VectorMA(vec3_origin, 16, left, left);
4303  VectorMA(vec3_origin, 16, up, up);
4304 
4305  /*
4306  // draw axis
4307  glBegin(GL_LINES);
4308 
4309  // draw orientation
4310  glVertexAttrib4fv(ATTR_INDEX_COLOR, colorRed);
4311  glVertex3fv(vec3_origin);
4312  glVertex3fv(forward);
4313 
4314  glVertexAttrib4fv(ATTR_INDEX_COLOR, colorGreen);
4315  glVertex3fv(vec3_origin);
4316  glVertex3fv(left);
4317 
4318  glVertexAttrib4fv(ATTR_INDEX_COLOR, colorBlue);
4319  glVertex3fv(vec3_origin);
4320  glVertex3fv(up);
4321 
4322  // draw special vectors
4323  glVertexAttrib4fv(ATTR_INDEX_COLOR, colorYellow);
4324  glVertex3fv(vec3_origin);
4325  VectorSubtract(light->origin, backEnd.orientation.origin, tmp);
4326  light->transformed[0] = DotProduct(tmp, backEnd.orientation.axis[0]);
4327  light->transformed[1] = DotProduct(tmp, backEnd.orientation.axis[1]);
4328  light->transformed[2] = DotProduct(tmp, backEnd.orientation.axis[2]);
4329  glVertex3fv(light->transformed);
4330 
4331  glEnd();
4332  */
4333 
4334 #if 1
4335  if (light->isStatic && light->frustumVBO && light->frustumIBO)
4336  {
4337  // go back to the world modelview matrix
4338  backEnd.orientation = backEnd.viewParms.world;
4339  GL_LoadModelViewMatrix(backEnd.viewParms.world.modelViewMatrix);
4340 
4341  SetUniformMatrix16(UNIFORM_MODELVIEWPROJECTIONMATRIX, GLSTACK_MVPM);
4342 
4343  R_BindVBO(light->frustumVBO);
4344  R_BindIBO(light->frustumIBO);
4345 
4346  GLSL_VertexAttribsState(ATTR_POSITION);
4347 
4348  tess.numVertexes = light->frustumVerts;
4349  tess.numIndexes = light->frustumIndexes;
4350 
4351  Tess_DrawElements();
4352 
4353  tess.multiDrawPrimitives = 0;
4354  tess.numIndexes = 0;
4355  tess.numVertexes = 0;
4356  }
4357  else
4358 #endif
4359  {
4360  tess.multiDrawPrimitives = 0;
4361  tess.numIndexes = 0;
4362  tess.numVertexes = 0;
4363 
4364  switch (light->l.rlType)
4365  {
4366  case RL_OMNI:
4367  case RL_DIRECTIONAL:
4368  {
4369 #if 1
4370  // set up the transformation matrix
4371  R_RotateLightForViewParms(light, &backEnd.viewParms, &backEnd.orientation);
4372 
4373  GL_LoadModelViewMatrix(backEnd.orientation.modelViewMatrix);
4374 
4375  SetUniformMatrix16(UNIFORM_MODELVIEWPROJECTIONMATRIX, GLSTACK_MVPM);
4376 
4377  Tess_AddCube(vec3_origin, light->localBounds[0], light->localBounds[1], lightColor);
4378 
4379  if (!VectorCompare(light->l.center, vec3_origin))
4380  {
4381  Tess_AddCube(light->l.center, minSize, maxSize, colorYellow);
4382  }
4383 
4384  Tess_UpdateVBOs(tess.attribsSet); // set by Tess_AddCube
4385  Tess_DrawElements();
4386 #else
4387  mat4_t transform, scale, rot;
4388 
4389  mat4_reset_scale(scale, light->l.radius[0], light->l.radius[1], light->l.radius[2]);
4390  mat4_mult(light->transformMatrix, scale, transform);
4391 
4392  GL_LoadModelViewMatrix(transform);
4393  //GL_LoadProjectionMatrix(backEnd.viewParms.projectionMatrix);
4394 
4395  gl_genericShader->SetUniform_ModelViewProjectionMatrix(GLSTACK_MVPM);
4396 
4397  R_BindVBO(tr.unitCubeVBO);
4398  R_BindIBO(tr.unitCubeIBO);
4399 
4400  GLSL_VertexAttribsState(ATTR_POSITION);
4401 
4402  tess.multiDrawPrimitives = 0;
4403  tess.numVertexes = tr.unitCubeVBO->vertexesNum;
4404  tess.numIndexes = tr.unitCubeIBO->indexesNum;
4405 
4406  Tess_DrawElements();
4407 #endif
4408  break;
4409  }
4410  case RL_PROJ:
4411  {
4412  vec3_t farCorners[4];
4413  //vec4_t frustum[6];
4414  vec4_t *frustum = light->localFrustum;
4415 
4416  // set up the transformation matrix
4417  R_RotateLightForViewParms(light, &backEnd.viewParms, &backEnd.orientation);
4418  GL_LoadModelViewMatrix(backEnd.orientation.modelViewMatrix);
4419 
4420  SetUniformMatrix16(UNIFORM_MODELVIEWPROJECTIONMATRIX, GLSTACK_MVPM);
4421 
4422 #if 0
4423  // transform frustum from world space to local space
4424  for (j = 0; j < 6; j++)
4425  {
4426  MatrixTransformPlane(light->transformMatrix, light->localFrustum[j], frustum[j]);
4427  //Vector4Copy(light->localFrustum[j], frustum[j]);
4428  //MatrixTransformPlane2(light->viewMatrix, frustum[j]);
4429  }
4430 
4431  // go back to the world modelview matrix
4432  backEnd.orientation = backEnd.viewParms.world;
4433  GL_LoadModelViewMatrix(backEnd.viewParms.world.modelViewMatrix);
4434  GLSL_SetUniform_ModelViewProjectionMatrix(&tr.genericShader, GLSTACK_MVPM);
4435 #endif
4436 
4437  PlanesGetIntersectionPoint(frustum[FRUSTUM_LEFT], frustum[FRUSTUM_TOP], frustum[FRUSTUM_FAR], farCorners[0]);
4438  PlanesGetIntersectionPoint(frustum[FRUSTUM_RIGHT], frustum[FRUSTUM_TOP], frustum[FRUSTUM_FAR], farCorners[1]);
4439  PlanesGetIntersectionPoint(frustum[FRUSTUM_RIGHT], frustum[FRUSTUM_BOTTOM], frustum[FRUSTUM_FAR], farCorners[2]);
4440  PlanesGetIntersectionPoint(frustum[FRUSTUM_LEFT], frustum[FRUSTUM_BOTTOM], frustum[FRUSTUM_FAR], farCorners[3]);
4441 
4442  // the planes of the frustum are measured at world 0,0,0 so we have to position the intersection points relative to the light origin
4443 #if 0
4444  Ren_Print("pyramid farCorners\n");
4445  for (j = 0; j < 4; j++)
4446  {
4447  Ren_Print("(%5.3f, %5.3f, %5.3f)\n", farCorners[j][0], farCorners[j][1], farCorners[j][2]);
4448  }
4449 #endif
4450 
4451  tess.numVertexes = 0;
4452  tess.numIndexes = 0;
4453  tess.multiDrawPrimitives = 0;
4454 
4455  if (!VectorCompare(light->l.projStart, vec3_origin))
4456  {
4457  vec3_t nearCorners[4];
4458 
4459  // calculate the vertices defining the top area
4460  PlanesGetIntersectionPoint(frustum[FRUSTUM_LEFT], frustum[FRUSTUM_TOP], frustum[FRUSTUM_NEAR], nearCorners[0]);
4461  PlanesGetIntersectionPoint(frustum[FRUSTUM_RIGHT], frustum[FRUSTUM_TOP], frustum[FRUSTUM_NEAR], nearCorners[1]);
4462  PlanesGetIntersectionPoint(frustum[FRUSTUM_RIGHT], frustum[FRUSTUM_BOTTOM], frustum[FRUSTUM_NEAR], nearCorners[2]);
4463  PlanesGetIntersectionPoint(frustum[FRUSTUM_LEFT], frustum[FRUSTUM_BOTTOM], frustum[FRUSTUM_NEAR], nearCorners[3]);
4464 
4465 #if 0
4466  Ren_Print("pyramid nearCorners\n");
4467  for (j = 0; j < 4; j++)
4468  {
4469  Ren_Print("(%5.3f, %5.3f, %5.3f)\n", nearCorners[j][0], nearCorners[j][1], nearCorners[j][2]);
4470  }
4471 #endif
4472 
4473  // draw outer surfaces
4474  for (j = 0; j < 4; j++)
4475  {
4476  Vector4Set(quadVerts[3], nearCorners[j][0], nearCorners[j][1], nearCorners[j][2], 1);
4477  Vector4Set(quadVerts[2], farCorners[j][0], farCorners[j][1], farCorners[j][2], 1);
4478  Vector4Set(quadVerts[1], farCorners[(j + 1) % 4][0], farCorners[(j + 1) % 4][1], farCorners[(j + 1) % 4][2], 1);
4479  Vector4Set(quadVerts[0], nearCorners[(j + 1) % 4][0], nearCorners[(j + 1) % 4][1], nearCorners[(j + 1) % 4][2], 1);
4480  Tess_AddQuadStamp2(quadVerts, lightColor);
4481  }
4482 
4483  // draw far cap
4484  Vector4Set(quadVerts[0], farCorners[0][0], farCorners[0][1], farCorners[0][2], 1);
4485  Vector4Set(quadVerts[1], farCorners[1][0], farCorners[1][1], farCorners[1][2], 1);
4486  Vector4Set(quadVerts[2], farCorners[2][0], farCorners[2][1], farCorners[2][2], 1);
4487  Vector4Set(quadVerts[3], farCorners[3][0], farCorners[3][1], farCorners[3][2], 1);
4488  Tess_AddQuadStamp2(quadVerts, lightColor);
4489 
4490  // draw near cap
4491  Vector4Set(quadVerts[3], nearCorners[0][0], nearCorners[0][1], nearCorners[0][2], 1);
4492  Vector4Set(quadVerts[2], nearCorners[1][0], nearCorners[1][1], nearCorners[1][2], 1);
4493  Vector4Set(quadVerts[1], nearCorners[2][0], nearCorners[2][1], nearCorners[2][2], 1);
4494  Vector4Set(quadVerts[0], nearCorners[3][0], nearCorners[3][1], nearCorners[3][2], 1);
4495  Tess_AddQuadStamp2(quadVerts, lightColor);
4496  }
4497  else
4498  {
4499  vec3_t top;
4500 
4501  // no light_start, just use the top vertex (doesn't need to be mirrored)
4502  PlanesGetIntersectionPoint(frustum[FRUSTUM_LEFT], frustum[FRUSTUM_RIGHT], frustum[FRUSTUM_TOP], top);
4503 
4504  // draw pyramid
4505  for (j = 0; j < 4; j++)
4506  {
4507  VectorCopy(top, tess.xyz[tess.numVertexes]);
4508  Vector4Copy(lightColor, tess.colors[tess.numVertexes]);
4509  tess.indexes[tess.numIndexes++] = tess.numVertexes;
4510  tess.numVertexes++;
4511 
4512  VectorCopy(farCorners[(j + 1) % 4], tess.xyz[tess.numVertexes]);
4513  Vector4Copy(lightColor, tess.colors[tess.numVertexes]);
4514  tess.indexes[tess.numIndexes++] = tess.numVertexes;
4515  tess.numVertexes++;
4516 
4517  VectorCopy(farCorners[j], tess.xyz[tess.numVertexes]);
4518  Vector4Copy(lightColor, tess.colors[tess.numVertexes]);
4519  tess.indexes[tess.numIndexes++] = tess.numVertexes;
4520  tess.numVertexes++;
4521  }
4522 
4523  // draw far cap
4524  Vector4Set(quadVerts[0], farCorners[0][0], farCorners[0][1], farCorners[0][2], 1);
4525  Vector4Set(quadVerts[1], farCorners[1][0], farCorners[1][1], farCorners[1][2], 1);
4526  Vector4Set(quadVerts[2], farCorners[2][0], farCorners[2][1], farCorners[2][2], 1);
4527  Vector4Set(quadVerts[3], farCorners[3][0], farCorners[3][1], farCorners[3][2], 1);
4528  Tess_AddQuadStamp2(quadVerts, lightColor);
4529  }
4530 
4531  // draw light_target
4532  Tess_AddCube(light->l.projTarget, minSize, maxSize, colorRed);
4533  Tess_AddCube(light->l.projRight, minSize, maxSize, colorGreen);
4534  Tess_AddCube(light->l.projUp, minSize, maxSize, colorBlue);
4535 
4536  if (!VectorCompare(light->l.projStart, vec3_origin))
4537  {
4538  Tess_AddCube(light->l.projStart, minSize, maxSize, colorYellow);
4539  }
4540 
4541  if (!VectorCompare(light->l.projEnd, vec3_origin))
4542  {
4543  Tess_AddCube(light->l.projEnd, minSize, maxSize, colorMagenta);
4544  }
4545 
4546  Tess_UpdateVBOs(tess.attribsSet); // set by Tess_AddCube
4547  Tess_DrawElements();
4548  break;
4549  }
4550  default:
4551  break;
4552  }
4553 
4554  tess.multiDrawPrimitives = 0;
4555  tess.numIndexes = 0;
4556  tess.numVertexes = 0;
4557  }
4558 
4559  if (iaCount < (backEnd.viewParms.numInteractions - 1))
4560  {
4561  // jump to next interaction and continue
4562  ia++;
4563  iaCount++;
4564  }
4565  else
4566  {
4567  // increase last time to leave for loop
4568  iaCount++;
4569  }
4570  }
4571  else
4572  {
4573  // just continue
4574  ia = ia->next;
4575  iaCount++;
4576  }
4577  }
4578 
4579  // go back to the world modelview matrix
4580  backEnd.orientation = backEnd.viewParms.world;
4581  GL_LoadModelViewMatrix(backEnd.viewParms.world.modelViewMatrix);
4582  }
4583 
4584  if (r_showLightInteractions->integer)
4585  {
4586  int i;
4587  int cubeSides;
4588  interaction_t *ia;
4589  int iaCount;
4590  trRefLight_t *light;
4591  trRefEntity_t *entity;
4592  surfaceType_t *surface;
4593  vec4_t lightColor;
4594  vec3_t mins = { -1, -1, -1 };
4595  vec3_t maxs = { 1, 1, 1 };
4596 
4597  SetMacrosAndSelectProgram(trProg.gl_genericShader);
4598 
4599  GL_State(GLS_POLYMODE_LINE | GLS_DEPTHTEST_DISABLE);
4600  GL_Cull(CT_TWO_SIDED);
4601 
4602  // set uniforms
4603  GLSL_SetUniform_ColorModulate(trProg.gl_genericShader, CGEN_VERTEX, AGEN_VERTEX);
4604  SetUniformVec4(UNIFORM_COLOR, colorBlack);
4605 
4606  // bind u_ColorMap
4607  SelectTexture(TEX_COLOR);
4608  GL_Bind(tr.whiteImage);
4609 
4610  SetUniformMatrix16(UNIFORM_COLORTEXTUREMATRIX, matrixIdentity);
4611 
4612  for (iaCount = 0, ia = &backEnd.viewParms.interactions[0]; iaCount < backEnd.viewParms.numInteractions; )
4613  {
4614  backEnd.currentEntity = entity = ia->entity;
4615  light = ia->light;
4616  surface = ia->surface;
4617 
4618  if (entity != &tr.worldEntity)
4619  {
4620  // set up the transformation matrix
4621  R_RotateEntityForViewParms(backEnd.currentEntity, &backEnd.viewParms, &backEnd.orientation);
4622  }
4623  else
4624  {
4625  backEnd.orientation = backEnd.viewParms.world;
4626  }
4627 
4628  GL_LoadModelViewMatrix(backEnd.orientation.modelViewMatrix);
4629 
4630  SetUniformMatrix16(UNIFORM_MODELVIEWPROJECTIONMATRIX, GLSTACK_MVPM);
4631 
4632  if (r_shadows->integer >= SHADOWING_ESM16 && light->l.rlType == RL_OMNI)
4633  {
4634 #if 0
4635  Vector4Copy(colorMdGrey, lightColor);
4636 
4637  if (ia->cubeSideBits & CUBESIDE_PX)
4638  {
4639  Vector4Copy(colorBlack, lightColor);
4640  }
4641  if (ia->cubeSideBits & CUBESIDE_PY)
4642  {
4643  Vector4Copy(colorRed, lightColor);
4644  }
4645  if (ia->cubeSideBits & CUBESIDE_PZ)
4646  {
4647  Vector4Copy(colorGreen, lightColor);
4648  }
4649  if (ia->cubeSideBits & CUBESIDE_NX)
4650  {
4651  Vector4Copy(colorYellow, lightColor);
4652  }
4653  if (ia->cubeSideBits & CUBESIDE_NY)
4654  {
4655  Vector4Copy(colorBlue, lightColor);
4656  }
4657  if (ia->cubeSideBits & CUBESIDE_NZ)
4658  {
4659  Vector4Copy(colorCyan, lightColor);
4660  }
4661  if (ia->cubeSideBits == CUBESIDE_CLIPALL)
4662  {
4663  Vector4Copy(colorMagenta, lightColor);
4664  }
4665 #else
4666  // count how many cube sides are in use for this interaction
4667  cubeSides = 0;
4668  for (i = 0; i < 6; i++)
4669  {
4670  if (ia->cubeSideBits & (1 << i))
4671  {
4672  cubeSides++;
4673  }
4674  }
4675 
4676  Vector4Copy(g_color_table[cubeSides], lightColor);
4677 #endif
4678  }
4679  else
4680  {
4681  Vector4Copy(colorMdGrey, lightColor);
4682  }
4683 
4684  lightColor[0] *= 0.5f;
4685  lightColor[1] *= 0.5f;
4686  lightColor[2] *= 0.5f;
4687  //lightColor[3] *= 0.2f;
4688 
4689  Vector4Copy(colorWhite, lightColor);
4690 
4691  tess.numVertexes = 0;
4692  tess.numIndexes = 0;
4693  tess.multiDrawPrimitives = 0;
4694 
4695  if (*surface == SF_FACE || *surface == SF_GRID || *surface == SF_TRIANGLES)
4696  {
4697  srfGeneric_t *gen;
4698 
4699  gen = (srfGeneric_t *) surface;
4700 
4701  if (*surface == SF_FACE)
4702  {
4703  Vector4Copy(colorMdGrey, lightColor);
4704  }
4705  else if (*surface == SF_GRID)
4706  {
4707  Vector4Copy(colorCyan, lightColor);
4708  }
4709  else if (*surface == SF_TRIANGLES)
4710  {
4711  Vector4Copy(colorMagenta, lightColor);
4712  }
4713  else
4714  {
4715  Vector4Copy(colorMdGrey, lightColor);
4716  }
4717 
4718  Tess_AddCube(vec3_origin, gen->bounds[0], gen->bounds[1], lightColor);
4719 
4720  Tess_AddCube(gen->origin, mins, maxs, colorWhite);
4721  }
4722  else if (*surface == SF_VBO_MESH)
4723  {
4724  srfVBOMesh_t *srf = (srfVBOMesh_t *) surface;
4725  Tess_AddCube(vec3_origin, srf->bounds[0], srf->bounds[1], lightColor);
4726  }
4727  else if (*surface == SF_MDV)
4728  {
4729  Tess_AddCube(vec3_origin, entity->localBounds[0], entity->localBounds[1], lightColor);
4730  }
4731 
4732  Tess_UpdateVBOs(tess.attribsSet); // set by Tess_AddCube
4733  Tess_DrawElements();
4734 
4735  tess.multiDrawPrimitives = 0;
4736  tess.numIndexes = 0;
4737  tess.numVertexes = 0;
4738 
4739  if (!ia->next)
4740  {
4741  if (iaCount < (backEnd.viewParms.numInteractions - 1))
4742  {
4743  // jump to next interaction and continue
4744  ia++;
4745  iaCount++;
4746  }
4747  else
4748  {
4749  // increase last time to leave for loop
4750  iaCount++;
4751  }
4752  }
4753  else
4754  {
4755  // just continue
4756  ia = ia->next;
4757  iaCount++;
4758  }
4759  }
4760 
4761  // go back to the world modelview matrix
4762  backEnd.orientation = backEnd.viewParms.world;
4763  GL_LoadModelViewMatrix(backEnd.viewParms.world.modelViewMatrix);
4764  }
4765 
4766  if (r_showEntityTransforms->integer)
4767  {
4768  trRefEntity_t *ent;
4769  int i;
4770  vec3_t mins = { -1, -1, -1 };
4771  vec3_t maxs = { 1, 1, 1 };
4772 
4773  SetMacrosAndSelectProgram(trProg.gl_genericShader);
4774 
4775  GL_State(GLS_POLYMODE_LINE | GLS_DEPTHTEST_DISABLE);
4776  GL_Cull(CT_TWO_SIDED);
4777 
4778  // set uniforms
4779  GLSL_SetUniform_ColorModulate(trProg.gl_genericShader, CGEN_VERTEX, AGEN_VERTEX);
4780  SetUniformVec4(UNIFORM_COLOR, colorBlack);
4781 
4782  // bind u_ColorMap
4783  SelectTexture(TEX_COLOR);
4784  GL_Bind(tr.whiteImage);
4785 
4786  SetUniformMatrix16(UNIFORM_COLORTEXTUREMATRIX, matrixIdentity);
4787 
4788  ent = backEnd.refdef.entities;
4789  for (i = 0; i < backEnd.refdef.numEntities; i++, ent++)
4790  {
4791  if ((ent->e.renderfx & RF_THIRD_PERSON) && !backEnd.viewParms.isPortal)
4792  {
4793  continue;
4794  }
4795 
4796  if (ent->cull == CULL_OUT)
4797  {
4798  continue;
4799  }
4800 
4801  // set up the transformation matrix
4802  R_RotateEntityForViewParms(ent, &backEnd.viewParms, &backEnd.orientation);
4803  GL_LoadModelViewMatrix(backEnd.orientation.modelViewMatrix);
4804 
4805  SetUniformMatrix16(UNIFORM_MODELVIEWPROJECTIONMATRIX, GLSTACK_MVPM);
4806 
4807  //R_DebugAxis(vec3_origin, matrixIdentity);
4808  //R_DebugBoundingBox(vec3_origin, ent->localBounds[0], ent->localBounds[1], colorMagenta);
4809 
4810  tess.multiDrawPrimitives = 0;
4811  tess.numIndexes = 0;
4812  tess.numVertexes = 0;
4813 
4814  if (r_dynamicEntityOcclusionCulling->integer)
4815  {
4816  if (!ent->occlusionQuerySamples)
4817  {
4818  Tess_AddCube(vec3_origin, ent->localBounds[0], ent->localBounds[1], colorRed);
4819  }
4820  else
4821  {
4822  Tess_AddCube(vec3_origin, ent->localBounds[0], ent->localBounds[1], colorGreen);
4823  }
4824  }
4825  else
4826  {
4827  Tess_AddCube(vec3_origin, ent->localBounds[0], ent->localBounds[1], colorBlue);
4828  }
4829 
4830  Tess_AddCube(vec3_origin, mins, maxs, colorWhite);
4831 
4832  Tess_UpdateVBOs(tess.attribsSet); // set by Tess_AddCube
4833  Tess_DrawElements();
4834 
4835  tess.multiDrawPrimitives = 0;
4836  tess.numIndexes = 0;
4837  tess.numVertexes = 0;
4838 
4839 
4840  // go back to the world modelview matrix
4841  //backEnd.orientation = backEnd.viewParms.world;
4842  //GL_LoadModelViewMatrix(backEnd.viewParms.world.modelViewMatrix);
4843 
4844  //R_DebugBoundingBox(vec3_origin, ent->worldBounds[0], ent->worldBounds[1], colorCyan);
4845  }
4846 
4847  // go back to the world modelview matrix
4848  backEnd.orientation = backEnd.viewParms.world;
4849  GL_LoadModelViewMatrix(backEnd.viewParms.world.modelViewMatrix);
4850  }
4851 
4852 #if defined(USE_REFENTITY_ANIMATIONSYSTEM)
4853  if (r_showSkeleton->integer)
4854  {
4855  int i, j, k, parentIndex;
4856  trRefEntity_t *ent;
4857  vec3_t origin, offset;
4858  vec3_t forward, right, up;
4859  vec3_t diff, tmp, tmp2, tmp3;
4860  vec_t length;
4861  vec4_t tetraVerts[4];
4862  static refSkeleton_t skeleton;
4863  refSkeleton_t *skel;
4864 
4865  SetMacrosAndSelectProgram(trProg.gl_genericShader);
4866 
4867  GL_Cull(CT_TWO_SIDED);
4868 
4869  // set uniforms
4870  GLSL_SetUniform_ColorModulate(trProg.gl_genericShader, CGEN_VERTEX, AGEN_VERTEX);
4871  SetUniformVec4(UNIFORM_COLOR, colorBlack);
4872 
4873  // bind u_ColorMap
4874  SelectTexture(TEX_COLOR);
4875  GL_Bind(tr.charsetImage);
4876 
4877  SetUniformMatrix16(UNIFORM_COLORTEXTUREMATRIX, matrixIdentity);
4878 
4879  ent = backEnd.refdef.entities;
4880  for (i = 0; i < backEnd.refdef.numEntities; i++, ent++)
4881  {
4882  if ((ent->e.renderfx & RF_THIRD_PERSON) && !backEnd.viewParms.isPortal)
4883  {
4884  continue;
4885  }
4886 
4887  // set up the transformation matrix
4888  R_RotateEntityForViewParms(ent, &backEnd.viewParms, &backEnd.orientation);
4889  GL_LoadModelViewMatrix(backEnd.orientation.modelViewMatrix);
4890 
4891  SetUniformMatrix16(UNIFORM_MODELVIEWPROJECTIONMATRIX, GLSTACK_MVPM);
4892 
4893  tess.multiDrawPrimitives = 0;
4894  tess.numVertexes = 0;
4895  tess.numIndexes = 0;
4896 
4897  skel = NULL;
4898  if (ent->e.skeleton.type == SK_ABSOLUTE)
4899  {
4900  skel = &ent->e.skeleton;
4901  }
4902  else
4903  {
4904  model_t *model;
4905  refBone_t *bone;
4906 
4907  model = R_GetModelByHandle(ent->e.hModel);
4908 
4909  if (model)
4910  {
4911  switch (model->type)
4912  {
4913  case MOD_MD5:
4914  {
4915  // copy absolute bones
4916  skeleton.numBones = model->md5->numBones;
4917  for (j = 0, bone = &skeleton.bones[0]; j < skeleton.numBones; j++, bone++)
4918  {
4919  #if defined(REFBONE_NAMES)
4920  Q_strncpyz(bone->name, model->md5->bones[j].name, sizeof(bone->name));
4921  #endif
4922 
4923  bone->parentIndex = model->md5->bones[j].parentIndex;
4924  VectorCopy(model->md5->bones[j].origin, bone->origin);
4925  VectorCopy(model->md5->bones[j].rotation, bone->rotation);
4926  }
4927 
4928  skel = &skeleton;
4929  break;
4930  }
4931  default:
4932  break;
4933  }
4934  }
4935  }
4936 
4937  if (skel)
4938  {
4939  static vec3_t worldOrigins[MAX_BONES];
4940 
4941  GL_State(GLS_POLYMODE_LINE | GLS_DEPTHTEST_DISABLE);
4942 
4943  for (j = 0; j < skel->numBones; j++)
4944  {
4945  parentIndex = skel->bones[j].parentIndex;
4946 
4947  if (parentIndex < 0)
4948  {
4949  VectorClear(origin);
4950  }
4951  else
4952  {
4953  VectorCopy(skel->bones[parentIndex].origin, origin);
4954  }
4955  VectorCopy(skel->bones[j].origin, offset);
4956  quat_to_vec3_FRU(skel->bones[j].rotation, forward, right, up);
4957 
4958  VectorSubtract(offset, origin, diff);
4959  if ((length = VectorNormalize(diff)))
4960  {
4961  PerpendicularVector(tmp, diff);
4962  //VectorCopy(up, tmp);
4963 
4964  VectorScale(tmp, length * 0.1f, tmp2);
4965  VectorMA(tmp2, length * 0.2f, diff, tmp2);
4966 
4967  for (k = 0; k < 3; k++)
4968  {
4969  RotatePointAroundVector(tmp3, diff, tmp2, k * 120);
4970  VectorAdd(tmp3, origin, tmp3);
4971  VectorCopy(tmp3, tetraVerts[k]);
4972  tetraVerts[k][3] = 1;
4973  }
4974 
4975  VectorCopy(origin, tetraVerts[3]);
4976  tetraVerts[3][3] = 1;
4977  Tess_AddTetrahedron(tetraVerts, g_color_table[ColorIndex(j)]);
4978 
4979  VectorCopy(offset, tetraVerts[3]);
4980  tetraVerts[3][3] = 1;
4981  Tess_AddTetrahedron(tetraVerts, g_color_table[ColorIndex(j)]);
4982  }
4983 
4984  mat4_transform_vec3(backEnd.orientation.transformMatrix, skel->bones[j].origin, worldOrigins[j]);
4985  }
4986 
4987  Tess_UpdateVBOs(ATTR_POSITION | ATTR_TEXCOORD | ATTR_COLOR);
4988 
4989  Tess_DrawElements();
4990 
4991  tess.multiDrawPrimitives = 0;
4992  tess.numVertexes = 0;
4993  tess.numIndexes = 0;
4994 
4995 #if defined(REFBONE_NAMES)
4996  {
4997  GL_State(GLS_DEPTHTEST_DISABLE | GLS_SRCBLEND_SRC_ALPHA | GLS_DSTBLEND_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA);
4998 
4999  // go back to the world modelview matrix
5000  backEnd.orientation = backEnd.viewParms.world;
5001  GL_LoadModelViewMatrix(backEnd.viewParms.world.modelViewMatrix);
5002  gl_genericShader->SetUniform_ModelViewProjectionMatrix(GLSTACK_MVPM);
5003 
5004  // draw names
5005  for (j = 0; j < skel->numBones; j++)
5006  {
5007  vec3_t left, up;
5008  float radius;
5009  vec3_t origin;
5010 
5011  // calculate the xyz locations for the four corners
5012  radius = 0.4;
5013  VectorScale(backEnd.viewParms.orientation.axis[1], radius, left);
5014  VectorScale(backEnd.viewParms.orientation.axis[2], radius, up);
5015 
5016  if (backEnd.viewParms.isMirror)
5017  {
5018  VectorSubtract(vec3_origin, left, left);
5019  }
5020 
5021  for (k = 0; k < strlen(skel->bones[j].name); k++)
5022  {
5023  int ch;
5024  int row, col;
5025  float frow, fcol;
5026  float size;
5027 
5028  ch = skel->bones[j].name[k];
5029  ch &= 255;
5030 
5031  if (ch == ' ')
5032  {
5033  break;
5034  }
5035 
5036  row = ch >> 4;
5037  col = ch & 15;
5038 
5039  frow = row * 0.0625;
5040  fcol = col * 0.0625;
5041  size = 0.0625;
5042 
5043  VectorMA(worldOrigins[j], -(k + 2.0f), left, origin);
5044  Tess_AddQuadStampExt(origin, left, up, colorWhite, fcol, frow, fcol + size, frow + size);
5045  }
5046 
5047  Tess_UpdateVBOs(ATTR_POSITION | ATTR_TEXCOORD | ATTR_COLOR);
5048 
5049  Tess_DrawElements();
5050 
5051  tess.multiDrawPrimitives = 0;
5052  tess.numVertexes = 0;
5053  tess.numIndexes = 0;
5054  }
5055  }
5056 #endif // REFBONE_NAMES
5057  }
5058 
5059  tess.multiDrawPrimitives = 0;
5060  tess.numVertexes = 0;
5061  tess.numIndexes = 0;
5062  }
5063  }
5064 #endif
5065 
5066  if (r_showLightScissors->integer)
5067  {
5068  interaction_t *ia;
5069  int iaCount;
5070  vec4_t quadVerts[4];
5071 
5072  SetMacrosAndSelectProgram(trProg.gl_genericShader);
5073 
5074  GL_State(GLS_POLYMODE_LINE | GLS_DEPTHTEST_DISABLE);
5075  GL_Cull(CT_TWO_SIDED);
5076 
5077  // set uniforms
5078  GLSL_SetUniform_ColorModulate(trProg.gl_genericShader, CGEN_CUSTOM_RGB, AGEN_CUSTOM);
5079 
5080  // bind u_ColorMap
5081  SelectTexture(TEX_COLOR);
5082  GL_Bind(tr.whiteImage);
5083 
5084  SetUniformMatrix16(UNIFORM_COLORTEXTUREMATRIX, matrixIdentity);
5085 
5086  // set 2D virtual screen size
5087  GL_PushMatrix();
5088  RB_SetViewMVPM();
5089 
5090  SetUniformMatrix16(UNIFORM_MODELVIEWPROJECTIONMATRIX, GLSTACK_MVPM);
5091 
5092  for (iaCount = 0, ia = &backEnd.viewParms.interactions[0]; iaCount < backEnd.viewParms.numInteractions; )
5093  {
5094  if (glConfig2.occlusionQueryBits)
5095  {
5096  if (!ia->occlusionQuerySamples)
5097  {
5098  SetUniformVec4(UNIFORM_COLOR, colorRed);
5099  }
5100  else
5101  {
5102  SetUniformVec4(UNIFORM_COLOR, colorGreen);
5103  }
5104 
5105  Vector4Set(quadVerts[0], ia->scissorX, ia->scissorY, 0, 1);
5106  Vector4Set(quadVerts[1], ia->scissorX + ia->scissorWidth - 1, ia->scissorY, 0, 1);
5107  Vector4Set(quadVerts[2], ia->scissorX + ia->scissorWidth - 1, ia->scissorY + ia->scissorHeight - 1, 0, 1);
5108  Vector4Set(quadVerts[3], ia->scissorX, ia->scissorY + ia->scissorHeight - 1, 0, 1);
5109  Tess_InstantQuad(quadVerts);
5110  }
5111  else
5112  {
5113  SetUniformVec4(UNIFORM_COLOR, colorWhite);
5114 
5115  Vector4Set(quadVerts[0], ia->scissorX, ia->scissorY, 0, 1);
5116  Vector4Set(quadVerts[1], ia->scissorX + ia->scissorWidth - 1, ia->scissorY, 0, 1);
5117  Vector4Set(quadVerts[2], ia->scissorX + ia->scissorWidth - 1, ia->scissorY + ia->scissorHeight - 1, 0, 1);
5118  Vector4Set(quadVerts[3], ia->scissorX, ia->scissorY + ia->scissorHeight - 1, 0, 1);
5119  Tess_InstantQuad(quadVerts);
5120  }
5121 
5122  if (!ia->next)
5123  {
5124  if (iaCount < (backEnd.viewParms.numInteractions - 1))
5125  {
5126  // jump to next interaction and continue
5127  ia++;
5128  iaCount++;
5129  }
5130  else
5131  {
5132  // increase last time to leave for loop
5133  iaCount++;
5134  }
5135  }
5136  else
5137  {
5138  // just continue
5139  ia = ia->next;
5140  iaCount++;
5141  }
5142  }
5143 
5144  GL_PopMatrix();
5145  }
5146 
5147  if (r_showCubeProbes->integer)
5148  {
5149  cubemapProbe_t *cubeProbe;
5150  int j;
5151  //vec4_t quadVerts[4];
5152  vec3_t mins = { -8, -8, -8 };
5153  vec3_t maxs = { 8, 8, 8 };
5154  //vec3_t viewOrigin;
5155 
5156  if (backEnd.refdef.rdflags & (RDF_NOWORLDMODEL | RDF_NOCUBEMAP))
5157  {
5158  return;
5159  }
5160 
5161  SetMacrosAndSelectProgram(trProg.gl_reflectionShader,
5162  USE_PORTAL_CLIPPING, backEnd.viewParms.isPortal,
5163  USE_VERTEX_SKINNING, qfalse,
5164  USE_VERTEX_ANIMATION, qfalse,
5165  USE_DEFORM_VERTEXES, qfalse,
5166  USE_NORMAL_MAPPING, qfalse);
5167  SetUniformVec3(UNIFORM_VIEWORIGIN, backEnd.viewParms.orientation.origin); // in world space
5168 
5169  GLSL_SetUniform_ColorModulate(trProg.gl_reflectionShader, CGEN_IDENTITY, AGEN_IDENTITY); //CGEN_CUSTOM_RGB, AGEN_CUSTOM);
5170  //GLSL_SetUniform_ColorModulate(trProg.gl_genericShader, CGEN_IDENTITY, AGEN_IDENTITY);
5171  SetUniformVec4(UNIFORM_COLOR, colorBlack);
5172 
5173  //GL_State(GLS_SRCBLEND_ONE | GLS_DSTBLEND_ZERO);
5174  GL_State(0);
5175  GL_Cull(CT_FRONT_SIDED); // the inside of the cube is textured, and the normals all point to the center of the cube: that's the front side (we don't want to see)
5176  SetUniformInt(UNIFORM_ALPHATEST, ATEST_NONE);
5177 
5178  // set up the transformation matrix
5179  backEnd.orientation = backEnd.viewParms.world;
5180  //GL_LoadModelViewMatrix(backEnd.orientation.modelViewMatrix);
5181  //SetUniformMatrix16(UNIFORM_MODELMATRIX, backEnd.orientation.transformMatrix);
5182  SetUniformMatrix16(UNIFORM_MODELMATRIX, MODEL_MATRIX);
5183  SetUniformMatrix16(UNIFORM_MODELVIEWPROJECTIONMATRIX, GLSTACK_MVPM);
5184  SetUniformMatrix16(UNIFORM_COLORTEXTUREMATRIX, matrixIdentity);
5185 
5186  GLSL_SetRequiredVertexPointers(trProg.gl_reflectionShader);
5187  //GLSL_SetRequiredVertexPointers(trProg.gl_genericShader);
5188 
5189  for (j = 0; j < tr.cubeProbes.currentElements; j++)
5190  {
5191  cubeProbe = (cubemapProbe_t *) Com_GrowListElement(&tr.cubeProbes, j);
5192 
5193  Tess_Begin(Tess_StageIteratorDebug, NULL, NULL, NULL, qtrue, qtrue, LIGHTMAP_NONE, FOG_NONE);
5194 #if 1
5195  // the glsl shader needs 2 cubemaps and an interpolation factor,
5196  // but now we just want to render a single cubemap..
5197  // so we pass on two of the same textures
5198 
5199  // bind u_EnvironmentMap0
5200  SelectTexture(TEX_ENVMAP0);
5201  GL_Bind(cubeProbe->cubemap);
5202 
5203  // bind u_EnvironmentMap1
5204  SelectTexture(TEX_ENVMAP1);
5205  GL_Bind(cubeProbe->cubemap);
5206 
5207  // u_EnvironmentInterpolation
5208  SetUniformFloat(UNIFORM_ENVIRONMENTINTERPOLATION, 1.0);
5209 #else
5210  SelectTexture(TEX_COLOR);
5211  GL_Bind(cubeProbe->cubemap);
5212 #endif
5213 
5214  Tess_AddCubeWithNormals(cubeProbe->origin, mins, maxs, colorWhite);
5215  Tess_End();
5216  }
5217  //Tess_UpdateVBOs(tess.attribsSet); // set by Tess_AddCube
5218 
5219 
5220 #if 0 // color the 2 closest cubeProbes (green/red/yellow?/blue?)
5221  // (disabled because, when you want to inspect a cubeProbe up close, no textures can be seen.. not handy)
5222  {
5223  cubemapProbe_t *cubeProbe1;
5224  cubemapProbe_t *cubeProbe2;
5225  float distance1, distance2;
5226 
5227  SetMacrosAndSelectProgram(trProg.gl_genericShader);
5228 
5229  GLSL_SetUniform_ColorModulate(trProg.gl_genericShader, CGEN_VERTEX, AGEN_VERTEX);
5230  SetUniformVec4(UNIFORM_COLOR, colorBlack);
5231 
5232  GLSL_SetRequiredVertexPointers(trProg.gl_genericShader);
5233 
5234  GL_State(GLS_DEFAULT);
5235  GL_Cull(CT_TWO_SIDED);
5236 
5237  // set uniforms
5238 
5239  // set up the transformation matrix
5240  backEnd.orientation = backEnd.viewParms.world;
5241  GL_LoadModelViewMatrix(backEnd.orientation.modelViewMatrix);
5242 
5243  SetUniformMatrix16(UNIFORM_MODELVIEWPROJECTIONMATRIX, GLSTACK_MVPM);
5244 
5245  // bind u_ColorMap
5246  SelectTexture(TEX_COLOR);
5247  GL_Bind(tr.whiteImage);
5248 
5249  SetUniformMatrix16(UNIFORM_COLORTEXTUREMATRIX, matrixIdentity);
5250 
5251  GL_CheckErrors();
5252 
5253  R_FindTwoNearestCubeMaps(backEnd.viewParms.orientation.origin, &cubeProbe1, &cubeProbe2, &distance1, &distance2);
5254 
5255  Tess_Begin(Tess_StageIteratorDebug, NULL, NULL, NULL, qtrue, qfalse, -1, 0);
5256 
5257  if (cubeProbe1 == NULL && cubeProbe2 == NULL)
5258  {
5259  // bad
5260  }
5261  else if (cubeProbe1 == NULL)
5262  {
5263  Tess_AddCubeWithNormals(cubeProbe2->origin, mins, maxs, colorBlue);
5264  }
5265  else if (cubeProbe2 == NULL)
5266  {
5267  Tess_AddCubeWithNormals(cubeProbe1->origin, mins, maxs, colorYellow);
5268  }
5269  else
5270  {
5271  Tess_AddCubeWithNormals(cubeProbe1->origin, mins, maxs, colorGreen);
5272  Tess_AddCubeWithNormals(cubeProbe2->origin, mins, maxs, colorRed);
5273  }
5274 
5275  Tess_End();
5276  }
5277 #endif
5278  // go back to the world modelview matrix
5279  backEnd.orientation = backEnd.viewParms.world;
5280  GL_LoadModelViewMatrix(backEnd.viewParms.world.modelViewMatrix);
5281  }
5282 
5283  if (r_showLightGrid->integer)
5284  {
5285  bspGridPoint_t *gridPoint;
5286  int j, k;
5287  vec3_t offset;
5288  vec3_t lightDirection;
5289  vec3_t tmp, tmp2, tmp3;
5290  vec_t length;
5291  vec4_t tetraVerts[4];
5292 
5293  if (backEnd.refdef.rdflags & (RDF_NOWORLDMODEL | RDF_NOCUBEMAP))
5294  {
5295  return;
5296  }
5297 
5298  Ren_LogComment("--- r_showLightGrid > 0: Rendering light grid\n");
5299 
5300  SetMacrosAndSelectProgram(trProg.gl_genericShader);
5301 
5302  GLSL_SetUniform_ColorModulate(trProg.gl_genericShader, CGEN_VERTEX, AGEN_VERTEX);
5303  SetUniformVec4(UNIFORM_COLOR, colorBlack);
5304 
5305  GLSL_SetRequiredVertexPointers(trProg.gl_genericShader);
5306 
5307  GL_State(GLS_DEFAULT);
5308  GL_Cull(CT_TWO_SIDED);
5309 
5310  // set uniforms
5311 
5312  // set up the transformation matrix
5313  backEnd.orientation = backEnd.viewParms.world;
5314  GL_LoadModelViewMatrix(backEnd.orientation.modelViewMatrix);
5315 
5316  SetUniformMatrix16(UNIFORM_MODELVIEWPROJECTIONMATRIX, GLSTACK_MVPM);
5317 
5318  // bind u_ColorMap
5319  SelectTexture(TEX_COLOR);
5320  GL_Bind(tr.whiteImage);
5321 
5322  SetUniformMatrix16(UNIFORM_COLORTEXTUREMATRIX, matrixIdentity);
5323 
5324  GL_CheckErrors();
5325 
5326  Tess_Begin(Tess_StageIteratorDebug, NULL, NULL, NULL, qtrue, qfalse, -1, 0);
5327 
5328  for (j = 0; j < tr.world->numLightGridPoints; j++)
5329  {
5330  gridPoint = &tr.world->lightGridData[j];
5331 
5332  if (VectorDistanceSquared(gridPoint->origin, backEnd.viewParms.orientation.origin) > Square(1024))
5333  {
5334  continue;
5335  }
5336 
5337  VectorNegate(gridPoint->direction, lightDirection);
5338 
5339  length = 8;
5340  VectorMA(gridPoint->origin, 8, lightDirection, offset);
5341 
5342  PerpendicularVector(tmp, lightDirection);
5343  //VectorCopy(up, tmp);
5344 
5345  VectorScale(tmp, length * 0.1f, tmp2);
5346  VectorMA(tmp2, length * 0.2f, lightDirection, tmp2);
5347 
5348  for (k = 0; k < 3; k++)
5349  {
5350  RotatePointAroundVector(tmp3, lightDirection, tmp2, k * 120);
5351  VectorAdd(tmp3, gridPoint->origin, tmp3);
5352  VectorCopy(tmp3, tetraVerts[k]);
5353  tetraVerts[k][3] = 1;
5354  }
5355 
5356  VectorCopy(gridPoint->origin, tetraVerts[3]);
5357  tetraVerts[3][3] = 1;
5358  Tess_AddTetrahedron(tetraVerts, gridPoint->directedColor);
5359 
5360  VectorCopy(offset, tetraVerts[3]);
5361  tetraVerts[3][3] = 1;
5362  Tess_AddTetrahedron(tetraVerts, gridPoint->directedColor);
5363  }
5364 
5365  Tess_End();
5366 
5367  // go back to the world modelview matrix
5368  backEnd.orientation = backEnd.viewParms.world;
5369  GL_LoadModelViewMatrix(backEnd.viewParms.world.modelViewMatrix);
5370  }
5371 
5372  if (r_showBspNodes->integer)
5373  {
5374  bspNode_t *node;
5375  link_t *l, *sentinel;
5376  int i;
5377 
5378  if ((backEnd.refdef.rdflags & (RDF_NOWORLDMODEL)) || !tr.world)
5379  {
5380  return;
5381  }
5382 
5383  SetMacrosAndSelectProgram(trProg.gl_genericShader);
5384 
5385  GLSL_SetUniform_ColorModulate(trProg.gl_genericShader, CGEN_CUSTOM_RGB, AGEN_CUSTOM);
5386 
5387  // bind u_ColorMap
5388  SelectTexture(TEX_COLOR);
5389  GL_Bind(tr.whiteImage);
5390 
5391  SetUniformMatrix16(UNIFORM_COLORTEXTUREMATRIX, matrixIdentity);
5392 
5393  GL_CheckErrors();
5394 
5395  for (i = 0; i < 2; i++)
5396  {
5397  float x, y, w, h;
5398  vec4_t quadVerts[4];
5399 
5400  if (i == 1)
5401  {
5402  // set 2D virtual screen size
5403  GL_PushMatrix();
5404  RB_SetViewMVPM();
5405  GL_Cull(CT_TWO_SIDED);
5406  GL_State(GLS_DEPTHTEST_DISABLE);
5407 
5408  SetUniformMatrix16(UNIFORM_MODELVIEWPROJECTIONMATRIX, GLSTACK_MVPM);
5409  SetUniformVec4(UNIFORM_COLOR, colorBlack);
5410 
5411  w = 300;
5412  h = 300;
5413 
5414  x = 20;
5415  y = 90;
5416 
5417  Vector4Set(quadVerts[0], x, y, 0, 1);
5418  Vector4Set(quadVerts[1], x + w, y, 0, 1);
