5419  Vector4Set(quadVerts[2], x + w, y + h, 0, 1);
5420  Vector4Set(quadVerts[3], x, y + h, 0, 1);
5421 
5422  Tess_InstantQuad(quadVerts);
5423 
5424  {
5425  int j;
5426  vec4_t splitFrustum[6];
5427  vec3_t farCorners[4];
5428  vec3_t nearCorners[4];
5429  vec3_t cropBounds[2];
5430  vec4_t point, transf;
5431 
5432  GL_Viewport(x, y, w, h);
5433  GL_Scissor(x, y, w, h);
5434 
5435  GL_PushMatrix();
5436 
5437  // calculate top down view projection matrix
5438  {
5439  vec3_t forward = { 0, 0, -1 };
5440  vec3_t up = { 1, 0, 0 };
5441  mat4_t viewMatrix, projectionMatrix; // rotationMatrix, transformMatrix,
5442 
5443  // Quake -> OpenGL view matrix from light perspective
5444 #if 0
5445  VectorToAngles(lightDirection, angles);
5446  MatrixFromAngles(rotationMatrix, angles[PITCH], angles[YAW], angles[ROLL]);
5447  MatrixSetupTransformFromRotation(transformMatrix, rotationMatrix, backEnd.viewParms.orientation.origin);
5448  MatrixAffineInverse(transformMatrix, viewMatrix);
5449  MatrixMultiplyMOD(quakeToOpenGLMatrix, viewMatrix, light->viewMatrix);
5450 #else
5451  MatrixLookAtRH(viewMatrix, backEnd.viewParms.orientation.origin, forward, up);
5452 #endif
5453 
5454  //ClearBounds(splitFrustumBounds[0], splitFrustumBounds[1]);
5455  //BoundsAdd(splitFrustumBounds[0], splitFrustumBounds[1], backEnd.viewParms.visBounds[0], backEnd.viewParms.visBounds[1]);
5456  //BoundsAdd(splitFrustumBounds[0], splitFrustumBounds[1], light->worldBounds[0], light->worldBounds[1]);
5457 
5458  ClearBounds(cropBounds[0], cropBounds[1]);
5459  for (j = 0; j < 8; j++)
5460  {
5461  point[0] = tr.world->models[0].bounds[j & 1][0];
5462  point[1] = tr.world->models[0].bounds[(j >> 1) & 1][1];
5463  point[2] = tr.world->models[0].bounds[(j >> 2) & 1][2];
5464  point[3] = 1;
5465 
5466  mat4_transform_vec4(viewMatrix, point, transf);
5467  transf[0] /= transf[3];
5468  transf[1] /= transf[3];
5469  transf[2] /= transf[3];
5470 
5471  AddPointToBounds(transf, cropBounds[0], cropBounds[1]);
5472  }
5473 
5474 
5475  MatrixOrthogonalProjectionRH(projectionMatrix, cropBounds[0][0], cropBounds[1][0], cropBounds[0][1], cropBounds[1][1], -cropBounds[1][2], -cropBounds[0][2]);
5476 
5477  GL_LoadModelViewMatrix(viewMatrix);
5478  GL_LoadProjectionMatrix(projectionMatrix);
5479  }
5480 
5481  // set uniforms
5482  GLSL_SetUniform_ColorModulate(trProg.gl_genericShader, CGEN_VERTEX, AGEN_VERTEX);
5483  SetUniformVec4(UNIFORM_COLOR, colorBlack);
5484 
5485  GL_State(GLS_POLYMODE_LINE | GLS_DEPTHTEST_DISABLE);
5486  GL_Cull(CT_TWO_SIDED);
5487 
5488  // bind u_ColorMap
5489  SelectTexture(TEX_COLOR);
5490  GL_Bind(tr.whiteImage);
5491 
5492  SetUniformMatrix16(UNIFORM_COLORTEXTUREMATRIX, matrixIdentity);
5493  SetUniformMatrix16(UNIFORM_MODELVIEWPROJECTIONMATRIX, GLSTACK_MVPM);
5494 
5495  tess.multiDrawPrimitives = 0;
5496  tess.numIndexes = 0;
5497  tess.numVertexes = 0;
5498 
5499  for (j = 0; j < 6; j++)
5500  {
5501  VectorCopy(backEnd.viewParms.frustums[0][j].normal, splitFrustum[j]);
5502  splitFrustum[j][3] = backEnd.viewParms.frustums[0][j].dist;
5503  }
5504 
5505  // calculate split frustum corner points
5506  PlanesGetIntersectionPoint(splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_LEFT], splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_TOP], splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_NEAR], nearCorners[0]);
5507  PlanesGetIntersectionPoint(splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_RIGHT], splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_TOP], splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_NEAR], nearCorners[1]);
5508  PlanesGetIntersectionPoint(splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_RIGHT], splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_BOTTOM], splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_NEAR], nearCorners[2]);
5509  PlanesGetIntersectionPoint(splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_LEFT], splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_BOTTOM], splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_NEAR], nearCorners[3]);
5510 
5511  PlanesGetIntersectionPoint(splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_LEFT], splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_TOP], splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_FAR], farCorners[0]);
5512  PlanesGetIntersectionPoint(splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_RIGHT], splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_TOP], splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_FAR], farCorners[1]);
5513  PlanesGetIntersectionPoint(splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_RIGHT], splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_BOTTOM], splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_FAR], farCorners[2]);
5514  PlanesGetIntersectionPoint(splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_LEFT], splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_BOTTOM], splitFrustum[FRUSTUM_FAR], farCorners[3]);
5515 
5516  // draw outer surfaces
5517  for (j = 0; j < 4; j++)
5518  {
5519  Vector4Set(quadVerts[0], nearCorners[j][0], nearCorners[j][1], nearCorners[j][2], 1);
5520  Vector4Set(quadVerts[1], farCorners[j][0], farCorners[j][1], farCorners[j][2], 1);
5521  Vector4Set(quadVerts[2], farCorners[(j + 1) % 4][0], farCorners[(j + 1) % 4][1], farCorners[(j + 1) % 4][2], 1);
5522  Vector4Set(quadVerts[3], nearCorners[(j + 1) % 4][0], nearCorners[(j + 1) % 4][1], nearCorners[(j + 1) % 4][2], 1);
5523  Tess_AddQuadStamp2(quadVerts, colorCyan);
5524  }
5525 
5526  // draw far cap
5527  Vector4Set(quadVerts[0], farCorners[3][0], farCorners[3][1], farCorners[3][2], 1);
5528  Vector4Set(quadVerts[1], farCorners[2][0], farCorners[2][1], farCorners[2][2], 1);
5529  Vector4Set(quadVerts[2], farCorners[1][0], farCorners[1][1], farCorners[1][2], 1);
5530  Vector4Set(quadVerts[3], farCorners[0][0], farCorners[0][1], farCorners[0][2], 1);
5531  Tess_AddQuadStamp2(quadVerts, colorBlue);
5532 
5533  // draw near cap
5534  Vector4Set(quadVerts[0], nearCorners[0][0], nearCorners[0][1], nearCorners[0][2], 1);
5535  Vector4Set(quadVerts[1], nearCorners[1][0], nearCorners[1][1], nearCorners[1][2], 1);
5536  Vector4Set(quadVerts[2], nearCorners[2][0], nearCorners[2][1], nearCorners[2][2], 1);
5537  Vector4Set(quadVerts[3], nearCorners[3][0], nearCorners[3][1], nearCorners[3][2], 1);
5538  Tess_AddQuadStamp2(quadVerts, colorGreen);
5539 
5540  Tess_UpdateVBOs(tess.attribsSet); // set by Tess_AddQuadStamp2
5541  Tess_DrawElements();
5542 
5543  GLSL_SetUniform_ColorModulate(trProg.gl_genericShader, CGEN_CUSTOM_RGB, AGEN_CUSTOM);
5544  }
5545  } // i == 1
5546  else
5547  {
5548  GL_State(GLS_POLYMODE_LINE | GLS_DEPTHTEST_DISABLE);
5549  GL_Cull(CT_TWO_SIDED);
5550 
5551  // render in world space
5552  backEnd.orientation = backEnd.viewParms.world;
5553 
5554  GL_LoadProjectionMatrix(backEnd.viewParms.projectionMatrix);
5555  GL_LoadModelViewMatrix(backEnd.viewParms.world.modelViewMatrix);
5556 
5557  SetUniformMatrix16(UNIFORM_MODELVIEWPROJECTIONMATRIX, GLSTACK_MVPM);
5558  }
5559 
5560  // draw BSP nodes
5561  sentinel = &tr.traversalStack;
5562  for (l = sentinel->next; l != sentinel; l = l->next)
5563  {
5564  node = (bspNode_t *) l->data;
5565 
5566  if (!r_dynamicBspOcclusionCulling->integer)
5567  {
5568  if (node->contents != -1)
5569  {
5570  if (r_showBspNodes->integer == 3)
5571  {
5572  continue;
5573  }
5574 
5575  if (node->numMarkSurfaces <= 0)
5576  {
5577  continue;
5578  }
5579 
5580  if (node->visCounts[tr.visIndex] == tr.visCounts[tr.visIndex])
5581  {
5582  SetUniformVec4(UNIFORM_COLOR, colorGreen);
5583  }
5584  else
5585  {
5586  SetUniformVec4(UNIFORM_COLOR, colorRed);
5587  }
5588  }
5589  else
5590  {
5591  if (r_showBspNodes->integer == 2)
5592  {
5593  continue;
5594  }
5595 
5596  if (node->visCounts[tr.visIndex] == tr.visCounts[tr.visIndex])
5597  {
5598  SetUniformVec4(UNIFORM_COLOR, colorYellow);
5599  }
5600  else
5601  {
5602  SetUniformVec4(UNIFORM_COLOR, colorBlue);
5603  }
5604  }
5605  }
5606  else
5607  {
5608  if (node->lastVisited[backEnd.viewParms.viewCount] != backEnd.viewParms.frameCount)
5609  {
5610  continue;
5611  }
5612 
5613  if (r_showBspNodes->integer == 5 && node->lastQueried[backEnd.viewParms.viewCount] != backEnd.viewParms.frameCount)
5614  {
5615  continue;
5616  }
5617 
5618  if (node->contents != -1)
5619  {
5620  if (r_showBspNodes->integer == 3)
5621  {
5622  continue;
5623  }
5624 
5625  //if(node->occlusionQuerySamples[backEnd.viewParms.viewCount] > 0)
5626  if (node->visible[backEnd.viewParms.viewCount])
5627  {
5628  SetUniformVec4(UNIFORM_COLOR, colorGreen);
5629  }
5630  else
5631  {
5632  SetUniformVec4(UNIFORM_COLOR, colorRed);
5633  }
5634  }
5635  else
5636  {
5637  if (r_showBspNodes->integer == 2)
5638  {
5639  continue;
5640  }
5641 
5642  //if(node->occlusionQuerySamples[backEnd.viewParms.viewCount] > 0)
5643  if (node->visible[backEnd.viewParms.viewCount])
5644  {
5645  SetUniformVec4(UNIFORM_COLOR, colorYellow);
5646  }
5647  else
5648  {
5649  SetUniformVec4(UNIFORM_COLOR, colorBlue);
5650  }
5651  }
5652 
5653  if (r_showBspNodes->integer == 4)
5654  {
5655  SetUniformVec4(UNIFORM_COLOR, g_color_table[ColorIndex(node->occlusionQueryNumbers[backEnd.viewParms.viewCount])]);
5656  }
5657 
5658  GL_CheckErrors();
5659  }
5660 
5661  if (node->contents != -1)
5662  {
5663  glEnable(GL_POLYGON_OFFSET_FILL);
5664  GL_PolygonOffset(r_offsetFactor->value, r_offsetUnits->value);
5665  }
5666 
5667  R_BindVBO(node->volumeVBO);
5668  R_BindIBO(node->volumeIBO);
5669 
5670  GLSL_VertexAttribsState(ATTR_POSITION);
5671 
5672  tess.multiDrawPrimitives = 0;
5673  tess.numVertexes = node->volumeVerts;
5674  tess.numIndexes = node->volumeIndexes;
5675 
5676  Tess_DrawElements();
5677 
5678  tess.numIndexes = 0;
5679  tess.numVertexes = 0;
5680 
5681  if (node->contents != -1)
5682  {
5683  glDisable(GL_POLYGON_OFFSET_FILL);
5684  }
5685  }
5686 
5687  if (i == 1)
5688  {
5689  tess.multiDrawPrimitives = 0;
5690  tess.numIndexes = 0;
5691  tess.numVertexes = 0;
5692 
5693  GL_PopMatrix();
5694 
5695  GL_Viewport(backEnd.viewParms.viewportX, backEnd.viewParms.viewportY,
5696  backEnd.viewParms.viewportWidth, backEnd.viewParms.viewportHeight);
5697 
5698  GL_Scissor(backEnd.viewParms.viewportX, backEnd.viewParms.viewportY,
5699  backEnd.viewParms.viewportWidth, backEnd.viewParms.viewportHeight);
5700 
5701  GL_PopMatrix();
5702  }
5703  }
5704 
5705  // go back to the world modelview matrix
5706  backEnd.orientation = backEnd.viewParms.world;
5707 
5708  GL_LoadProjectionMatrix(backEnd.viewParms.projectionMatrix);
5709  GL_LoadModelViewMatrix(backEnd.viewParms.world.modelViewMatrix);
5710  }
5711 
5712  if (r_showDecalProjectors->integer)
5713  {
5714  int i;
5715  decalProjector_t *dp;
5716  srfDecal_t *srfDecal;
5717  vec3_t mins = { -1, -1, -1 };
5718  vec3_t maxs = { 1, 1, 1 };
5719 
5720  if (backEnd.refdef.rdflags & (RDF_NOWORLDMODEL))
5721  {
5722  return;
5723  }
5724 
5725  SetMacrosAndSelectProgram(trProg.gl_genericShader);
5726 
5727  GL_State(GLS_POLYMODE_LINE | GLS_DEPTHTEST_DISABLE);
5728  GL_Cull(CT_TWO_SIDED);
5729 
5730  // set uniforms
5731  GLSL_SetUniform_ColorModulate(trProg.gl_genericShader, CGEN_VERTEX, AGEN_VERTEX);
5732  SetUniformVec4(UNIFORM_COLOR, colorBlack);
5733 
5734  // set up the transformation matrix
5735  backEnd.orientation = backEnd.viewParms.world;
5736  GL_LoadModelViewMatrix(backEnd.orientation.modelViewMatrix);
5737 
5738  SetUniformMatrix16(UNIFORM_MODELVIEWPROJECTIONMATRIX, GLSTACK_MVPM);
5739 
5740  // bind u_ColorMap
5741  SelectTexture(TEX_COLOR);
5742  GL_Bind(tr.whiteImage);
5743 
5744  SetUniformMatrix16(UNIFORM_COLORTEXTUREMATRIX, matrixIdentity);
5745 
5746  GL_CheckErrors();
5747 
5748  Tess_Begin(Tess_StageIteratorDebug, NULL, NULL, NULL, qtrue, qfalse, -1, 0);
5749 
5750  for (i = 0, dp = backEnd.refdef.decalProjectors; i < backEnd.refdef.numDecalProjectors; i++, dp++)
5751  {
5752  if (VectorDistanceSquared(dp->center, backEnd.viewParms.orientation.origin) > Square(1024))
5753  {
5754  continue;
5755  }
5756 
5757  Tess_AddCube(dp->center, mins, maxs, colorRed);
5758  Tess_AddCube(vec3_origin, dp->mins, dp->maxs, colorBlue);
5759  }
5760 
5761  glEnable(GL_POLYGON_OFFSET_FILL);
5762  GL_PolygonOffset(r_offsetFactor->value, r_offsetUnits->value);
5763 
5764  for (i = 0, srfDecal = backEnd.refdef.decals; i < backEnd.refdef.numDecals; i++, srfDecal++)
5765  {
5766  rb_surfaceTable[SF_DECAL] (srfDecal);
5767  }
5768 
5769  glDisable(GL_POLYGON_OFFSET_FILL);
5770 
5771  Tess_End();
5772 
5773  // go back to the world modelview matrix
5774  //backEnd.orientation = backEnd.viewParms.world;
5775  //GL_LoadModelViewMatrix(backEnd.viewParms.world.modelViewMatrix);
5776  }
5777 
5778  GL_CheckErrors();
5779 }
5780 
5784 static void RB_RenderViewFront(void)
5785 {
5786  // Forward shading path
5787  int clearBits = 0;
5788  int startTime = 0;
5789 
5790  // sync with gl if needed
5791  if (r_finish->integer == 1 && !glState.finishCalled)
5792  {
5793  GL_JOIN();
5794  glState.finishCalled = qtrue;
5795  }
5796  if (r_finish->integer == 0)
5797  {
5798  glState.finishCalled = qtrue;
5799  }
5800 
5801  // disable offscreen rendering
5802  if (glConfig2.framebufferObjectAvailable)
5803  {
5804  if (r_hdrRendering->integer && glConfig2.textureFloatAvailable)
5805  {
5806  R_BindFBO(tr.deferredRenderFBO);
5807  }
5808  else
5809  {
5810  R_BindNullFBO();
5811  }
5812  }
5813 
5814  // we will need to change the projection matrix before drawing
5815  // 2D images again
5816  backEnd.projection2D = qfalse;
5817 
5818  // set the modelview matrix for the viewer
5819  SetViewportAndScissor();
5820 
5821  // ensures that depth writes are enabled for the depth clear
5822  GL_State(GLS_DEFAULT);
5823 
5824  // clear relevant buffers
5825  clearBits = GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT;
5826 
5827  if (r_measureOverdraw->integer)
5828  {
5829  clearBits |= GL_STENCIL_BUFFER_BIT;
5830  }
5831  // global q3 fog volume
5832  else if (tr.world && tr.world->globalFog >= 0)
5833  {
5834  clearBits |= GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT;
5835 
5836  if (!(backEnd.refdef.rdflags & RDF_NOWORLDMODEL))
5837  {
5838  clearBits |= GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT;
5839 
5840  GL_ClearColor(tr.world->fogs[tr.world->globalFog].color[0],
5841  tr.world->fogs[tr.world->globalFog].color[1],
5842  tr.world->fogs[tr.world->globalFog].color[2], 1.0);
5843  }
5844  }
5845  else if (tr.world && tr.world->hasSkyboxPortal)
5846  {
5847  if (backEnd.refdef.rdflags & RDF_SKYBOXPORTAL)
5848  {
5849  // portal scene, clear whatever is necessary
5850  clearBits |= GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT;
5851 
5852  if (r_fastSky->integer || (backEnd.refdef.rdflags & RDF_NOWORLDMODEL))
5853  {
5854  // fastsky: clear color
5855 
5856  // try clearing first with the portal sky fog color, then the world fog color, then finally a default
5857  clearBits |= GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT;
5858  if (tr.glfogsettings[FOG_PORTALVIEW].registered)
5859  {
5860  GL_ClearColor(tr.glfogsettings[FOG_PORTALVIEW].color[0], tr.glfogsettings[FOG_PORTALVIEW].color[1],
5861  tr.glfogsettings[FOG_PORTALVIEW].color[2], tr.glfogsettings[FOG_PORTALVIEW].color[3]);
5862  }
5863  else if (tr.glfogNum > FOG_NONE && tr.glfogsettings[FOG_CURRENT].registered)
5864  {
5865  GL_ClearColor(tr.glfogsettings[FOG_CURRENT].color[0], tr.glfogsettings[FOG_CURRENT].color[1],
5866  tr.glfogsettings[FOG_CURRENT].color[2], tr.glfogsettings[FOG_CURRENT].color[3]);
5867  }
5868  else
5869  {
5870  //GL_ClearColor(GLCOLOR_RED); // red clear for testing portal sky clear
5871  GL_ClearColor(0.5f, 0.5f, 0.5f, 1.0f);
5872  }
5873  }
5874  else
5875  {
5876  // rendered sky (either clear color or draw quake sky)
5877  if (tr.glfogsettings[FOG_PORTALVIEW].registered)
5878  {
5879  GL_ClearColor(tr.glfogsettings[FOG_PORTALVIEW].color[0], tr.glfogsettings[FOG_PORTALVIEW].color[1],
5880  tr.glfogsettings[FOG_PORTALVIEW].color[2], tr.glfogsettings[FOG_PORTALVIEW].color[3]);
5881 
5882  if (tr.glfogsettings[FOG_PORTALVIEW].clearscreen)
5883  {
5884  // portal fog requests a screen clear (distance fog rather than quake sky)
5885  clearBits |= GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT;
5886  }
5887  }
5888  }
5889  }
5890  else
5891  {
5892  // world scene with portal sky, don't clear any buffers, just set the fog color if there is one
5893  clearBits |= GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT; // this will go when I get the portal sky rendering way out in the zbuffer (or not writing to zbuffer at all)
5894 
5895  if (tr.glfogNum > FOG_NONE && tr.glfogsettings[FOG_CURRENT].registered)
5896  {
5897  if (backEnd.refdef.rdflags & RDF_UNDERWATER)
5898  {
5899  if (tr.glfogsettings[FOG_CURRENT].mode == GL_LINEAR)
5900  {
5901  clearBits |= GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT;
5902  }
5903  }
5904  else if (!r_portalSky->integer)
5905  {
5906  // portal skies have been manually turned off, clear bg color
5907  clearBits |= GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT;
5908  }
5909 
5910  GL_ClearColor(tr.glfogsettings[FOG_CURRENT].color[0], tr.glfogsettings[FOG_CURRENT].color[1],
5911  tr.glfogsettings[FOG_CURRENT].color[2], tr.glfogsettings[FOG_CURRENT].color[3]);
5912  }
5913  else if (!r_portalSky->integer)
5914  {
5915  // portal skies have been manually turned off, clear bg color
5916  clearBits |= GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT;
5917  GL_ClearColor(0.5f, 0.5f, 0.5f, 1.0f);
5918  }
5919  }
5920  }
5921  else
5922  {
5923  // world scene with no portal sky
5924  clearBits |= GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT;
5925 
5926  // we don't want to clear the buffer when no world model is specified
5927  if (backEnd.refdef.rdflags & RDF_NOWORLDMODEL)
5928  {
5929  clearBits &= ~GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT;
5930  }
5931  else if (r_fastSky->integer || (backEnd.refdef.rdflags & RDF_NOWORLDMODEL))
5932  {
5933  clearBits |= GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT;
5934 
5935  if (tr.glfogsettings[FOG_CURRENT].registered)
5936  {
5937  // try to clear fastsky with current fog color
5938  GL_ClearColor(tr.glfogsettings[FOG_CURRENT].color[0], tr.glfogsettings[FOG_CURRENT].color[1],
5939  tr.glfogsettings[FOG_CURRENT].color[2], tr.glfogsettings[FOG_CURRENT].color[3]);
5940  }
5941  else
5942  {
5943  //GL_ClearColor(GLCOLOR_BLUE); // blue clear for testing world sky clear
5944  GL_ClearColor(0.05f, 0.05f, 0.05f, 1.0f); // changed per id req was 0.5s
5945  }
5946  }
5947  else
5948  {
5949  // world scene, no portal sky, not fastsky, clear color if fog says to, otherwise, just set the clearcolor
5950  if (tr.glfogsettings[FOG_CURRENT].registered)
5951  {
5952  // try to clear fastsky with current fog color
5953  GL_ClearColor(tr.glfogsettings[FOG_CURRENT].color[0], tr.glfogsettings[FOG_CURRENT].color[1],
5954  tr.glfogsettings[FOG_CURRENT].color[2], tr.glfogsettings[FOG_CURRENT].color[3]);
5955 
5956  if (tr.glfogsettings[FOG_CURRENT].clearscreen)
5957  {
5958  // world fog requests a screen clear (distance fog rather than quake sky)
5959  clearBits |= GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT;
5960  }
5961  }
5962  }
5963 
5964  if (HDR_ENABLED())
5965  {
5966  // copy color of the main context to deferredRenderFBO
5967  R_CopyToFBO(NULL, tr.deferredRenderFBO, GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT, GL_NEAREST);
5968  }
5969  }
5970 
5971  GL_Clear(clearBits);
5972 
5973  if ((backEnd.refdef.rdflags & RDF_HYPERSPACE))
5974  {
5975  RB_Hyperspace();
5976  return;
5977  }
5978  else
5979  {
5980  backEnd.isHyperspace = qfalse;
5981  }
5982 
5983  glState.faceCulling = -1; // force face culling to set next time
5984 
5985  // we will only draw a sun if there was sky rendered in this view
5986  backEnd.skyRenderedThisView = qfalse;
5987 
5988  GL_CheckErrors();
5989 
5990  R2_TIMING(RSPEEDS_SHADING_TIMES)
5991  {
5992  startTime = ri.Milliseconds();
5993  }
5994 
5995  if (r_dynamicEntityOcclusionCulling->integer)
5996  {
5997  // draw everything from world that is opaque into black so we can benefit from early-z rejections later
5998  //RB_RenderOpaqueSurfacesIntoDepth(true);
5999  RB_RenderDrawSurfaces(qtrue, DRAWSURFACES_WORLD_ONLY);
6000 
6001  // try to cull entities using hardware occlusion queries
6002  RB_RenderEntityOcclusionQueries();
6003 
6004  // draw everything that is opaque
6005  RB_RenderDrawSurfaces(qtrue, DRAWSURFACES_ENTITIES_ONLY);
6006  }
6007  else
6008  {
6009  // draw everything that is opaque
6010  RB_RenderDrawSurfaces(qtrue, DRAWSURFACES_ALL);
6011 
6012  // try to cull entities using hardware occlusion queries
6013  //RB_RenderEntityOcclusionQueries();
6014  }
6015 
6016  // try to cull bsp nodes for the next frame using hardware occlusion queries
6017  RB_RenderBspOcclusionQueries();
6018 
6019  R2_TIMING(RSPEEDS_SHADING_TIMES)
6020  {
6021  backEnd.pc.c_forwardAmbientTime = ri.Milliseconds() - startTime;
6022  }
6023 
6024  // try to cull lights using hardware occlusion queries
6025  RB_RenderLightOcclusionQueries();
6026 
6027  if (r_shadows->integer >= SHADOWING_ESM16)
6028  {
6029  // render dynamic shadowing and lighting using shadow mapping
6030  RB_RenderInteractionsShadowMapped();
6031 
6032  // render player shadows if any
6033  //RB_RenderInteractionsDeferredInverseShadows();
6034  }
6035  else
6036  {
6037  // render dynamic lighting
6038  RB_RenderInteractions();
6039  }
6040 
6041  // render ambient occlusion process effect
6042  // needs way more work
6043  RB_RenderScreenSpaceAmbientOcclusion();
6044 
6045  if (HDR_ENABLED())
6046  {
6047  R_BindFBO(tr.deferredRenderFBO);
6048  }
6049 
6050  // render global fog post process effect
6051  RB_RenderGlobalFog();
6052 
6053  // draw everything that is translucent
6054  RB_RenderDrawSurfaces(qfalse, DRAWSURFACES_ALL);
6055 
6056  // scale down rendered HDR scene to 1 / 4th
6057  if (HDR_ENABLED())
6058  {
6059  if (glConfig2.framebufferBlitAvailable)
6060  {
6061  R_CopyToFBO(tr.deferredRenderFBO, tr.downScaleFBO_quarter, GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT, GL_LINEAR);
6062  R_CopyToFBO(tr.deferredRenderFBO, tr.downScaleFBO_64x64, GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT, GL_LINEAR);
6063  }
6064  else
6065  {
6066  // FIXME add non EXT_framebuffer_blit code
6067  }
6068 
6069  RB_CalculateAdaptation();
6070  }
6071  else
6072  {
6073  /*
6074  FIXME this causes: caught OpenGL error:
6075  GL_INVALID_OPERATION in file code/renderer/tr_backend.c line 6479
6076 
6077  if(glConfig2.framebufferBlitAvailable)
6078  {
6079  // copy deferredRenderFBO to downScaleFBO_quarter
6080  R_CopyToFBO(NULL,tr.downScaleFBO_quarter,GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT,GL_NEAREST);
6081  }
6082  else
6083  {
6084  // FIXME add non EXT_framebuffer_blit code
6085  }
6086  */
6087  }
6088 
6089  GL_CheckErrors();
6090 
6091  // render depth of field post process effect
6092  RB_RenderDepthOfField();
6093 
6094  // render bloom post process effect
6095  RB_RenderBloom();
6096 
6097  // copy offscreen rendered HDR scene to the current OpenGL context
6098  RB_RenderHDRResultToFrameBuffer();
6099 
6100  // render rotoscope post process effect
6101  RB_RenderRotoscope();
6102 
6103  // add the sun flare
6104  RB_DrawSun();
6105 
6106  // add light flares on lights that aren't obscured
6107  RB_RenderFlares();
6108 
6109  // wait until all bsp node occlusion queries are back
6110  RB_CollectBspOcclusionQueries();
6111 
6112  // render debug information
6113  RB_RenderDebugUtils();
6114 
6115  if (backEnd.viewParms.isPortal)
6116  {
6117 #if 0
6118  if (r_hdrRendering->integer && glConfig.textureFloatAvailable && glConfig.framebufferObjectAvailable && glConfig.framebufferBlitAvailable)
6119  {
6120  // copy deferredRenderFBO to portalRenderFBO
6121  R_CopyToFBO(tr.deferredRenderFBO, tr.portalRenderFBO, GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT, GL_NEAREST);
6122  }
6123 #endif
6124 #if 0
6125  // FIXME: this trashes the OpenGL context for an unknown reason
6126  if (glConfig2.framebufferObjectAvailable && glConfig2.framebufferBlitAvailable)
6127  {
6128  // copy main context to portalRenderFBO
6129  R_CopyToFBO(NULL, tr.portalRenderFBO, GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT, GL_NEAREST);
6130  }
6131 #endif
6132  //else
6133  {
6134  // capture current color buffer
6135  GL_SelectTexture(0);
6136  ImageCopyBackBuffer(tr.portalRenderImage);
6137  }
6138  backEnd.pc.c_portals++;
6139  }
6140 
6141 #if 0
6142  if (r_dynamicBspOcclusionCulling->integer)
6143  {
6144  // copy depth of the main context to deferredRenderFBO
6145  R_CopyToFBO(NULL, tr.occlusionRenderFBO, GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT, GL_NEAREST);
6146  }
6147 #endif
6148 }
6149 
6153 static void RB_RenderView(void)
6154 {
6155  Ren_LogComment("--- RB_RenderView( %i surfaces, %i interactions ) ---\n", backEnd.viewParms.numDrawSurfs, backEnd.viewParms.numInteractions);
6156 
6157  //Ren_Fatal( "test");
6158 
6159  GL_CheckErrors();
6160 
6161  backEnd.pc.c_surfaces += backEnd.viewParms.numDrawSurfs;
6162 
6163  RB_RenderViewFront();
6164 
6165  // render chromatric aberration
6166  RB_CameraPostFX();
6167 
6168  // copy to given byte buffer that is NOT a FBO
6169  if (tr.refdef.pixelTarget != NULL)
6170  {
6171  int i;
6172 
6173  // need to convert Y axis
6174 #if 0
6175  glReadPixels(0, 0, tr.refdef.pixelTargetWidth, tr.refdef.pixelTargetHeight, GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, tr.refdef.pixelTarget);
6176 #else
6177  // Bugfix: drivers absolutely hate running in high res and using glReadPixels near the top or bottom edge.
6178  // Soo.. lets do it in the middle.
6179  glReadPixels(glConfig.vidWidth / 2, glConfig.vidHeight / 2, tr.refdef.pixelTargetWidth, tr.refdef.pixelTargetHeight, GL_RGBA,
6180  GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, tr.refdef.pixelTarget);
6181 #endif
6182 
6183  for (i = 0; i < tr.refdef.pixelTargetWidth * tr.refdef.pixelTargetHeight; i++)
6184  {
6185  tr.refdef.pixelTarget[(i * 4) + 3] = 255; //set the alpha pure white
6186  }
6187  }
6188 
6189  GL_CheckErrors();
6190 
6191  backEnd.pc.c_views++;
6192 }
6193 
6194 /*
6195 ============================================================================
6196 RENDER BACK END THREAD FUNCTIONS
6197 ============================================================================
6198 */
6199 
6216 void RE_StretchRaw(int x, int y, int w, int h, int cols, int rows, const byte *data, int client, qboolean dirty)
6217 {
6218  //int i, j;
6219  int start, end;
6220 
6221  if (!tr.registered)
6222  {
6223  return;
6224  }
6225  R_IssuePendingRenderCommands();
6226 
6227  // we definately want to sync every frame for the cinematics
6228  GL_JOIN();
6229 
6230  start = end = 0;
6231  if (r_speeds->integer)
6232  {
6233  start = ri.Milliseconds();
6234  }
6235 
6236  // make sure rows and cols are powers of 2
6237  // In opengl 3.2 NPOT textures are a part of the core
6238  /*
6239  for (i = 0; (1 << i) < cols; i++)
6240  {
6241  }
6242  for (j = 0; (1 << j) < rows; j++)
6243  {
6244  }
6245  if ((1 << i) != cols || (1 << j) != rows)
6246  {
6247  Ren_Drop("Draw_StretchRaw: size not a power of 2: %i by %i", cols, rows);
6248  }
6249  */
6250 
6251 
6252  RB_SetGL2D();
6253 
6254  glVertexAttrib4f(ATTR_INDEX_NORMAL, 0, 0, 1, 1);
6255  glVertexAttrib4f(ATTR_INDEX_COLOR, tr.identityLight, tr.identityLight, tr.identityLight, 1);
6256 
6257  SetMacrosAndSelectProgram(trProg.gl_genericShader);
6258 
6259  GLSL_SetUniform_ColorModulate(trProg.gl_genericShader, CGEN_VERTEX, AGEN_VERTEX);
6260  SetUniformVec4(UNIFORM_COLOR, colorBlack);
6261 
6262  SetUniformMatrix16(UNIFORM_MODELVIEWPROJECTIONMATRIX, GLSTACK_MVPM);
6263 
6264  // bind u_ColorMap
6265  SelectTexture(TEX_COLOR);
6266  GL_Bind(tr.scratchImage[client]);
6267 
6268  SetUniformMatrix16(UNIFORM_COLORTEXTUREMATRIX, matrixIdentity);
6269 
6270  RE_UploadCinematic(w, h, cols, rows, data, client, dirty);
6271 
6272  R2_TIMING_SIMPLE()
6273  {
6274  end = ri.Milliseconds();
6275  Ren_Print("glTexSubImage2D %i, %i: %i msec\n", cols, rows, end - start);
6276  }
6277 
6278  tess.multiDrawPrimitives = 0;
6279  tess.numVertexes = 0;
6280  tess.numIndexes = 0;
6281 
6282  tess.xyz[tess.numVertexes][0] = x;
6283  tess.xyz[tess.numVertexes][1] = y;
6284  tess.xyz[tess.numVertexes][2] = 0;
6285  tess.xyz[tess.numVertexes][3] = 1;
6286  tess.texCoords[tess.numVertexes][0] = 0.5f / cols;
6287  tess.texCoords[tess.numVertexes][1] = 0.5f / rows;
6288  tess.texCoords[tess.numVertexes][2] = 0;
6289  tess.texCoords[tess.numVertexes][3] = 1;
6290  tess.numVertexes++;
6291 
6292  tess.xyz[tess.numVertexes][0] = x + w;
6293  tess.xyz[tess.numVertexes][1] = y;
6294  tess.xyz[tess.numVertexes][2] = 0;
6295  tess.xyz[tess.numVertexes][3] = 1;
6296  tess.texCoords[tess.numVertexes][0] = (cols - 0.5f) / cols;
6297  tess.texCoords[tess.numVertexes][1] = 0.5f / rows;
6298  tess.texCoords[tess.numVertexes][2] = 0;
6299  tess.texCoords[tess.numVertexes][3] = 1;
6300  tess.numVertexes++;
6301 
6302  tess.xyz[tess.numVertexes][0] = x + w;
6303  tess.xyz[tess.numVertexes][1] = y + h;
6304  tess.xyz[tess.numVertexes][2] = 0;
6305  tess.xyz[tess.numVertexes][3] = 1;
6306  tess.texCoords[tess.numVertexes][0] = (cols - 0.5f) / cols;
6307  tess.texCoords[tess.numVertexes][1] = (rows - 0.5f) / rows;
6308  tess.texCoords[tess.numVertexes][2] = 0;
6309  tess.texCoords[tess.numVertexes][3] = 1;
6310  tess.numVertexes++;
6311 
6312  tess.xyz[tess.numVertexes][0] = x;
6313  tess.xyz[tess.numVertexes][1] = y + h;
6314  tess.xyz[tess.numVertexes][2] = 0;
6315  tess.xyz[tess.numVertexes][3] = 1;
6316  tess.texCoords[tess.numVertexes][0] = 0.5f / cols;
6317  tess.texCoords[tess.numVertexes][1] = (rows - 0.5f) / rows;
6318  tess.texCoords[tess.numVertexes][2] = 0;
6319  tess.texCoords[tess.numVertexes][3] = 1;
6320  tess.numVertexes++;
6321 
6322  tess.indexes[tess.numIndexes++] = 0;
6323  tess.indexes[tess.numIndexes++] = 1;
6324  tess.indexes[tess.numIndexes++] = 2;
6325  tess.indexes[tess.numIndexes++] = 0;
6326  tess.indexes[tess.numIndexes++] = 2;
6327  tess.indexes[tess.numIndexes++] = 3;
6328 
6329  Tess_UpdateVBOs(ATTR_POSITION | ATTR_TEXCOORD);
6330 
6331  Tess_DrawElements();
6332 
6333  tess.multiDrawPrimitives = 0;
6334  tess.numVertexes = 0;
6335  tess.numIndexes = 0;
6336 
6337  GL_CheckErrors();
6338 }
6339 
6350 void RE_UploadCinematic(int w, int h, int cols, int rows, const byte *data, int client, qboolean dirty)
6351 {
6352  GL_Bind(tr.scratchImage[client]);
6353 
6354  // if the scratchImage isn't in the format we want, specify it as a new texture
6355  if (cols != tr.scratchImage[client]->width || rows != tr.scratchImage[client]->height)
6356  {
6357  tr.scratchImage[client]->width = tr.scratchImage[client]->uploadWidth = cols;
6358  tr.scratchImage[client]->height = tr.scratchImage[client]->uploadHeight = rows;
6359 
6360  glTexImage2D(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0, GL_RGB8, cols, rows, 0, GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, data);
6361 
6362  glTexParameterf(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_LINEAR);
6363  glTexParameterf(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, GL_LINEAR);
6364 
6365 #if 1
6366  glTexParameterf(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_S, GL_CLAMP_TO_EDGE);
6367  glTexParameterf(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_T, GL_CLAMP_TO_EDGE);
6368 #else
6369  glTexParameterf(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_S, GL_CLAMP_TO_BORDER);
6370  glTexParameterf(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_T, GL_CLAMP_TO_BORDER);
6371  glTexParameterfv(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_BORDER_COLOR, colorBlack);
6372 #endif
6373  }
6374  else
6375  {
6376  if (dirty)
6377  {
6378  // otherwise, just subimage upload it so that drivers can tell we are going to be changing
6379  // it and don't try and do a texture compression
6380  glTexSubImage2D(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0, 0, 0, cols, rows, GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, data);
6381  }
6382  }
6383 
6384  GL_CheckErrors();
6385 }
6386 
6392 const void *RB_SetColor(const void *data)
6393 {
6394  const setColorCommand_t *cmd = (const setColorCommand_t *)data;
6395 
6396  Ren_LogComment("--- RB_SetColor ---\n");
6397 
6398  backEnd.color2D[0] = cmd->color[0];
6399  backEnd.color2D[1] = cmd->color[1];
6400  backEnd.color2D[2] = cmd->color[2];
6401  backEnd.color2D[3] = cmd->color[3];
6402 
6403  return (const void *)(cmd + 1);
6404 }
6405 
6411 const void *RB_StretchPic(const void *data)
6412 {
6413  int i;
6414  const stretchPicCommand_t *cmd = (const stretchPicCommand_t *)data;
6415  shader_t *shader;
6416  int numVerts, numIndexes;
6417 
6418  Ren_LogComment("--- RB_StretchPic ---\n");
6419 
6420  if (!backEnd.projection2D)
6421  {
6422  RB_SetGL2D();
6423  }
6424 
6425  shader = cmd->shader;
6426  if (shader != tess.surfaceShader)
6427  {
6428  if (tess.numIndexes)
6429  {
6430  Tess_End();
6431  }
6432  backEnd.currentEntity = &backEnd.entity2D;
6433  Tess_Begin(Tess_StageIteratorGeneric, NULL, shader, NULL, qfalse, qfalse, -1, 0);
6434  }
6435 
6436  Tess_CheckOverflow(4, 6);
6437  numVerts = tess.numVertexes;
6438  numIndexes = tess.numIndexes;
6439 
6440  tess.numVertexes += 4;
6441  tess.numIndexes += 6;
6442 
6443  tess.indexes[numIndexes] = numVerts + 3;
6444  tess.indexes[numIndexes + 1] = numVerts + 0;
6445  tess.indexes[numIndexes + 2] = numVerts + 2;
6446  tess.indexes[numIndexes + 3] = numVerts + 2;
6447  tess.indexes[numIndexes + 4] = numVerts + 0;
6448  tess.indexes[numIndexes + 5] = numVerts + 1;
6449 
6450 
6451  for (i = 0; i < 4; i++)
6452  {
6453  tess.colors[numVerts + i][0] = backEnd.color2D[0];
6454  tess.colors[numVerts + i][1] = backEnd.color2D[1];
6455  tess.colors[numVerts + i][2] = backEnd.color2D[2];
6456  tess.colors[numVerts + i][3] = backEnd.color2D[3];
6457  }
6458 
6459  tess.xyz[numVerts][0] = cmd->x;
6460  tess.xyz[numVerts][1] = cmd->y;
6461  tess.xyz[numVerts][2] = 0;
6462  tess.xyz[numVerts][3] = 1;
6463 
6464  tess.texCoords[numVerts][0] = cmd->s1;
6465  tess.texCoords[numVerts][1] = cmd->t1;
6466  tess.texCoords[numVerts][2] = 0;
6467  tess.texCoords[numVerts][3] = 1;
6468 
6469  tess.xyz[numVerts + 1][0] = cmd->x + cmd->w;
6470  tess.xyz[numVerts + 1][1] = cmd->y;
6471  tess.xyz[numVerts + 1][2] = 0;
6472  tess.xyz[numVerts + 1][3] = 1;
6473 
6474  tess.texCoords[numVerts + 1][0] = cmd->s2;
6475  tess.texCoords[numVerts + 1][1] = cmd->t1;
6476  tess.texCoords[numVerts + 1][2] = 0;
6477  tess.texCoords[numVerts + 1][3] = 1;
6478 
6479  tess.xyz[numVerts + 2][0] = cmd->x + cmd->w;
6480  tess.xyz[numVerts + 2][1] = cmd->y + cmd->h;
6481  tess.xyz[numVerts + 2][2] = 0;
6482  tess.xyz[numVerts + 2][3] = 1;
6483 
6484  tess.texCoords[numVerts + 2][0] = cmd->s2;
6485  tess.texCoords[numVerts + 2][1] = cmd->t2;
6486  tess.texCoords[numVerts + 2][2] = 0;
6487  tess.texCoords[numVerts + 2][3] = 1;
6488 
6489  tess.xyz[numVerts + 3][0] = cmd->x;
6490  tess.xyz[numVerts + 3][1] = cmd->y + cmd->h;
6491  tess.xyz[numVerts + 3][2] = 0;
6492  tess.xyz[numVerts + 3][3] = 1;
6493 
6494  tess.texCoords[numVerts + 3][0] = cmd->s1;
6495  tess.texCoords[numVerts + 3][1] = cmd->t2;
6496  tess.texCoords[numVerts + 3][2] = 0;
6497  tess.texCoords[numVerts + 3][3] = 1;
6498 
6499  tess.attribsSet |= ATTR_POSITION | ATTR_TEXCOORD | ATTR_COLOR;
6500  return (const void *)(cmd + 1);
6501 }
6502 
6508 const void *RB_Draw2dPolys(const void *data)
6509 {
6510  const poly2dCommand_t *cmd = (const poly2dCommand_t *)data;
6511  shader_t *shader;
6512  int i;
6513 
6514  if (!backEnd.projection2D)
6515  {
6516  RB_SetGL2D();
6517  }
6518 
6519  shader = cmd->shader;
6520  if (shader != tess.surfaceShader)
6521  {
6522  if (tess.numIndexes)
6523  {
6524  Tess_End();
6525  }
6526  backEnd.currentEntity = &backEnd.entity2D;
6527  Tess_Begin(Tess_StageIteratorGeneric, NULL, shader, NULL, qfalse, qfalse, -1, 0);
6528  }
6529 
6530  Tess_CheckOverflow(cmd->numverts, (cmd->numverts - 2) * 3);
6531 
6532  for (i = 0; i < cmd->numverts - 2; i++)
6533  {
6534  tess.indexes[tess.numIndexes + 0] = tess.numVertexes;
6535  tess.indexes[tess.numIndexes + 1] = tess.numVertexes + i + 1;
6536  tess.indexes[tess.numIndexes + 2] = tess.numVertexes + i + 2;
6537  tess.numIndexes += 3;
6538  }
6539 
6540  for (i = 0; i < cmd->numverts; i++)
6541  {
6542  tess.xyz[tess.numVertexes][0] = cmd->verts[i].xyz[0];
6543  tess.xyz[tess.numVertexes][1] = cmd->verts[i].xyz[1];
6544  tess.xyz[tess.numVertexes][2] = 0;
6545  tess.xyz[tess.numVertexes][3] = 1;
6546 
6547  tess.texCoords[tess.numVertexes][0] = cmd->verts[i].st[0];
6548  tess.texCoords[tess.numVertexes][1] = cmd->verts[i].st[1];
6549 
6550  tess.colors[tess.numVertexes][0] = cmd->verts[i].modulate[0] * (1.0f / 255.0f);
6551  tess.colors[tess.numVertexes][1] = cmd->verts[i].modulate[1] * (1.0f / 255.0f);
6552  tess.colors[tess.numVertexes][2] = cmd->verts[i].modulate[2] * (1.0f / 255.0f);
6553  tess.colors[tess.numVertexes][3] = cmd->verts[i].modulate[3] * (1.0f / 255.0f);
6554  tess.numVertexes++;
6555  }
6556 
6557  tess.attribsSet |= ATTR_POSITION | ATTR_TEXCOORD | ATTR_COLOR;
6558  return (const void *)(cmd + 1);
6559 }
6560 
6566 const void *RB_RotatedPic(const void *data)
6567 {
6568  const stretchPicCommand_t *cmd = (const stretchPicCommand_t *)data;
6569  shader_t *shader;
6570  int numVerts, numIndexes;
6571  float angle;
6572  float mx, my, mw, mh;
6573 
6574  if (!backEnd.projection2D)
6575  {
6576  RB_SetGL2D();
6577  }
6578 
6579  shader = cmd->shader;
6580  if (shader != tess.surfaceShader)
6581  {
6582  if (tess.numIndexes)
6583  {
6584  Tess_End();
6585  }
6586  backEnd.currentEntity = &backEnd.entity2D;
6587  Tess_Begin(Tess_StageIteratorGeneric, NULL, shader, NULL, qfalse, qfalse, -1, 0);
6588  }
6589 
6590  Tess_CheckOverflow(4, 6);
6591  numVerts = tess.numVertexes;
6592  numIndexes = tess.numIndexes;
6593 
6594  tess.numVertexes += 4;
6595  tess.numIndexes += 6;
6596 
6597  tess.indexes[numIndexes] = numVerts + 3;
6598  tess.indexes[numIndexes + 1] = numVerts + 0;
6599  tess.indexes[numIndexes + 2] = numVerts + 2;
6600  tess.indexes[numIndexes + 3] = numVerts + 2;
6601  tess.indexes[numIndexes + 4] = numVerts + 0;
6602  tess.indexes[numIndexes + 5] = numVerts + 1;
6603 
6604  Vector4Copy(backEnd.color2D, tess.colors[numVerts + 0]);
6605  Vector4Copy(backEnd.color2D, tess.colors[numVerts + 1]);
6606  Vector4Copy(backEnd.color2D, tess.colors[numVerts + 2]);
6607  Vector4Copy(backEnd.color2D, tess.colors[numVerts + 3]);
6608 
6609 #define ROTSCALE 0.725f
6610 
6611  mx = cmd->x + (cmd->w / 2);
6612  my = cmd->y + (cmd->h / 2);
6613  mw = cmd->w * ROTSCALE;
6614  mh = cmd->h * ROTSCALE;
6615 
6616 #define COSAN mx + (float)(cos(angle) * mw)
6617 #define SINAN my + (float)(sin(angle) * mh)
6618 
6619  angle = cmd->angle * M_TAU_F;
6620  tess.xyz[numVerts][0] = COSAN;
6621  tess.xyz[numVerts][1] = SINAN;
6622  tess.xyz[numVerts][2] = 0;
6623  tess.xyz[numVerts][3] = 1;
6624 
6625  tess.texCoords[numVerts][0] = cmd->s1;
6626  tess.texCoords[numVerts][1] = cmd->t1;
6627 
6628  angle = cmd->angle * M_TAU_F + 0.25f * M_TAU_F;
6629  tess.xyz[numVerts + 1][0] = COSAN;
6630  tess.xyz[numVerts + 1][1] = SINAN;
6631  tess.xyz[numVerts + 1][2] = 0;
6632  tess.xyz[numVerts + 1][3] = 1;
6633 
6634  tess.texCoords[numVerts + 1][0] = cmd->s2;
6635  tess.texCoords[numVerts + 1][1] = cmd->t1;
6636 
6637  angle = cmd->angle * M_TAU_F + 0.50f * M_TAU_F;
6638  tess.xyz[numVerts + 2][0] = COSAN;
6639  tess.xyz[numVerts + 2][1] = SINAN;
6640  tess.xyz[numVerts + 2][2] = 0;
6641  tess.xyz[numVerts + 2][3] = 1;
6642 
6643  tess.texCoords[numVerts + 2][0] = cmd->s2;
6644  tess.texCoords[numVerts + 2][1] = cmd->t2;
6645 
6646  angle = cmd->angle * M_TAU_F + 0.75f * M_TAU_F;
6647  tess.xyz[numVerts + 3][0] = COSAN;
6648  tess.xyz[numVerts + 3][1] = SINAN;
6649  tess.xyz[numVerts + 3][2] = 0;
6650  tess.xyz[numVerts + 3][3] = 1;
6651 
6652  tess.texCoords[numVerts + 3][0] = cmd->s1;
6653  tess.texCoords[numVerts + 3][1] = cmd->t2;
6654 
6655  tess.attribsSet |= ATTR_POSITION | ATTR_TEXCOORD | ATTR_COLOR;
6656  return (const void *)(cmd + 1);
6657 }
6658 
6664 const void *RB_StretchPicGradient(const void *data)
6665 {
6666  const stretchPicCommand_t *cmd = (const stretchPicCommand_t *)data;
6667  shader_t *shader;
6668  int numVerts, numIndexes;
6669  int i;
6670 
6671  if (!backEnd.projection2D)
6672  {
6673  RB_SetGL2D();
6674  }
6675 
6676  shader = cmd->shader;
6677  if (shader != tess.surfaceShader)
6678  {
6679  if (tess.numIndexes)
6680  {
6681  Tess_End();
6682  }
6683  backEnd.currentEntity = &backEnd.entity2D;
6684  Tess_Begin(Tess_StageIteratorGeneric, NULL, shader, NULL, qfalse, qfalse, -1, 0);
6685  }
6686 
6687  Tess_CheckOverflow(4, 6);
6688  numVerts = tess.numVertexes;
6689  numIndexes = tess.numIndexes;
6690 
6691  tess.numVertexes += 4;
6692  tess.numIndexes += 6;
6693 
6694  tess.indexes[numIndexes] = numVerts + 3;
6695  tess.indexes[numIndexes + 1] = numVerts + 0;
6696  tess.indexes[numIndexes + 2] = numVerts + 2;
6697  tess.indexes[numIndexes + 3] = numVerts + 2;
6698  tess.indexes[numIndexes + 4] = numVerts + 0;
6699  tess.indexes[numIndexes + 5] = numVerts + 1;
6700 
6701  //*(int *)tess.vertexColors[numVerts].v = *(int *)tess.vertexColors[numVerts + 1].v = *(int *)backEnd.color2D;
6702  //*(int *)tess.vertexColors[numVerts + 2].v = *(int *)tess.vertexColors[numVerts + 3].v = *(int *)cmd->gradientColor;
6703 
6704  Vector4Copy(backEnd.color2D, tess.colors[numVerts + 0]);
6705  Vector4Copy(backEnd.color2D, tess.colors[numVerts + 1]);
6706 
6707  for (i = 0; i < 4; i++)
6708  {
6709  tess.colors[numVerts + 2][i] = cmd->gradientColor[i] * (1.0f / 255.0f);
6710  tess.colors[numVerts + 3][i] = cmd->gradientColor[i] * (1.0f / 255.0f);
6711  }
6712 
6713  tess.xyz[numVerts][0] = cmd->x;
6714  tess.xyz[numVerts][1] = cmd->y;
6715  tess.xyz[numVerts][2] = 0;
6716  tess.xyz[numVerts][3] = 1;
6717 
6718  tess.texCoords[numVerts][0] = cmd->s1;
6719  tess.texCoords[numVerts][1] = cmd->t1;
6720 
6721  tess.xyz[numVerts + 1][0] = cmd->x + cmd->w;
6722  tess.xyz[numVerts + 1][1] = cmd->y;
6723  tess.xyz[numVerts + 1][2] = 0;
6724  tess.xyz[numVerts + 1][3] = 1;
6725 
6726  tess.texCoords[numVerts + 1][0] = cmd->s2;
6727  tess.texCoords[numVerts + 1][1] = cmd->t1;
6728 
6729  tess.xyz[numVerts + 2][0] = cmd->x + cmd->w;
6730  tess.xyz[numVerts + 2][1] = cmd->y + cmd->h;
6731  tess.xyz[numVerts + 2][2] = 0;
6732  tess.xyz[numVerts + 2][3] = 1;
6733 
6734  tess.texCoords[numVerts + 2][0] = cmd->s2;
6735  tess.texCoords[numVerts + 2][1] = cmd->t2;
6736 
6737  tess.xyz[numVerts + 3][0] = cmd->x;
6738  tess.xyz[numVerts + 3][1] = cmd->y + cmd->h;
6739  tess.xyz[numVerts + 3][2] = 0;
6740  tess.xyz[numVerts + 3][3] = 1;
6741 
6742  tess.texCoords[numVerts + 3][0] = cmd->s1;
6743  tess.texCoords[numVerts + 3][1] = cmd->t2;
6744 
6745  tess.attribsSet |= ATTR_POSITION | ATTR_TEXCOORD | ATTR_COLOR;
6746  return (const void *)(cmd + 1);
6747 }
6748 
6754 const void *RB_DrawView(const void *data)
6755 {
6756  const drawViewCommand_t *cmd;
6757 
6758  Ren_LogComment("--- RB_DrawView ---\n");
6759 
6760  // finish any 2D drawing if needed
6761  if (tess.numIndexes)
6762  {
6763  Tess_End();
6764  }
6765 
6766  cmd = (const drawViewCommand_t *)data;
6767 
6768  backEnd.refdef = cmd->refdef;
6769  backEnd.viewParms = cmd->viewParms;
6770 
6771  RB_RenderView();
6772 
6773  return (const void *)(cmd + 1);
6774 }
6775 
6781 const void *RB_DrawBuffer(const void *data)
6782 {
6783  const drawBufferCommand_t *cmd = (const drawBufferCommand_t *)data;
6784 
6785  Ren_LogComment("--- RB_DrawBuffer ---\n");
6786 
6787  GL_DrawBuffer(cmd->buffer);
6788 
6789  // clear screen for debugging
6790  if (r_clear->integer)
6791  {
6792  GL_ClearColor(GLCOLOR_BLACK);
6793  GL_Clear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT | GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT);
6794  }
6795 
6796  return (const void *)(cmd + 1);
6797 }
6798 
6805 void RB_ShowImages(void)
6806 {
6807  int i;
6808  image_t *image;
6809  float x, y, w, h;
6810  vec4_t quadVerts[4];
6811  int start, end;
6812 
6813  Ren_LogComment("--- RB_ShowImages ---\n");
6814 
6815  if (!backEnd.projection2D)
6816  {
6817  RB_SetGL2D();
6818  }
6819 
6820  GL_Clear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT);
6821 
6822  SetMacrosAndSelectProgram(trProg.gl_genericShader);
6823 
6824  GL_Cull(CT_TWO_SIDED);
6825 
6826  // set uniforms
6827  GLSL_SetUniform_ColorModulate(trProg.gl_genericShader, CGEN_VERTEX, AGEN_VERTEX);
6828  SetUniformMatrix16(UNIFORM_COLORTEXTUREMATRIX, matrixIdentity);
6829 
6830  SelectTexture(TEX_COLOR);
6831 
6832  start = ri.Milliseconds();
6833 
6834  for (i = 0; i < tr.images.currentElements; i++)
6835  {
6836  image = (image_t *) Com_GrowListElement(&tr.images, i);
6837 
6838  w = glConfig.vidWidth / 20;
6839  h = glConfig.vidHeight / 15;
6840  x = i % 20 * w;
6841  y = i / 20 * h;
6842 
6843  // show in proportional size in mode 2
6844  if (r_showImages->integer == 2)
6845  {
6846  w *= image->uploadWidth / 512.0f;
6847  h *= image->uploadHeight / 512.0f;
6848  }
6849 
6850  // bind u_ColorMap
6851  GL_Bind(image);
6852 
6853  Vector4Set(quadVerts[0], x, y, 0, 1);
6854  Vector4Set(quadVerts[1], x + w, y, 0, 1);
6855  Vector4Set(quadVerts[2], x + w, y + h, 0, 1);
6856  Vector4Set(quadVerts[3], x, y + h, 0, 1);
6857 
6858  Tess_InstantQuad(quadVerts);
6859  }
6860 
6861  end = ri.Milliseconds();
6862  Ren_Print("%i msec to draw all images\n", end - start);
6863 
6864  GL_CheckErrors();
6865 }
6869 static void RB_ColorCorrection()
6870 {
6871  Ren_LogComment("--- RB_ColorCorrection ---\n");
6872 
6873  // enable shader, set arrays
6874  SetMacrosAndSelectProgram(trProg.gl_colorCorrection);
6875 
6876  //glVertexAttrib4fv(ATTR_INDEX_COLOR, colorWhite);
6877 
6878  // capture current color buffer for u_CurrentMap
6879  SelectTexture(TEX_CURRENT);
6880  ImageCopyBackBuffer(tr.currentRenderImage);
6881 
6882  SetUniformMatrix16(UNIFORM_MODELVIEWPROJECTIONMATRIX, GLSTACK_MVPM);
6883  SetUniformFloat(UNIFORM_GAMMA, (!ri.Cvar_VariableIntegerValue("r_ignorehwgamma") ? r_gamma->value : 1.0f));
6884 
6885  DRAWSCREENQUAD();
6886  GL_CheckErrors();
6887 }
6888 
6889 /************************************************************************/
6890 /* Do all post processing of the back buffer here */
6891 /************************************************************************/
6892 
6896 static void RB_PostProcess()
6897 {
6898  Ren_LogComment("--- RB_PostProcess ---\n");
6899 
6900  if (!backEnd.projection2D)
6901  {
6902  RB_SetGL2D();
6903  }
6904 
6905  // We need to reset these out or otherwise we crash out on map load
6906  R_BindNullVBO();
6907  R_BindNullIBO();
6908 
6909  GL_State(GLS_DEPTHTEST_DISABLE); // | GLS_DEPTHMASK_TRUE);
6910  GL_Cull(CT_TWO_SIDED);
6911 
6912  RB_ColorCorrection();
6913 
6914  // texture swapping test
6915  if (r_showImages->integer)
6916  {
6917  RB_ShowImages();
6918  }
6919 }
6920 
6924 static void RB_CountOverDraw()
6925 {
6926  int i;
6927  long sum = 0;
6928  unsigned char *stencilReadback;
6929 
6930  stencilReadback = (unsigned char *)ri.Hunk_AllocateTempMemory(glConfig.vidWidth * glConfig.vidHeight);
6931  glReadPixels(0, 0, glConfig.vidWidth, glConfig.vidHeight, GL_STENCIL_INDEX, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, stencilReadback);
6932 
6933  for (i = 0; i < glConfig.vidWidth * glConfig.vidHeight; i++)
6934  {
6935  sum += stencilReadback[i];
6936  }
6937 
6938  backEnd.pc.c_overDraw += sum;
6939  ri.Hunk_FreeTempMemory(stencilReadback);
6940 }
6941 
6947 const void *RB_SwapBuffers(const void *data)
6948 {
6949  const swapBuffersCommand_t *cmd;
6950 
6951  // finish any 2D drawing if needed
6952  if (tess.numIndexes)
6953  {
6954  Tess_End();
6955  }
6956 
6957  RB_PostProcess();
6958 
6959  cmd = (const swapBuffersCommand_t *)data;
6960 
6961  // we measure overdraw by reading back the stencil buffer and
6962  // counting up the number of increments that have happened
6963  if (r_measureOverdraw->integer)
6964  {
6965  RB_CountOverDraw();
6966  }
6967 
6968  if (!glState.finishCalled)
6969  {
6970  GL_JOIN();
6971  }
6972 
6973  Ren_LogComment("***************** RB_SwapBuffers *****************\n\n\n");
6974 
6975  ri.GLimp_SwapFrame();
6976 
6977  backEnd.projection2D = qfalse;
6978 
6979  glState.finishCalled = qfalse;
6980 
6981  return (const void *)(cmd + 1);
6982 }
6983 
6989 const void *RB_RenderToTexture(const void *data)
6990 {
6991  const renderToTextureCommand_t *cmd = (const renderToTextureCommand_t *)data;
6992 
6993  //ri.Printf( PRINT_ALL, "RB_RenderToTexture\n" );
6994 
6995  GL_Bind(cmd->image);
6996  glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_S, GL_LINEAR);
6997  glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_T, GL_LINEAR);
6998  glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_GENERATE_MIPMAP_SGIS, GL_TRUE);
6999  glCopyTexImage2D(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0, GL_RGB, cmd->x, cmd->y, cmd->w, cmd->h, 0);
7000  //glCopyTexSubImage2D( GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0, 0, 0, cmd->x, cmd->y, cmd->w, cmd->h );
7001 
7002  return (const void *)(cmd + 1);
7003 }
7004 
7010 const void *RB_Finish(const void *data)
7011 {
7012  const renderFinishCommand_t *cmd = (const renderFinishCommand_t *)data;
7013 
7014  //ri.Printf( PRINT_ALL, "RB_Finish\n" );
7015 
7016  glFinish();
7017 
7018  return (const void *)(cmd + 1);
7019 }
7020 
7026 void RB_ExecuteRenderCommands(const void *data)
7027 {
7028  int t1, t2;
7029 
7030  Ren_LogComment("--- RB_ExecuteRenderCommands ---\n");
7031 
7032  t1 = ri.Milliseconds();
7033 
7034  while (1)
7035  {
7036  switch (*(const int *)data)
7037  {
7038  case RC_SET_COLOR:
7039  data = RB_SetColor(data);
7040  break;
7041  case RC_STRETCH_PIC:
7042  data = RB_StretchPic(data);
7043  break;
7044  case RC_2DPOLYS:
7045  data = RB_Draw2dPolys(data);
7046  break;
7047  case RC_ROTATED_PIC:
7048  data = RB_RotatedPic(data);
7049  break;
7050  case RC_STRETCH_PIC_GRADIENT:
7051  data = RB_StretchPicGradient(data);
7052  break;
7053  case RC_DRAW_VIEW:
7054  data = RB_DrawView(data);
7055  break;
7056  case RC_DRAW_BUFFER:
7057  data = RB_DrawBuffer(data);
7058  break;
7059  case RC_SWAP_BUFFERS:
7060  data = RB_SwapBuffers(data);
7061  break;
7062  case RC_SCREENSHOT:
7063  data = RB_TakeScreenshotCmd(data);
7064  break;
7065  case RC_VIDEOFRAME:
7066  data = RB_TakeVideoFrameCmd(data);
7067  break;
7068  case RC_RENDERTOTEXTURE:
7069  data = RB_RenderToTexture(data);
7070  break;
7071  case RC_FINISH:
7072  data = RB_Finish(data);
7073  break;
7074 
7075  case RC_END_OF_LIST:
7076  default:
7077  // stop rendering on this thread
7078  t2 = ri.Milliseconds();
7079  backEnd.pc.msec = t2 - t1;
7080  return;
7081  }
7082  }
7083 }
